item.text: @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI gu h+ya sa mA dza sA d+ha naM sid+d+hi saM b+ha ba ni d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs dngos grub 'byung ba'i gter zhes bya ba/
dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zab gsal gnyis med dag pa'i bdag nyid kyis/ /bdag dang gzhan don phun sum tshogs pa'i sku/ /dpal ldan chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgya
la/ /rgyal sras rgyu dang bcas pa rab 'byung zhing / /rtag sogs rgyu 'dras khams kun rab bkang nas/ /ji srid bar du don mdzad rgyun mi 'chad/ /khyab bdag rdo rje sems dpa' de dang ni/ /de yi
sras rnams la yang phyag 'tshal lo/ /khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu kun khyab pa/ /snying ga'i dbus bsam de la brtan sogs skye/ /chos bdag khros pas kyang ni mi gnon pa/ /mi shigs thig le
gang yin rtogs par mos/ /blo dang ldan pa rnams kyis pad+ma kha 'byed pa/ /rmongs pa sreg byed snying gi mun pa sel mdzad pa/ /yon tan dag pa'i mkha' la rgyu zhing 'jigs bral mdzad/ /bla
ma dam pa rnams kyi zhal snga rgyal gyur cig /dpal ldan gsang 'dus mtsho chen las/ /bla ma'i brgyud rim gru gzings kyis/ /yid bzhin nor bu rnam pa gsum/ /sman pa'i zhabs kyis rnyed pa'o/ /

de rnyed dpe mkhyud spangs byas te/ /'di ni thun mong cig shos kyi/ /dngos grub 'byung phyir gter 'dra ba/ /phan phyir bdag gis brtsam par bya/ /gzhung gzhan spangs te bla ma'i brgyud rim gyis/ /dpal dang ldan pa'i
mnyam 'dus sgrub pa'i thabs/ /dam pas gsol ba btab phyir rab brod cing / /dad pas ci nus bdag gis bshad par bya/ /de la kha cig ni yang dag pa'i man ngag dang bral ba rnams ni dam pa ma yin par mkhas

par grags pa rnams la bla ma nyid du khas blangs nas de'i lam la zhugs te/ dka' thub dang smyung ba dang / brtul zhugs la sogs pas don dam pa gcig po la dpyod cing / 'di snyam du bdag gi rgyu'i 'khrul 'khor

la sogs pa dang lhan cig tu skyes kyang / de rnams kyis stong pa'i dngos po ni yod de/ de tsam zhig brtags pas mngon du byed kyang / dngos po la don dam par zhen pas stong pa nyid mi shes te grol ba dang rgyang ring du

'gyur ro/ /ji skad du/ stong pa nyid ni ma shes pas/ /kun la 'das pa des mi shes/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam 'jigs pas/ /stong pa nyid ni shes par bya/ /zhes 'byung bas so/ /yang kha cig dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad zin kyang / dam pa ma yin pas de'i lam

la zhugs te/ bdag la sogs pa dang bral ba'i phung po dang skye mched dang / khams rnams mi rtag pa la sogs par 'jig cing / sdom pa'i snod la brten te/ zhugs pa la sogs pa'i lam gyi phung po la sogs pa la grol nas lhag ma dang bcas pa dang / lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan

las 'das pa mngon du byed do/ /'di yang ma rig pa dang 'brel pa'i phyir 'bras bu phyir ldog pa can zhes bya ste/ de yang ji skad du/ rtsa ba'i rnam shes log gyur nas/ /lhag bcas lhag ma med gyur pa'i/ /rnam grol 'bras bu thob 'gyur yang / /mngon du rgyu ba med pa yi/ /ma rig

bag chags dang 'brel phyir/ /rnam par snang mdzad gang chen mtshos/ /de la thugs rjes gzung ba'i phyir/ /dpal ldan go cha'i 'od zer dang / /phyag gis dbu la reg mdzad nas/ /de yi ro myong zlog mdzad de/ /yang dag lam la 'dzud par mdzad/ /ces gsang ba'i rim pa phye

ba las gsungs so/ /yang kha cig ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa dang phrad du zin kyang / de rnams kyis brgyud rim mkhyud pas/ sbyin pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa bcu bskal ba mi nyung bar bsags nas/ sa'i de bzhin nyid du mngon du byed cing rim gyis sa bcu mngon du mthar thug

par byed do/ /de'i sprul pa'i sbyor bas dga' ldan gyi gnas nyid du skye ba len pa dang / gling la sogs pa la gzigs par mdzad nas yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa dang / lhums nas bltam pa dang / gzhon nu rol pa mdzad pa dang / khab bzhes pa dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang nas byung

ba dang / rab tu byung ba dang / dka' ba spyad pa ston pa dang / de'i tshe bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis sngon rang nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i man ngag rang rig chos kyi sku mngon du byed pa bstan pa'i phyir/ til gyi gong bu bzhin du ched du longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur bstan te/

ye shes kyi phyag rgya gnang nas/ snyoms par 'jug pa'i cho gas rtsa ba'i ye shes dmigs pa dang bral ba/ sbyor ba gnyis kyi bdag nyid sngon dang phyis kyi sbyor ba mngon du byas te/ bdud btul chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la sogs pa mdzad do/ /don

de lta bu'i snod dkon par gzigs nas/ sba bar mdzad de sangs rgyas pa'i tshul so sor mthong bar mdzad do/ /bla ma chen po'i zhal nas ji skad du/ ci'i phyir shAkya thub pa yis/ /grangs med par du tshogs bsags kyang / /'di don ma rtogs nai rany+dzar/ /ci yang ma yin

ting 'dzin gnas/ /de tshe bde gshegs kun gyis kyang / /thal byung blo chags de bzlog ste/ /nam mkha'i dbyings ltar rnam dag pa'i/ /zab gsal gnyis med rab bstan te/ /nam phyed dus su rgyal ba ltar/ /de nyid bsgoms pas tho rangs su/ /skad cig gis ni yang

dag rtogs/ /byang chub snying por zhugs byas nas/ /dpung chen bdud rnams rab bcom ste/ /sems can gzung bar bya ba'i phyir/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o/ /de nas bzung ste don mchog 'di/ /skal ba ldan pa 'ga' zhig la/ /zhal nas zhal dang snyan nas snyan/ /

brgyud de nges pa'i don bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de bas na sangs rgyas thams cad sangs rgyas pa'i tshul 'dis shes par bya'o/ /gal te lam gzhan gyis sangs rgyas pa srid na ni/ de'i bla ma dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /de bas na 'bras bu sku gsum ni gcig kho na ste

de'i lam ni sngags kyi spyod pa 'di'o/ /ji skad du rnam par snang mdzad byang chub pa'i rgyud las/ sangs rgyas dus gsum las byung ba/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /gzhal med ye shes thob pa ni/ /rdo rje sngags kyi don sgom yin/ /zhes 'byung bas so/ /sngags kyi spyod pa

la mos pa de dag kyang bzhir shes par bya'o/ /kha cig ni phyi'i gtsang sbra la sogs pa dang / bdag gi de kho na nyid la sogs pas lhag pa'i lha mnyes par byas pas mngon par mtho ba'i dpal nyams su myong bar byas nas/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par byas

nas sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang thob par 'dod do/ /yang kha cig ni phyi'i gtsang sbra la sogs pa bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa spangs nas/ mtshan ma dang bcas pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis mngon par mtho ba'i dpal nyams su myong nas/ tshogs gnyis bsags

nas sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang thob par 'dod do/ /yang kha cig ni gtsang sbra la sogs pa smad cing nang gi rnal 'byor dam tshig sems dpa' dang / phyi rol gyi ye shes sems dpa' phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan pa mnyes par bya ba la sogs pa'i rim pas rang gi lha mnyes par byas pas

mngon par mtho ba'i dpal nyams su myong nas/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par byas nas sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang thob par 'dod do/ /de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bu la mos pa'i gdul bya gzung ba'i phyir thabs gsungs pa ste/ phyag rgya chen po'i lhan cig byed pa

yin par shes par bya'o/ /phyag rgya chen po'i lhan cig byed pa ni 'di lta ste/ gang dag sems ji lta ba bzhin du brtag pa'i thabs la/ brtson 'grus 'bar ba dang ldan pa rnams kyis bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pas skad cig re re la yang snod dang bcud dang lam dang 'bras

bur bcas pa sbyong bar byed cing / rnal 'byor dang phyag rgya la brten nas tshe 'di nyid las rab dang rab kyi mthar phyin par 'gyur ba la som nyi med pas bla na med pa'o/ /de ston par byed pa'i gzhung ni dpal ldan 'dus pa ste/ ji lta bu zhe na/ chos phung brgyad khri bzhi stong dag /'dus phyir

snod yang dam pa'o/ /rmongs pa'i mun nag [(]sal [,]sel [)]bas na/ /sgron ma'i mchog ni 'di yin no/ /rta rgod lta bu'i sems 'dul bas/ /'thad pa'i srab skyogs 'di yin no/ /rnam shes glang chen yan lta bu/ /'gugs phyir lcags kyu dam pa'o/ /rnal 'byor mchog tu nges

pa yi/ /dam sdom can gyi tshong 'dus so/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po las/ /sgrol byed gru ni chen po'o/ /mngon mtho nges legs khang bzang gi /steng du phyin byed them skas so/ /rnam rtog las byung nyon mongs kyi/ /grong khyer 'joms shing grol ba yi/ /'khor lo

skyong phyir rgyal po'o/ /bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang chen pos/ /nye bar bstan pa'i mdo sde dang / /de 'dra'i tshul len rgyud 'di ni/ /kun gyi phyi ma gsungs pa ni/ /don rnams de ru gtan la phab/ /'di don sgom byed rnal 'byor pa/ /ma 'ongs rdo rje 'chang

ba bas/ /dga' dang rtsod pa med pa dang / /srung ba dang ni dran pa dang / /bag yod pa yis brtson bya'o/ /de lta bu'i gzhung de la rtog pa mngon du gtong ba'i nyan pa po rnams khas len pa'i yan lag dang / gleng gzhi phun sum tshogs pa'i rnam par bshad pas/ gang zag

gzhan yid brtan du rung bar bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don du bshad pas der zhes bya'o/ /ye shes las sprul pa'i 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa rnams la rgyud kyi don ji ltar bstan pa yang der shes par bya ste/ de'i phyis 'byung ba'i don rje btsun rnams kyis snod du rung bar

byas pa'i gang zag la rgyud kyi don ji ltar bsdus te bstan pa de sgrub thabs kyi rim pa 'dir rgyas par bshad par bya'o/ /de la dang po snying rje'i stobs las skyes/ /byang chub sems ldan sbyin pa la sogs brgyan/ /dpal ldan 'dus pa'i 'khor lor cho ga bzhin/ /dbang

bskur gnang ba thob pas rim 'di bya/ /gang zhig dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs sogs/ /gang rung gnas su stegs bu grub bzhi pa/ /tsan+dan mchog sogs byugs nas bde ba'i stan/ /rdo rje skyi la mo krung 'dug bsam gtan bya/ /dang por tho rangs nyi dbus su/ /steng

sogs kyis dag mthing ga'i hUM/ /'od zer gyis mthong yul dmigs te/ /snying rje la sogs bsgom par bya/ /'od zer gyis gsal sangs rgyas dang / /bla ma la sogs mdun du dmigs/ /gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa yi/ /mchod pa'i sprin spro phyag kyang 'tshal/ /gang

zhig thogs med dus nas srid pa'i chu rgyun la/ /rtog pas rnam par bsgos pa'i sdig pa ma lus rnams/ /thugs rje cher ldan khyod kyi mdun du yang / /gsam du dmigs pa gsal te bshags par bgyi/ /sangs rgyas dang ni byang chub sems dpa' dang / /'phags pa gzhan

rnams kyi yang dge ba gang / /ma lus bdag gis de dag yi rangs nas/ /bla med yang dag byang chub phyir bsngo'o/ /spros med thugs ni zla ba lta bu ste/ /mtha' yas don du thabs kyi sku chen po/ /rtag tu bdag gi yid dang dbyer med pa/ /bde bar gshegs pa rtag tu skyabs

su mchi/ /rtog pa kun las nges par grol ba yi/ /dam pa ma lus kun gyi phun tshogs rten/ /dngos po kun gyi ngo bo gcig pa po/ /chos la bdag ni rtag tu skyabs su mchi/ /bcings pa ma lus rnam par spangs pa yi/ /dpal ldan snying rje mchog gis rab drangs

pa/ /rab tu dga' la sogs pa rab gnas pa'i/ /'dul ba'i dbang po'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsam pa dag pas rnam smin dag pa yis/ /sgrib pa'i bag chags ma lus kun bcom ste/ /mi 'phrog pa yis brgyan pa'i

sems kyis kyang / /byang chub tu ni sems ni bskyed par bgyi/ /sras dang ldan pa'i bde bar gshegs pa yi/ /thun mong lam ste pha rol phyin pa bcu/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid yid kyis ni/ /da ltar 'dir ni bdag gis bstan par bya/ /sdug bsngal

la gnas sems can rnams/ /snying rjes yang ni dmigs byas te/ /byang chub sems ni dpag med pa/ /rin chen bdag gis bsam par bya/ /rang bzhin med phyir stong pa nyid/ /rgyu med pas na mtshan ma med/ /rjes su dpag pa dang bral bas/ /smon med nyid du nges

pa'o/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ sngags des bdag gzhan dngos po kun/ /gcig byas de nyid gsum mtshan ma/ /dgyes mdzad yas mar sbrengs pa yi/ /mdun gyi mkha' la bsam par bya/ /stong las nyi dkyil hUM nag las/ /rdo rje zer 'phros phyi

rol bcad/ /'og dang phyogs mtshams steng spros pas/ /sa gzhi ra ba bla rer bskyed/ /b+hU~M 'khor rtsibs bcu 'od zer drag /pad nyir khro bo 'khor lor bsgom/ /de dbus hUM mdzad rtag pa sogs/ /gnas 'gyur de las chos 'byung bskyed/ /gru gsum dkar po

gyen la gnas/ /sna tshogs 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phro/ /nam mkha'i dkyil du pad+ma dang / /sna tshogs rdo rje bsam par bya/ /de dbus zla steng b+h+rUM las skyes/ /'khor lo b+h+rUM mtshan las byung ba/ /rig ma dang bcas snang mdzad las/ /gyur

pa'i khang ba brtsegs pa bsgom/ /gru bzhi la sogs yon tan ldan/ /sna tshogs pad+ma bcu dgu'i steng / /nyi ma'i gdan ni bdun dag dang / /zla ba'i gdan ni bcu gnyis bskyed/ /de nyid gsum gnas sems pa pas pas/ /bde gshegs rnams kyis de la

gzigs/ /rang gi khams su shes rab thabs/ /dbyangs yig bde ba'i yi ger 'gyur/ /dbu rtse las byon ye shes sems/ /'dres gyur rten babs zla gnyis gyur/ /'du zhing 'phro ba'i sbyor ba las/ /gcig tu gyur pa bsam pa'o/ /de las hUM dkar

las byung ba/ /rdo rje rtse lnga me shel gzugs/ /phyogs kun 'od zer 'phro bsams nas/ /hUM bcas ldan pas nga rgyal bya/ /oM badzra At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de las 'phros pa bde gshegs kyis/ /'gro ba sangs rgyas nyid du byas/ /slar 'dus thugs kyi rdo rje las/ /

btsud nas bdag la nga rgyal bya/ /oM ya thA sarba ta thA ga ta sta thA a haM/ sa bon gsang gsum rdo rjer gyur/ /gcig gyur rdo rje sems dpa' mchog /'gro kun ro mnyam gcig pa po/ /kun du bzang po bsgom par bya/ /sku dang dbus zhal zla nor 'dra/ /g.yas gnag

g.yon ni dmar po la/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan ldan pa'i/ /phyag gnyis rang snang shes rab 'khyud/ /g.yas gnyis rdo rje ral gri ste/ /g.yon gnyis rin chen pad+ma'o/ /mtshon byed mtshan ma dbu rgyan la/ /mi bskyod pa yis brgyan par bsgom/ /de nas 'dod

chags chen po yis/ /'dus pa'i 'jig rten gzigs gyur nas/ /sbyor ba'i sgra yis rang lus la/ /rnam snang la sogs gzhug par bya/ /de ni spyan ma la sogs dang / /gzugs la sogs pa yul gyi bdag /rnam pa dgu ni spro byas nas/ /rang gi shes rab

nyid la thim/ /shes rab de yi pad dkyil du/ /bde las sprul pa'i 'khor lo bskyed/ /gzigs gyur 'gro ba ma lus pa/ /snod du rung phyir gzhug par bya/ /rang gi sa bon 'od zer gyis/ /nam mkha' khyab pa'i bde gshegs rnams/ /zla ba lta bur zhu byas

pas/ /de rnams dag phyir dbang bskur bya/ /de yi stobs kyis de dag rnams/ /bde dang yid bde thob pa dang / /tha mal phung sogs bshigs pa'i phyir/ /zla ba lta bur zhu ba'o/ /de la mig la sogs pa rnams/ /k+ShaM dzaM khaM gaM skaM saM gyur/ /de bzhin gzugs

la sogs pa rnams/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHkhaM raM gyur/ /sa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin dag /laM maM paM taM du ni gyur/ /gzugs sogs phung po'i bdag nyid rnams/ /buM AM dzaM khaM hUM du gyur/ /de las mtshan ma de yis mtshan/ /de rnams sa snying la sogs par/ /khams kun

'das par byas nas su/ /dris shing rtogs phul mi smra 'dug /de ni pad+ma'i gzhal yas nas/ /phyi rol phyung nas bstod nas ni/ /sna tshogs pa yi gzugs kyis so/ /rang rang khams su 'phros par bsam/ /de nas bar ma'i sems can rnams/ /skar ma lhung

zhing zhal zhugs nas/ /rdo rjer phyung nas pad+mar gnas/ /shes rab chags pas de zhu byed/ /de yi 'od zer dmar 'phros pas/ /yab yum byang chub sems su zhu/ /de las byung ba'i spyan la sogs/ /glu yis bskul nas thim par byed/ /sems can khams na gnas kyi

dbang phyug khyod ni rdo rje'i thugs/ /dga' ba'i yid 'ong don chen 'dod pa bdag la [(]bskab [,]bskyab [)]tu gsol/ /mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na/ /sems can yab chen gnyen mchog bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol/ /rdo rje sku khyod

bka' yi 'khor los sems can kun la phan/ /sangs rgyas don du byang chub mchog tu rab tu phan par gzigs/ /mgon po gal te bdag ni de ring gson par mchis bzhed na/ /spyod pa dri med kun du bzang pos bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /khyod ni rdo rje gsung

ste kun la phan zhing thugs brtse ba/ /'jig rten dag gi dgos pa'i don mdzad pa la rtag tu brtson/ /mgon po gal te bdag ni de ring gson par mchis bzhed na/ /spyod pa dri med kun du bzang pos bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /khyod ni rdo rje

'dod pa dam tshig mchog gi phan yon che/ /yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gdung mchog mnyam pa nyid gzigs la/ /mgon po gal te bdag ni de ring gson par mchis bzhed na/ /yon tan rin chen mang po'i gter gyur bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /klu 'di

yis ni don byas nas/ /zhu ba phun sum tshogs bral ba/ /zla nyir gyur te yi ge hUM/ /rdo rje sngon po cung zad gdengs/ /des mtshan bshes gnyen zhu byas pas/ /sku dang zhal dbus mthing ka'i mdog /g.yas dkar g.yon ni dmar po la/ /dam pa dang

po'i mtshan mar ldan/ /dam pa ma yin rnam rtog rnams/ /stong pa nyid du bsam byas te/ /mya ngan 'das pa zhen spang phyir/ /chos kyi dbyings su byin gyis brlabs/ /oM d+harma d+hA tu swA b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ sa snying rdo rje nam mkha' dang / /dbang phyug sgrib

sel kun bzang rnams/ /k+ShiM la sogs pa'i rim pa yis/ /mig la sogs par dgod par bya/ /de bzhin snying mgrin mgo zla la/ /hUM AHoM las skyes pa yi/ /lte bar thugs rdo rje sogs bskyed/ /de rnams thugs ka nas byung ba'i/ /gzugs kyi

rdo rje sogs 'od kyis/ /ma lus rdo rje bsam mchod nas/ /byin gyis brlab phyir gsol ba btab/ /dpal ldan thugs ni rdo rje 'chang / /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/ /deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su/ /rdo rje thugs can mdzad du gsol/ /phyogs

bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/ /deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su/ /rdo rje thugs can mdzad du gsol/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra swA b+hA wa badzra At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ chos kyi gsung lam dpal dang ldan/ /rdo rje

mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/ /deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su/ /rdo rje gsung dang 'dra bar mdzod/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/ /deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su/ /rdo rje gsung can mdzad du

gsol/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta wA ka badzra swA b+hA wa At+ma ko \u0f85haM/ dpal ldan sangs rgyas sku 'chang ba/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/ /deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su/ /rdo rje sku dang ldan par mdzod/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /

rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/ /deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su/ /rdo rje sku can mdzad du gsol/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badzra swA b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ ye shes sems dpa'i sa bon gyi/ /'od kyis phyogs bcu'i mgon po bskul/ /de yi 'od zer las

byung ba'i/ /spyan la sogs pa mchog rnams kyi/ /bdud rtsi lnga yis chus gang ba'i/ /bum pas dbang bskur bkra shis sgra/ /rnga dung dril sogs rol mo'i sgra/ /dbu rgyan rdo rje 'chang ldan bya/ /de bzhin zla ba gnyis la sogs/ /'gro ba'i dbang bskur ma

gtogs pa/ /thams cad sngon bzhin bshes gnyen dang / /gzugs kyi khyad par shes byas nas/ /byin gyis brlab cing mig la sogs/ /sa snying sogs bkod rdo rje gsum/ /gnas gsum mtshan las dbu rgyan la/ /rdo rje 'dzin pas mtshan pa'o/ /mgo

snying lte ba gsang rkang par/ /oM hUM swA a hA rnams sam/ /cha shas ngo bo nyid kyis ni/ /sangs rgyas lnga yis dgang bar bya/ /hUM las rdo rje chu skyes ni/ /rtse lnga 'dab brgyad bsam par bya/ /oM las nor bu ge sar bskyed/ /phaT kyis gnyis kyi lam 'gogs pa'o/ /

mtshan nyid lnga dang ldan bsams nas/ /bde mchog myong bar bya ba'i phyir/ /rang gi shes rab la zhugs nas/ /dbang po gnyis sbyar rjes chags byas/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ sbyor ba dang po'i ting 'dzin no/ /thugs ka'i sa bon 'od lcags

kyus/ /sangs rgyas 'khor lo mkha' khyab pa/ /zhal zhugs zhu gyur rdo rjer phyung / /bad gnas zla ba lta bu'i gzugs/ /de las sa bon hUM bcu dgu/ /mi bskyod pa yi 'khor lo mchog /gsal bar bsams nas 'gro ba kun/ /phan

phyir rim gyis dbyung bar bya/ /badzra d+h+r-ika gis rab bskul la/ /gong ma lta bu'i mi bskyod pa/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa byas nas su/ /'dus nas bdag la zhugs par bsam/ /dzi ni dzika gis rnam snang dbyung / /dkar nag dmar po phyag drug pa/ /'khor lo

ral gri rin chen pad/ /'dus nas shar gyi zla bar bsam/ /rat+na d+h+r-ika gis rin chen dbyung / /ser nag dkar po phyag drug pa/ /rin chen ral gri 'khor lo pad/ /'dus nas lho yi nyi mar bsam/ /A ro l-ika gis 'od dpag med/ /dmar nag dkar po

phyag drug pa/ /pad+ma ral gri rin chen 'khor/ /slar 'dus nub kyi nyi mar bsam/ /pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika gis don yod grub/ /ljang nag dkar po phyag drug pa/ /ral gri 'khor lo rin chen pad/ /'dus nas byang gi nyi mar bsam/ /dang po rang gi rig ma 'khyud/ /rgyan

kun brgyan pa'i na bza' dang / /rin chen sna tshogs dbu rgyan can/ /gdan ltar 'od kyi dkyil 'khor lo/ /mo ha ra tis spyan ma dbyung / /sku yi rdo rje dang 'dra ba/ /'khor lo ral gri rin chen pad/ /slar 'dus shar lhor zla bar bsam/ /dwe Sha ra tis mA ma kI/ /

thugs kyi rdo rje dang 'dra ba/ /ut+pal ral gri rin chen pad/ /'dus nas lho nub zla bar bsam/ /rA ga ra tis gos dkar mo/ /gsung gi rdo rje dang 'dra ba/ /pad ral gri rin chen 'khor/ /'dus nas nub byang zla bar bsam/ /badzra ra tis sgrol ma dbyung / /rin

chen dbang phyug dang 'dra ba/ /ut+pal 'khor lo rin chen pad/ /slar 'dus byang shar zla bar bsam/ /oM AHhUM gis lha mo drug /go rims bzhin du dbyung bar bya/ /gzugs kyi rdo rje rnam snang 'dra/ /me long ral gri rin chen pad/ /sgra yi rdo rje mi bskyod 'dra/ /

pi waM ral gri rin chen pad/ /dri yi rdo rje rin chen 'dra/ /dung dang ral gri rin chen pad/ /ro yi rdo rje mtha' yas 'dra/ /snod dang ral gri rin chen 'khor/ /reg gi rdo rje don yod 'dra/ /gos dang rin chen 'khor lo pad/ /chos dbyings rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra/ /chos

'byung ral gri rin chen pad/ /me mtshams la sogs grwa bzhi dang / /shar sgo g.yas g.yon zla steng bsam/ /ya mAn+ta kr-ita gshin rje'i gshed/ /mi bskyod lta bu phyag drug pa/ /tho ba ral gri rin chen pad/ /shar sgor khro dkyil nyi dbus dgod/ /pradz+nyAn+ta kr-ita

shes mthar byed/ /snang mdzad lta bu phyag drug pa/ /dbyug pa ral gri rin chen pad/ /lho sgor nyi dbus nyi 'od 'bar/ /pad+man+ta kr-ita rta mgrin ni/ /mtha' yas lta bu phyag drug pa/ /pad+ma rin chen ral gri 'khor/ /nub sgor nyi dkyil khro dkyil bsam/ /big+h+nan+ta kr-ita

bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /mi bskyod lta bu phyag drug pa/ /rdo rje ral gri rin chen pad/ /byang sgor nyi dbus khro dkyil bsam/ /de rnams rgod dang gdangs pa dang / /mche ba gtsigs dang bzhad byed pa/ /dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brjes/ /stag lpags smad g.yogs dang ldan

pa/ /gtum pa'i sbrul gyis brgyan pa yi/ /dang pos rig ma 'khyud pa dang / /me yi 'od kyi 'khor lo nang / /gtum po rab tu bsam pa'o/ /de ltar dngos po thams cad kyis/ /rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mthong nas su/ /sa bon 'od zer lcags kyu yis/ /gshin rje

gshed bskul 'khor lo dgug /de dang lhan cig 'ongs pa'i bgegs/ /bskrad nas bsrung byas khro bo thim/ /bde bas rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /mdun du dmigs la mchod par bya/ /dung gi chu yis bsang gtor dang / /kun das kha bkang chus nye reg /mchod

yon snod kyis mchod yon dang / /mtha' sogs dbye bas zhabs bsil lo/ /de bzhin khro bo gzhan bskul bas/ /'od zer gyis ni gzhug pa dang / /bcing dang rjes su dgyes bskyed nga / /chos kyi dbyings su byin gyis brlab/ /mos pas mig la sogs pa rnams/ /

rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum bkod/ /snga ma bzhin du dbang bskur bas/ /rigs kyi dbang bskur gzhag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bzhi po mi bskyod pa/ /lha mo rang rang bdag pos brgyan/ /rnam snang mi bskyod snang mtha' yas/ /mi bskyod sgo srung

mtshan ma'o/ /sa bon 'od kyis lha mo bkug /zhal zhugs zhu gyur rdo rjer phyung / /pad nang laM maM baM taM dang / /dzaHhUM baM hoHkhaM raM gyur/ /de yi 'od kyis bcu po dgug /rang rang sa bon la zhugs pas/ /nus dang ldan par rab byas nas/ /shes rab ba spu'i bu gar spro/ /

'od rtse gzugs rdo rje sogs ni/ /rang rang mtshan mas rnam mdzes pa'i/ /dri med rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i sku/ /sgyu ma lta bur spro bar bya/ /de bzhin phyi yi gdugs la sogs/ /'od rtse las spro nam mkha'i khams/ /bkang ste bdag dang 'khor lo la/ /mchod par byas te

mchod pa dang / /mchod pa po dang mchod gnas gsum/ /rmi lam lta bur shes bya'i phyir/ /tha dad las ni grol byas nas/ /sngags kyis byin gyis brlab par bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza badzra swA b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de nas brag ca'i sgra lta bur/ /sgra yul thams cad

rab bsams nas/ /rdo rje dril bu bde dbyangs kyis/ /rang nyid lha yis bstod par bsgom/ /mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che/ /rdo rje dbyings ni mkha' chen po/ /rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum/ /gsang ba'i dbyings la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rnam par snang mdzad

dga' chen po/ /rdo rje zhi ba dga' ba che/ /rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal mchog /ston pa rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab/ /rdo rje nam mkha' dri ma med/ /dngos nyid dag pas gos pa med/ /rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rdo rje dpag med rgyal po che/ /

mi rtogs nam mkha' rdo rje 'dzin/ /'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyes/ /rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /dag pa rdo rje gdon mi za/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa/ /rang bzhin dag pa nyid las byung / /rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rlung dang

me yi dkyil 'khor nas/ /pad+ma b+han+d+ha ra bdud rtsi lnga/ /zla ba nyi mar yi ge lnga/ /bsams nas 'od zer spro bya'o/ /rtag sogs bkug nas sa bon dgug /bzhu zhing bskol bas rlangs nas hUM/ /de byung rdo rje zhu byas nas/ /phreng ba'i rgyun du dbab par bya/ /oM gyis

bsil bar byas nas su/ /lha rnams phyag tu spros byas la/ /lce hUM las byung rdo rje bkod/ /snying zla'i 'khor lo tshim par bya/ /dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /ye shes sems dpa'i thugs 'od kyis/ /thub pa'i dbang pos kun

rtog spangs/ /'gro kun sangs rgyas nyid byas nas/ /sa bon la ni thim par bya/ /thugs ka'i mtshan ma nang gnas pa/ /nyi ma'i dbus kyi yi ge hUM/ /'od zer rnam pa lnga ldan pa'i/ /tsa na'i 'bru tsam thig ler bsam/ /de yi 'od kyis gnas la sogs/ /rdo rje

mchog gsum gsal byas nas/ /bzhag ste thig le lta bu ru/ /rang gi sems nyid zhugs par bya/ /de ma thag tu ting 'dzin gsum/ /grub pa rab tu bsam byas nas/ /de yi gsum pa las spro zhing / /thig le yan chad gsal bar bya/ /gzhan pa

ba spu las spro zhing / /dkyil 'khor rten la sogs pa nas/ /khams kun bkang nas mtha' la bsdu/ /de rim yang ni spro ba sdu bya/ /yang ni sa bon 'od kyis ni/ /bde gshegs dgug gzhug zhu gyur nas/ /rdo rje'i lam nas phyung nas su/ /ze'u 'bru bum

pa'i nang du dbab/ /de las rdo rje mthing ka che/ /nas tshad lte bar rin po che/ /yungs kar tshad tsam dbus su yang / /rten bcas ting 'dzin gsum po bsgom/ /rdo rje rtse lnga lcags kyu yis/ /phyung ste sna rtser gnas par bya/ /rdo rje nang nas thur sel rlung / /phyung ste

gnas bya rnam pa gzhan/ /'di yi ting 'dzin gsum pa las/ /spro bsdu gong ma bzhin du bya/ /de la bzung bas stobs ldan na/ /brtan pa'i mtshan ma skye bar 'gyur/ /de skyes sprul pa 'phro ba ni/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs phyag mtshan

rnams/ /yang nas yang du spro bsdu bya/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dang / /ye shes sems dpa'i sa bon las/ /gsang sngags bzlas brjod spro byed pa/ /rim pa'am ni cig car bya/ /oM sogs re re brjod skad cig /sku rdo rje la sogs 'khor

lo/ /spros pas nam mkha'i khams bkang nas/ /yan lag bcu gnyis gsum ldan mos/ /oM sogs re re brjod skad cig /ma bskul gnyis dang gong ma ltar/ /dang pos phyung ste nam mkha' la/ /bkod nas gnyis pa gong ma ltar/ /mchod pa'i lha mo spro byas nas/ /

'khyud pa'i bde bas thub dbang rnams/ /bde chen dbang du gyur byas la/ /gsum pas nang du thim par bya/ /rdo rje dang ni gsal ba dang / /lam byung chos kyi 'khor lo las/ /steng du g.yas g.yon gnyi ga las/ /drag dang dal bar shes par bya/ /'byung ba hUM ste 'jug pa oM/ /

gnas pa AH ste de nyid bzung / /ye shes sa bon ngo bo ste/ /gzhi rnams gcig tu brtsi bar bya/ /nyis brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga las/ /bzhi bsdus brgya phrag dgu nyid do/ /de ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi rim/ /nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'o/ /phra myur rnams kyis ngal ba bsal/ /spyan sogs glu

yis bskul byas nas/ /sngon bzhin 'khor lo mchod bya ste/ /sems kyi gzengs ni bstod bya ste/ /nyam chung spyi bor mtho gang tshad/ /zla steng oM gyi brlan pa yi/ /bdud rtsi cho ga bzhin phab pas/ /rdo rje gsum sogs tshim par bya/ /baM las byung ba'i bum pa bzang / /zla

gam phyed kyis kha bcad pa/ /thigs pa yid bzhin rin po ches/ /brgyan pa rkan gyi dbus su bsgom/ /'od zer lnga ni rab 'bar ba'i/ /oM ni lce yi rtse la bsam/ /de gzer rim pas dbab byas pas/ /nus dang ldan pas bkres skom gzhom/ /bkres skom la sogs

nyon mongs la/ /rnal 'byor de ni kun brtsams nas/ /rdo rje thugs kyi bka' bzhin du/ /sdug bsngal thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur/ /cung zad ngal sos yul gzhan 'gro/ /gong mi'i cho gas brtan bya'i phyir/ /rdo rje gsum sngags ma zhen par/ /gsang sngags bzlas

brjod yang bya'o/ /ldang bar 'dod na sngags pa yis/ /mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang byas la/ /oM AHhUM nyid brjod byas la/ /de nyid gsum la 'khor lo bsdu/ /las kyi rgyal ba mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /dpal ldan gsang ba 'dus pa yi/ /rig pa'i

lta ba ma thob pa'i/ /sems can thugs rjes gzung ba'i phyir/ /smon lam 'di ni sngon du bya/ /dpal dang ldan pa'i mi bskyod mgon/ /rnal 'byor gyis thob dge ba gang / /bde chen ye shes rang byung nas/ /sems can kun mkhyen sar 'god shog /gang zhig 'di

mthong 'dod pa'am/ /gang zhig zhu bar 'dod pa des/ /thugs kyi dbang phyug grangs med pa/ /mgon po de ni mthong bar shog /nam mkha' mtha' klas phyogs bcu ru/ /sems can kun gyi don spyod la/ /ji ltar thugs kyi dbang phyug bzhin/ /bdag gis kyang

ni spyod par shog /ji srid thog ma med pa nas/ /'khor ba yi ni mthar thug par/ /de srid sems can phan pa nyid/ /sangs rgyas spyod pa bdag spyod shog /ji srid sangs rgyas sna tshogs rnams/ /'jig rten bshes gnyen mya ngan 'das/ /de yi bstan pa'i don du ni/ /

bskal pa'i bskal par byed par shog /rdo rje 'chang sogs gzugs kyis ni/ /bdag gis phyogs bcur sprul gyur cig /sngags kyi tshul gyis sems can rnams/ /de tshe bdag gis 'dul gyur cig /ting 'dzin las ni langs nas ni/ /lha yi nga rgyal dang

ldan pas/ /spyod yul sems tsam shes byas la/ /rang gi lha yi gzugs su dmigs/ /yang na spyod yul de dag nyid/ /rang rang dag bas gnas pa'o/ /so so rang rig chos nyid pas/ /rnam snang mdzad la sogs par snang / /yang na rdo rje 'dzin pa ste/ /rang

yid dga' bar byed pa'i phyir/ /dbugs rtog spangs nas rab bsgoms nas/ /gsang ba chen po mchod pa'o/ /rang gi kha zas za dus su/ /snying khar 'khor lo rab bsgoms la/ /bdud rtsi sha yi sbyor ba yis/ /gong ma lta bur sbyang byas te/ /de nyid gsum ni

po zhes bya ba ni byang chub chen po'i mtshan nyid dam par dngos po dang dngos po med pa rnam par spangs pa'i sems tsam ni 'dir gti mug ste/ chos thams cad grub pa med pa'i ngo bor gyur pa'o/ /de nyid kyi phyir/ /dngos po thams cad dang bral ba/ /phung po khams dang

skye ched dang / /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnams par spang / /chos bdag med pa mnyan nyid pas/ /rang sems gzod nas ma skyes pa/ /stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no/ /zhes gsungs pa yin no/ /de'i rig ni gti mug chen po'i rigs te/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku dang gsung

dang thugs dang rigs de las skyes pa rnams so/ /de'i mchog gi snying po'i snying po ni rigs kyi bdag po'i snying po'o/ /de bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi spyan sngar zhugs so zhes bya bar sbyar te/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po dang gcig tu gyur pa ste/ sku thams cad ni dkar po/ /

'di zhal dang po'ang dkar po'o/ /g.yas pa ni nag po'o/ /g.yon pa ni dmar po ste/ phyag g.yas pa na 'khor lo bsnams pa'o/ /spyan sngar zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'i shar phyogs kyi cha la bzhugs par gyur pa ste/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na rdo rje'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa'o/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ste/ de 'byung bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che 'byung ba'i rdo rje dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs pa'o/ /yid bzhin gyi

nor bu'i rigs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral ba'i mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi sngon gyi 'phen pa'i shugs kyis sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang chos dang mthun pa'i

phyir yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i sgrar brjod do/ /don de nyid kyi phyir/ /dngos po 'di dag ma skyes pas/ /chos dang chos nyid spangs pa ste/ /nam mkha' lta bur dag med pa/ /byang chub tshul 'di brtan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs pa yin no/ /de'i rig pa ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi sku dang

gsung dang thugs dang de'i rigs las skyes pa rnams so/ /rin chen dpal gyi phyag rgya chen po ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi phyag rgya chen po ste/ de dang gcig tu gyur pa nyid ni yang dag par sbyor ba'o/ /de nyid ni nam mkha'i gnas te nam mkha' la gnas pas na nam mkha'i gnas

zhes bya ste/ nam mkha' ltar gos pa med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la nam mkha'i gnas zhes zer te/ gang rin chen 'byung ldan gyi sbyor ba la gnas pas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par 'gyur bas na de ni nam mkha'i gnas zhes bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi sku thams

cad dang zhal dang po ni ser po'o/ /zhal g.yas pa ni nag po'o/ /g.yon pa ni dkar po ste/ phyag g.yas pa na rin po che bsnams te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas phyogs su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs so/ /yang bcom ldan 'das ji skad

gsungs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas snying po phyung ngo zhes bya bar sbyar te/ bsam pa dang bsam par bya ba gnyis su med pa so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod

chags chen po ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid do/ /de 'byung bar byed pa ni rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa ste/ /de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la snyoms par zhugs so/ /dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rdo rje chen po ni rdo rje 'dod

chags so/ /de'i rings ni snga ma bzhin no/ /'jig rten dbang phyug gi rig pa'i bdag po phyag rgya chen po ni 'od dpag med kyi phyag rgya chen po ste/ /sku thams cad dang zhal dang po ni dmar po/ /zhag g.yas pa ni nag po'o/ /g.yon pa ni dkar po ste/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag g.yas

pa na pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das snga ma bzhin du thams cad mdzad nas thugs las phyung ngo zhes bya bar sbyar te/ sems dang sems las byung ba gnyis su med pa'i bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad do/ /de nyid ni gdon

don brtson bya/ /de yan chad ni sngon du bsnyen pa bya ba'i cho ga rgyas par bshad zin to// //da ni slob ma rnams la dbang bskur ba'i cho ga bshad par bya'o/ /de la gang gis dbang bskur zhe na/ dang por zhugs dang dang po pa/ /thams cad

kun gyi slob dpon no/ /cung zad ye shes dbang gyur pa/ /nus dang ldan pa'i slob dpon no/ /ye shes dbang du gyur pa ni/ /sbyor ba rnyed pa'i slob dpon no/ /de rnams ci rigs mnyes byas nas/ /de yis dkyil 'khor brtsam pa'o/ /gang dag gi don du zhe na/ /dad ldan

gtong phod brtson 'grus ldan/ /snod rung srog la mi lta ba/ /tshe 'dir dngos grub thob 'dod pas/ /gnyis sam gsum gyi bar du zhus/ /sku gzugs bris dang lder so dang / /glegs bam rdo rje la sogs dang / /mchod rten la sogs gnas pa'i phyir/ /gnyis

sam gsum gyi bar du zhus/ /gang dag sdig pa'i las dbang gis/ /mngon du'am rmi lam dag tu ni/ /lha 'khrug pa yis mtshan ma mthong / /gnyis sam gsum gyi bar du zhus/ /mos dang brtan la dad pa can/ /gzhan la phan dga' mthong nas ni/ /ma zhus kyang ni

de bos la/ /phan 'dod phyir ni dkyil 'khor brtsam/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ /bum pa'i dbang gis rab sbyor bas/ /sa brgyad pa ru yang dag gnas/ /gang dag gsang ba'i dbang gis ni/ /dgu pa dang ni bcu par byed/ /shes rab ye shes dbang gis ni/ /rdo rje lta bur

rab gnas pa'i/ /'bras bu 'byung bar nus mthu ldan/ /dang po bzhi par shes par bya/ /rab gnas ma byas gzugs brnyan la/ /thal bar brlag kyang 'bras bu med/ /sngags dang bral ba'i sbyin sreg bzhin/ /lus nyon mongs pa kho nar zad/ /de bas ji srid

gnas pa'i bar/ /mchod pa'i rten du rung bya dang / /'khor los sgyur ba bzhin te dag /byin gyis brlab phyir brtsam pa'o/ /sngon bsags sdig pa dpag med rnams/ /skad cig gis ni zad byed pa/ /dkyil 'khor zhugs dang dbang bskur ba/ /de yis rab tu byed pa

nas/ /ye shes kyis kyang 'debs pa yi/ /cho ga zab mos sdig pa zad/ /mtshan ma'i 'bras bu mi 'byung zhing / /gong gi yon tan ldan par mdzad/ /thabs ji ltar zhe na/ bdag nyid chen po de la gong du smos pas zhu ba gsol ba dang / khyod kyis spro bya rnams

tshogs sam dri bar bya'o/ /des kyang kha cig ni tshogs/ kha cig ni ma tshogs zhes gsol nas/ 'dzab bzlas pa bya'o/ /'phral du dben par 'dug nas ni/ /lha yi 'khor lo bsgom byas la/ /tshogs 'phel bgegs ni zhi ba'i phyir/ /sngags kyi bzlas

brjod byas pa yin/ /de nyid gsum par yi ge gzhug /yang na dbyung ba bar du gzhug /sgrub pa de'am phreng sngags sam/ /rig pa dang bcas bzla bar bya/ /du ma rab tu bzla ba'am/ /'khor bdag 'bum ste rang lha'i 'bum/ /gzhan dag khri phrag bzla byas te/ /

bsam mam dngos su bka' thob bri/ /gsum pa bsrungs nas 'dzab bya ba/ /cho ga bzhin te rang gis sam/ /sbyor ba dag gis dag byas nas/ /ri mo'i dkyil 'khor bri ba brtsam/ /lha khang grang nga ma skyed tshal gyi/ /byang shar mtshams ni ji lta bar/ /shar dang byang du

dma' ba yi/ /mkhas pas sa ni btsal bar bya/ /der ni bcags nas sa brkos te/ /lhag 'gyur yang na rdzing 'dra ba/ /chus bkang mi g.yo g.yas su 'khyil/ /ma rung 'khyil ba'i phur bus gzhom/ /der ni sa bdag phyogs skyong ba/ /phyogs su bskyed

nas sngon bzhin du/ /gtor ma byin brlabs dbul byas nas/ /sa gsol byas nas gshegs su gsol/ /ting 'dzin rim pa gsum pos ni/ /dkyil 'khor la sogs sta gon nas/ /mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang ba dang / /gtor ma yon dang phyi mchod 'bul/ /

sbyin sreg gis ni tshim byas nas/ /gsol ba btab ste nam mkha' la/ /khung bu brko ba'i ched du yang / /byin gyis brlab phyir dgod par bya/ /las kyi rdo rje slob ma yis/ /lto 'phye brtags nas 'jor gyis klog /mgrin pa lte ba pus mo tsam/ /dngos grub

rim pas brko bar bya/ /tho bas bong ba dag dkrugs nas/ /zhib mor btags nas btsags nas su/ /shis pa'i phyir dang dge ba'i phyir/ /rin chen 'bru sman nang du gzhug /de sting sa gtsang gzhan las kyang / /stegs bu khru gang dpangs

brtsigs nas/ /dam tshig lnga yis rab byugs te/ /steng rgyan sogs pas mdzes par bya/ /rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor ram/ /yang na bgegs dgra'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /dbang bskur blangs nas bgegs kyi tshogs/ /bskrad pas nang nyid dag par bsam/ /

oM b+hu khaM gi sngags kyis ni/ /mkha' la ri rab bskyed par bya/ /hUM laM hUM zhes rdo rje'i bdag /sa gzhir byas nas brtan par bya/ /oM mi di na'i badzri b+ha ba ban+d+ha hUM/ sngon bzhin srung ba'i 'khor lo nas/ /rjes chags mtha' yi sbyor dang po/ /dkyil 'khor phyung ste mnyes

mdzad pa/ /dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog bdag nyid/ /'khor lo gong dang 'og las byed/ /las kyi rgyal mchog sbyor bdag nyid/ /de yi dbang phyug mgon po ni/ /ting 'dzin gsum gyi mchog gyur yin/ /dpa' bo rdo rje dril 'dzin pas/ /thams cad dang ni

bdag mnyam mo/ /rang bzhin gyis ni bdag dag go/ /rdo rje'i bdag nyid nga rgyal bskyed/ /'khor lo'i dbus su gnas pa la/ /rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa yi/ /rtag sogs las kyi rdo rje yis/ /mchod nas dkyil 'khor gsol ba gdab/ /de bzhin gshegs pa

kun zhi ba'i/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /chos kun bdag med pa yi chos/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /mtshan nyid med pa thams cad spangs/ /kun du bzang po sku yi mchog /dkyil 'khor

dam pa bshad du gsol/ /zhi ba'i chos mchog yang dag byung / /ye shes spyod yul rnam spyod pa/ /kun du bzang po gsung gi mchog/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /sems can kun gyi sems chen po/ /rang bzhin dag pas dri ma med/ /kun du bzang

po thugs kyi mchog /dkyil 'khor snying po bshad du gsol/ /mi bskyod rdo rje khros byas nas/ /ma dang Ta las rang gi mig/ /nyi zlar bskyed nas mig 'bras hUM/ /rdo rje las spros sprul par bya/ /rkang mthil haM las rdo rje bskyed/ /g.yas pa rdo rje g.yon pa dril/ /'gying

bag mche gtsigs hUM brjod cing / /phyogs kun 'bar bar blta bar bya/ /g.yas brkyang g.yon brkyang zlum po dang / /sa ga bzhi ste mi bskyod pa'i/ /rnal 'byor gyis ni phyogs bzhi ru/ /dang por rab tu brtsam pa'o/ /khro bo re res drug drug tu/ /phyogs bcu

rnams su brtsams byas pas/ /'khor los bgegs kyi tshogs rnams ni/ /bskrad par gdon mi za bar 'gyur/ /rus sbal stobs dang rdo rje gar dang rdo rje sgra/ /lcags kyu thabs dang ting 'dzin thabs dang mtha' yas thabs/ /gshin rje gshed kyi nga rgyal gyis

gnas nas/ /shar gyi phyogs su rnal 'byor pas bya'o/ /rdo rje gdengs pa dang ni rdo rje 'jigs su rung ba dang / /ral gri thabs dang phub kyi tshul dag dang / /rdo rje skyil krung rnam par rgyal ba'i thabs/ /shes rab mthar byed kyis ni lho phyogs brtsam/ /rdo rje 'joms tshul

dang ni rdo rje ro langs dang / /rdo rje thabs dang ma dung gi thabs dag dang / /pad+mo'i 'dug stangs gsus po che yi thabs/ /rta mgrin gyis ni nub kyi phyogs su brtsam/ /rkang pa ya gcig stangs dang rdo rje tho ba dang / /'khor lo'i thabs dang sems dba'i skyil krung dang / /sprin

sgra dang ni gzhu yi thabs dang ni/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pas byang phyogs nas brtsam mo/ /seng ge thabs dang rdo rje gdu bu dang / /ba dan thabs dang thag mdung bskor ba'i thabs/ /bzang po'i 'dug stangs phur bu brdung ba yi/ /shar lho'i mtshams su 'dod pa'i rgyal pos

brtsam/ /seng ge glal dang bud med sgyu 'phrul thabs/ /zhags pa'i thabs dang mchod sbyin pa yi thabs/ /tsog bu'i 'dug stangs dang ni ra ba'i thabs/ /lho nub mtshams nas dbyug pa sngon pos brtsam/ /rdo rje sgrog dang stobs po che gdengs dang / /pad+mo'i stabs dang

mtshon rtse gcig pa'i thabs/ /rtse ba'i thabs dang mtshams bcing pa yi thabs/ /nub byang mtshams dang stobs po ches brtsam mo/ /bung ba 'phur stabs zhal bzhir byin brlabs dang / /gtun shing thabs dang mda' 'phangs pa yi thabs/ /

dpa' bo 'dug stangs bkra shis rgyal mtshan stangs/ /byang shar mtshams nas mi g.yo mgon pos brtsam/ /rdo rje gsor ba dang ni rdo rje mche ba dang / /be con thabs dang thag pa'i 'khor lo'i thabs/ /phyir 'gyed pa dang phyogs bcing ba yi thabs/ /steng gi phyogs nas

'khor los sgyur bas brtsam/ /rdo rje sgeg pa dang ni rdo rje gad mo dang / /mi 'jigs ba yi thabs dang phyag 'tshal ba yi thabs/ /phur bus gnas lngar gdab dang mtshon cha lnga yi thabs/ /'og gi phyogs nas gnod mdzes kyis brtsam mo/ /de rnams kyis ni bgegs kyi tshogs/ /

ru tra'i bi bo sha na dang / /tshangs pa'i srin po gza' phur bu/ /gtso bo drug cu rtsa bzhi skrod/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bdag la gson/ /bdag ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin/ /bka' yi 'khor lo rab sbyor bas/ /gal te gang gis bdag

bka' 'goms/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i gzugs 'di yis/ /'dod gsum bskyed lus bshig byed de/ /'jigs par 'gyur gyi gzhan du min/ /bgegs bsal bya phyir phur bu yang / /stod ni khro bo smad zur gsum/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil par bsams nas su/ /dkyil 'khor

dbus su gdab par bya/ /oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ /sarba duSh+Tan phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya/ sarba pA paM phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badzra ka'i la ya/ badzra d+ha ro Adz+nyA pa ya ti/ kA ya wAka tsit+ta badzra kI la ya hUM phaT/ de las 'od zer 'khrugs shing 'bar/ /phyogs bcu bdud bcom slar

'dus nas/ /mtshams dang ra ba gur bcing bas/ /dkyil 'khor sa ni srung ba'o/ /sa gnon phyag rgyas sa la man na/ /sa yi lha mo bton gyur nas/ /me tog sogs pas mchod nas ni/ /sbran phyir gsol ba gdab par bya/ /skyob ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /spyod pa'i tshul

dang khyad par gyi/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ /lha mo khyod ni dpang por gsol/ /skyob pa shAkya seng ge yis/ /ji ltar bdud kyi stobs bcom pa/ /de ltar bdag gis bdud bcom nas/ /dkyil 'khor kun du bri bar bya/ /de skad gsol nas zhal gyis bzhes/ /de nyid

du ni thim par 'gyur/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bsang gtor sogs/ /byas nas de ru nyal bar bya/ /mtshan mo gnyis pa'i cha dang por/ /dri zhim sogs kyis rab bskus la/ /me tog sil ma la sogs bkram/ /tsan+dan mchog sogs maN+Dal bya/ /de ru ting nge 'dzin gsum

mam/ /yang na lhag par mos pa yis/ /rten dang bcas pa dam tshig gi / dkyil 'khor rab tu dgod par bya/ /de nas bdag nyid spro bskyed la/ /ye shes 'khor lo bkug nas ni/ /byin brlabs mchod dang bstod pa dang / /bdud rtsi myang bas mnyes par bya/ /bum pa

nag nog med pa la/ /mchu 'phyang zhabs ni brtan pa dang / /rdo rje'i chus byugs nyi shu gcig /yang na drug tu sta gon bya/ /mgul pa dar gyi cod pan mtshan/ /a mra la sogs kha rgyan can/ /spos bsreg dri zhim chu yis bkang / /rang rang sngags kyi bzlas pa'o/ /'bru

lnga sman lnga rin chen lnga/ /'khor lo dri chu yon snod bsdu/ /mtshan ma lnga yis brgyan pa yi/ /rnam rgyal bum pa bdag pos bzla/ /rdo rje pad+mas btsir nas su/ /me tog dkar po de ru gtor/ /bdag gis slob ma thams cad la/ /dbang bskur mdzod cig gsol ba

gdab/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil bzlas bum pa la/ /ku sha'i bem por bcas ba yis/ /bdag gis slob ma thams cad la/ /bgegs bzlog gsol zhes snyan gsan dbab/ /de rnams byin gyis brlabs byas la/ /thun gsum gtor ma phul nas kyang / /mchod bstod

bdud rtsi myang byas la/ /so so'i sngags kyis mnyes par bya/ /'khor lo sngon bzhin mchod byas la/ /lag par pog por thogs nas su/ /pus mo btsugs nas thal sbyar bas/ /dkyil 'khor sogs la snyan gsan dbab/ /bcom ldan mi bskyod rdo rje yi/ /rig

sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bdag gis snying rje'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /mgon po bri bar 'dod pa ste/ /slob ma rnams la phan phyir dang / /khyed la mchod pa'i don du ni/ /de bas bcom ldan gus bdag la/ /byin rlabs gnang bar mdzad

par rigs/ /dgongs shing bdag la sangs rgyas dang / /'gro ba'i 'khor lo don byed rnams/ /'bras gnas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /gang zhig gzhan yang sngags kyi lha/ /lha dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang / /'byung po byang chub ston pa rnams/ /sems can

bstan la mngon dga' ba'i/ /gang zhig rdo rje'i ming can rnams/ /che ge bdag ni rdo rje che/ /dkyil 'khor byang chub sems 'byung ba/ /ji ltar nyer spyod nus pa yis/ /'gro dag don du bri bar bya/ /slob ma dang bcas bdag la ni/ /thugs rjes nye bar bzung nas ni/ /

tshogs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor du/ /byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol/ /snyan gsan lan gsum du gsol nas/ /mchod pa la sogs rab sbyar nas/ /mtshams la sogs pa bcings nas ni/ /phyi rol byung nas slob ma gzung / /shes rab chen po

dga' chen po/ /nga rgyal med cing drin lan shes/ /rigs ldan yon tan dad pa che/ /gzugs mdog gzhon pas brgyan pa'o/ /gsang sngags kyi ni grub pa mchog /'dod pa rab tu ldan 'gyur na/ /dman pa'i rigs dang byad ngan dang / /yon tan med kyang gzung

bar bya/ /slob dang yid ches dad ldan dang / /theg chen dga' ba'i bdag nyid dang / /dkyil 'khor mthong dang sngags 'grub 'dod/ /tshogs 'phel phyir ni 'khor lor gzung / /snod ldan 'khor ni bzhi po dang / /'di dang pha rol bsod nams 'dod/ /snod dang snod

min rab bsgrags la/ /bdag nyid rang gi nang du 'gro/ /ting 'dzin rdo rje chu skyes kyis/ /sbyang ba'i slob mas khang pa'i sgor/ /thal mo sbyar ba byas nas ni/ /tshig 'dis gsol ba lan gsum gdab/ /ston chen khyod la bdag dga' bo/ /brtan po byang chub chen po'i

lam/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'dod de/ /de nyid dam tshig bdag la stsol/ /bdag la byang chub sems kyang stsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang / /skyabs su 'gro ba bdag la stsol/ /thar chen khang pa brtsegs pa ru/ /mgon pos bdag ni gzhug par

mdzod/ /de ltar brjod pas bla ma yi/ /slob ma gcig ni gtsor byas nas/ /de sogs rnams la tshig 'di yis/ /gzhug phyir brod pa bskyed par bya/ /bu tshur shog cig theg chen gyi/ /cho ga sngags kyi spyod pa'i tshul/ /khyod la yang dag bstan par bya/ /tshul chen

khyed kyis bsten par gyis/ /sangs rgyas dus gsum las byung ba/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /gzhal med ye shes thob pa ni/ /rdo rje sngags kyi don bsgom yin/ /ci phyir dpag med sngags rnal 'byor/ /shAkya seng ge sogs rab kyis/ /drag po chen po

bdud kyi tshogs/ /dpung chen de dag gzhom byas nas/ /'jig rten rjes 'jug rtogs nas su/ /'khor lo bskor nas mya ngan 'das/ /de phyir blo ldan bu khyod kyis/ /thams cad mkhyen pa thob par gyis/ /de ltar bgyi zhes der 'dug nas/ /bla mas tshig gis

byang chub sems/ /ma bskyed pa ni bskyed par bya/ /bskyed pa yin na 'phel bar bya/ /sdig pa bshags pa rjes yi rang / /bsngo dang gsol ba skyabs 'gro dang / /byang chub sems bskyed lam bstan dang / smon lam gdab pa sngon 'gro bya/ /'khyil bzlas bsrungs nas

gnas gsum du/ /'khor lo rdo rje pad+ma las/ /oM hUM AHni bkab byas la/ /rdo rje khu tshur dri chus byug /spyi bor me tog mdun du spos/ /mar me dri ni snying ga ru/ /las kun byed pa'i sngags bzlas nas/ /mchod pa'i don du sbyin par bya/ /a shwat+tha dang u dum

pAr/ /me tog rtse mo sor bcu gnyis/ /drang po dri zhim gyis byugs pa/ /dngos grub ltas phyir sbyin par bya/ /ha cang ring min thung ba min/ /ku sha sngon po 'bus ma zos/ /rmi lam mi 'khrug bkra shis phyir/ /nyag ma gnyis ni par bya/ /sum bsgril mdud

skyes pa'o/ /gtan tshigs de nyid kyi phyir/ stong ba nyid kyi rang bzhin no/ /zhes bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so zhes bya bar sbyar ro/ /mi zad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba ni sems dang sems las byung ba rnams rtag tu ro gcig par gnas pa ni

mi zad pa'o/ /de nyid mi phyed pas na rdo rje ste/ /de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la ni mi zad pa'i rdo rje zhes bya'o/ /dngos po 'di rnams ma skyes pas/ /zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa'i phung po la sogs pa dang / mi bskyod pa'i rigs kyi ngo bo nyid do/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos dang chos nyid

med pa ste/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ gang gi phyir shes rab kyi stos kyis rnam par brtags par gyur na chos rnams dmigs su med de/ /des na de rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang tha snyad tsam ste rdzas su med do/ /chos rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du tshul ji ltar blta zhe na/ de'i phyir/ nam

mkha' lta bur bdag med pa/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ ji ltar nam mkha' ni rdzas thams cad kyi dngos po'i ngo bo nyid med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang bdag med par blta bar bya'o zhes dpes nye bar bstan pa yin no/ /byang chub tshul zhes bya ba ji skad bstan pa'i byang chub kyi sems la

thos pa dang bsam pa dang bsgom pa'i rang bzhin gyi shes rab ni byang chub kyi tshul yin bas byang chub kyi tshul te/ des byang chub thob par 'gyur bas na byang chub kyi tshul zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rigs kyi ngo bo nyid do/ /de rnams kyi bdag med pa

ni ji skad du bshad pa nyid do/ /de nyid rdo rje ste/ de la dmigs pas mid de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la snyoms par zhugs te bzhugs pa'o/ /chos rnams thams cad dngos med cing / /zhes bya ba ni phung po la sogs pa dang yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rigs so/ /chos kyi

mtshan nyid rnam par spangs/ /zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa'i chos rnams kyi rigs bskyed pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid ni chos kyi mtshan nyid de/ de ltar bu'i chos kyi mtshan nyid de spangs pas don dam par ni chos rnams kyi skye ba'i rgyu med pas na skye ba med pa'o/ /skye ba med par

gyur pa de nyid kyi phyir dge slong dag gsum po 'di dag ni 'dus byas rnams kyi 'dus byas pa'i mtshan nyid yin no/ /gsum po gang zhe na/ skye bar yang shes par bya'o/ /'jig par yang shes par bya'o/ /gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba yang shes par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni chos kyi mtshan nyid de/

chos rnams med pa'i phyir de med de/ /mo gsham bu sngo bsangs sam dkar po zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang 'dra'o/ /des na/ /chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam par spangs/ /zhes bya'o/ /'on rigs ji ltar skyed par byed ce na/ bdag med chos las kun du 'byung / /zhes gsungs te/ bdag med

pa ni bshad zin to/ /de las kun du 'byung bas na/ /bdag med chos las kun du 'byung / /zhes bya'o/ /'di skad ston par 'gyur te/ gang dang gang gi gzugs kyis ni/ /sems can rnams ni gdul 'gyur ba/ /de dang de yi gzugs kyis ni/ /de'i don byab rdzogs par mdzad/ /

ces bya ba ni mtshan nyid 'di lta bu'i sngon 'phen pa'i shugs dang ldan zhing dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos bdag med pa las kun du 'bung bas na de'i ske ba de yang sgyu ma lta bu 'khul pa tsam mo/ /de yang / rtag tu dri med thugs rje'i shugs las byung / /smon lam grub pa mi

'gag chos nyid can/ /'gro ba'i don sgrub lhur mdzad mtha' yas pa/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang / /zhes ji skad gsungs pa lta bu'o/ /'od zer 'bar ba rdo rje sgron ma zhes bya ba ni ye shes nyid sgron ma lta bu ste/ ye shes kyi snang ba nyon mongs pa'i mun nag thams cad

dang bral ba so sor rtog pa'i ye shes ni ye shes kyi sgron ma'o/ /de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni ye shes sgron ma'i rdo rje zhes bya ste de la snyoms par zhugs pa'o/ /ma skyes pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad zin to/ /nam mkha'i gnas su sbyor ba yis/ /zhes bya ba ni rdzas thams

cad dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid de bzhin nyid ni nam mkha'o/ /de nyid na gnas te gzhir gyur pa so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi lam gyi rnam blta bu gang yin pa de ni nam mkha'i gnas su spyor pa yin zhes bya'o/ /de ltar zhes bya ba'i sgra ni nges bar gzung ba'o/ /dngos po ni 'dod chags kyi rigs dang

bdag nyid mi bskyod shar bltas nas/ /slob ma snang mdzad bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /lte bar khu tshur g.yon bzung nas/ /nam mkha'i thig ni ma lus gdab/ /nam mkha' la gnas de bzhin gshegs/ /sems can don byed dus bab pas/ /gnas 'dir

byon pa'i don ched du/ /thig gi sgra yis bskul bar bya/ /oM badzra sa ma ya sU tra mA ti ya ma hUM/ gnod sbyin gshin rje brgya byin glu/ /phyogs su kha bltas phyogs bzhir gdab/ /me mtshams bden bral mtshams gnas nas/ /grwa yi thig ni rab tu gdab/ /de nas tshangs

thig sogs gcig tu/ /sum char byas la mtha' gnyis dor/ /dang po cha bzhir rab byas la/ /de yi dang po cha gnyis so/ /de yi gnyis pa gnyis pa bya/ /re re yang ni gnyis gnyis so/ /gsum pa'i dang pos cha chung gnyis/ /de nas yang ni cha chung gcig /de nas

cha chung gnyis dor nas/ /cha chen gcig ni dor byas nas/ /cha chung gcig ni bcad pa'o/ /yang ni gnyis dor gcig bcad do/ /gnyis dor gcig bcad de steng du/ /cha chung gnyis ni dor bar bya/ /de nas cha chen gsum ni bcad/ /de steng cha chung gsum dor nas/ /

yang ni cha chung gsum dor bya/ /lhag ma cha chung gcig lus pa'o/ /de nas thig skud gnyis 'gyur byas/ /tsan+dan phur bus dbus su gzugs/ /yang ni rang gi ra ba dang / /phyi rol ra ba kun bskor bya/ /cha chen lnga ni rab bskor na/ /nang gi rdo rje ra ba ste/ /lha yi gnas

la cha chung lnga/ /byas pa'i phyed gnyis ka bar 'gyur/ /phyi yi 'khor lo cha brgyad la/ /cha gcig sgo yi dbus bya'o/ /de tshad lha yi snam bu ste/ /de phyed 'khor sa chung ngu'o/ /de yi tshad kyi kha khyer sa/ /dra ba dra ba phyed pa dang / /phreng bshal 'phyang ba'i snam bu dang / /de bzhin 'gram pa

gshog pa'o/ /logs kyi phyi rol ya phugs te/ /de ltar ka ba la yang ngo / /de phyed rin chen pha gu dang / /tshon sna lnga yi sa mnyam mo/ /de bzhin 'khor lo ka sogs dang / /rdo rje ra ba'ang de bzhin no/ /ya phugs steng du cha chen gsum/ /ta ra Na yi sa ru 'gyur/ /cha chung drug la

pad+ma dang / /rdo rje ra ba bskor bar bya/ /cha chen gcig ni 'od dkyil 'khor/ /bskor nas gcig ni nye 'khor las/ /ltas ngan gyis ni 'grub mi 'gyur/ /thig skud chad na slob dpon 'chi/ /lhag chad byung na 'bras sogs 'byung / /phyogs 'khrul slob ma smyo bar 'gyur/ /gru bzhi

sgo bzhi rta babs bzhis/ /brgyan cing dar sham me tog dang / /'phan dang rgyal mtshan ba dan gyis/ /brgyan pa'i 'khor lo mthong bar bya/ /grwa yi cha ni thams cad dang / /sgo yi zur kun cha la yang / /zla ba rin chen rdo rje dgod/ /gam pa'i ri sogs rab brgyan pa/ /chos kyi 'khor lo

ri dwags gnyis/ /'phan sogs kyis brgyan twa ra Na/ /ji ltar mdzes shing bklubs par bya/ /sems can rnams kyi bsam dbang gi/ /'di ni thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bas/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyud 'di ru/ /khru ni bcu gnyis nyid du gsungs/ /de la khru bcu gnyis ni byang chub

kyi sems la dga' ba'i rdo rje sgeg mo dang / gzugs dang yon tan gyi rdo rje phreng ba ma dang / chos 'chad pa'i rang bzhin rdo rje glu ma dang / sems can thams cad kyi don byed pa'i rdo rje gar ma dang / grags pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rdo rje bdug pa ma dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gi rdo rje me tog ma

dang / 'gro ba gzhan dga' bar byed pa'i rdo rje mar me ma dang / tshul khrims la sogs pa'i rdo rje dri chab ma dang / sbyin pa'i rang bzhin rdo rje kyo ba ma dang / snyan par smra ba'i rang bzhin rdo rje gsol ka ma dang / don mthun pa'i rang bzhin rdo rje pho nya ma dang / don spyod pa'i rang bzhin rdo rje 'bebs

pa ma ste/ de rnams rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no/ /de bzhin du sku'i dkyil 'khor la khru bcu drug tu gsungs pa ni/ byang chub kyi sems brtan par byed pa'i rang bzhin rdo rje sems dpa' dang / thams cad 'gugs nus pa'i rang bzhin rdo rje rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad mnyes par byed pa'i yon tan rdo rje chags pa dang / gzi brjid bstod cing dga' ba'i yon tan rdo rje legs pa dang / chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba'i rdo rje rin chen dang / /gzi brjid gzhan las 'phags pa'i yon tan rdo rje gzi brjid dang / re ba yongs su rdzogs pa'i yon tan rdo rje

dpal rab dang /[ {]mdzum [,]'dzum [}]pas lung ston pa'i yon tan rdo rje bzhad pa dang / chos la dmigs shing so sor rtog pa'i yon tan rdo rje chos rab dang / sgrib pa yongs su gcod pa'i yon tan rdo rje rnon po dang / sku gsung thugs zad mi shes par kun la khyab pa'i yon

tan rdo rje rgyu dang / gzhung gi chos rab tu sgrogs pa'i yon tan rdo rje smra ba dang / sems can smin pa dang grol bar byed pa'i yon tan rdo rje las rab dang / mi 'jigs pa sbyin zhing srung ba'i rang bzhin rdo rje srung ba dang / gdul dka' 'dul bar byed pa'i yon tan rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje gsum

bsdus shing dbyer med pa'i yon tan rdo rje sdud pa ste/ de rnams rnam par dag pa'o/ /gsung gi dkyil 'khor la khru nyi shu gsungs pa ni/ de rnams dang rdo rje'i rigs rnams sdud cing dam tshig gi phyag rgya byin gyis rlob pa'i yon tan sems ma rdo rje ma dang / rin po che'i rigs sdud cing dbang

bskur ba'i byin gyis rlob pa'i rang bzhin yon tan rin chen rdo rje ma dang / pad+ma'i rigs sdud cing chos kyi phyag rgya byin gyis rlob pa'i yon tan chos kyi rdo rje ma dang / las kyi rigs sdud cing las kyi phyag rgya byin gyis rlob pa'i yon tan las kyi rdo rje ma ste/ de rnams rnam par dag pa'o/ /ci'i phyir

zhe na/ de rnams sa bcu rnam par dag pa ste/ sa bcu ni ye shes lnga'i rten du gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /ji skad du gsang ba'i thig le nor bu'i rgyud phyi ma las/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /lam rnams dag ste rim pa bzhin/ /bcu gnyis bcu drug nyi shu ru/ /ye shes la ni ye shes

gnas/ /thos dang bsam pa ngo bo ni/ /kyo ba la sogs rang bzhin no/ /shes rab brtson 'grus ting nge 'dzin/ /thar chags sdug pa la sogs so/ /drod la sogs pa dang por sbyor/ /sgeg mo la sogs ngo bo'o/ /lhag ma nyi shu gnyis gnyis kyang / /sa re ru ni rnam dag pas/ /

ye shes rten du yang dag mtshams/ /stegs bu 'di yang 'khor lo yi/ /rten du yang dag gyur pas na/ /rnam par dag pa mngon du bya'o/ /zhes so/ /mdor na zab gsal gnyis med las/ /grub pa'i khyad par 'byung bas na/ /rigs dang tshad sogs nges med pas/ /khru gang

nas brtsams stong phrag brgya/ /rin chen lnga yi phye ma'am/ /yang na 'byung khungs nas 'byung dang / /sA lu btags pa'i phye ma la/ /snga ma'i rim bzhin 'khor los dbab/ /bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs brjod de/ /gser sogs snod du bdug pa bsreg /gsal bar bsams

nas gsang sngags 'dis/ /mngon par bzlas pa rab tu bya/ /badzra tsi tra sa ma ya hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis zhugs nas su/ /chos dbyings kyis ni 'di nyid dag /sems can dbyings ni rab sgrol mdzad/ /rgyal ba'i mchog ni mi bskyod mgon/ /bde bar gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /

skyon kun las ni grol bar mos/ /bla mas g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis/ /dbang ldan mtshams nas phyi rol nas/ /ri mo lnga ni bri ba'o/ /dkar po ser po dmar po dang / /ljang khu nag po nang du'o/ /g.yas su bskor cing chad med pas/ /rdul tshon ri mo bri ba'o/ /sbom por bris na

nad 'byung ste/ /phra bas nor zad 'khyog 'thab 'byung / /chad na slob ma bla ma 'chi/ /de bas phyogs kun mnyam par 'gyur/ /g.yas skor tshul du mi 'debs na/ /tshon la phur bus gdab par bya/ /rdo rje rtse mo gnyis dkar mo/ /gzhan ni ser por shes par bya/ /pad+ma rA ga 'dra ba

gzhan/ /ma ra ga ta lta bu ste/ /dbus ma nag por shes byas nas/ /tshom gyi rim pa de ltar ro/ /shar gyi phyogs su dkar po che/ /lho ser nub dmar byang ljang khu/ /dbus ma'i cha phyogs ra bas bskor/ /in+d+ra nI la'i kha dog go/ /de dus rlung dang sbrul sogs sprul/ /bgegs

dgra'i phyag rgya dran byas nas/ /sdang ba'i dgra yi sngags rgyal 'di/ /brjod pas de dag sel bar bya/ /na maHsa man+ta kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badzra NAM/ na mo badzra kro d+hA ya/ ma hA daMSh+ToT ka Ta b+hai ra ba ya a si mu sa la pa ra shu pA sha ha stA ya/ oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li kha kha khA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/

ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ gardza gardza/ bi spo Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ sarba big+h+nan bi nA ya ka/ ma hA ga Na pa ti/ dza'i ban+ti ka ra ya hUM phaT/ de ltar rdul tshon btab gyur nas/ /pad+ma'i gdan la nyi ma dang / /zla ba rab tu bkod byas nas/ /mtshan ma'i phyag rgya dgod pa'o/ /dbus

su rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ /in+d+ra nI la'i kha dog 'dra/ /shar du lce brgyad 'khor lo ni/ /zla ba lta bu'i 'od zer dang / /lho ru rin chen zur dgu pa/ /margad lta bu'i 'od zer ldan/ /nub tu pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa/ /dmar po 'od zer dang ldan pa/ /byang du ral gri rin chen yu/ /

sngon po 'od zer dang ldan pa'o/ /me mtshams spyan ni sngon po'o/ /bden bral mtshams su rdo rje bri/ /rlung mtshams pad+ma sdong bur bcas/ /dbang ldan ut+pal ljang ser can/ /phyi rol me mtshams la sogs dang / /shar sgo g.yas g.yon gru gnyis la/ /me long pi wang dung dang snod/ /gos

dang chos kyi 'byung gnas bri/ /tho ba 'bar ba shar sgor bri/ /rdo rje dbyug pa lho sgor bri/ /pad+ma nub kyi sgo ru bri/ /rdo rje kha bye byang du bri/ /shes rab thabs su rab ldan pas/ /rtag tu mnyam par gzhag ste bya/ /rang rang gi ni ngo bo rnams/ /'phro ba'i sngags kyis gdab par bya/ /de nas lha

rnams gnas bya'i phyir/ /sme sha can gyi bdag nyid che/ /bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis pa/ /mA ma kI ru byin gyis brlabs/ /gnyis sbyor rjes su chags bskyed nas/ /sangs rgyas rang gi nang du gzhug /cho ga gsum gyis bsgrub byas nas/ /bzhi pas gnyis su med par bya/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i sgra

yis ni/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rnam par dgug /bskrad nas srung bya sngon bzhin du/ /mchod yon la sogs dbul bar bya/ /mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang byas nas/ /shes rab mthar byed kyis gzhug dang / /bcings te dga' byas nyer sgrub dang / /sgrub pa dbang bskur gyis

mtshan pa'o/ /sngon bzhin mchod pa yang byas te/ /de bzhin bstod dang bdud rtsi myang / /gsal bar bsgoms nas bzlas brjod dang / /reg pa'i mchod pas mnyes bya'o/ /de bzhin phyi yi dri la sogs/ /sngags dang phyag rgya dang ldan pas/ /rang gi sa bon las sprul te/ /'khor lo yang

dag mchod pa'o/ /'di ni yang dag bdug pa ste/ /rang bzhin dang ni sbyar ba'i dri/ /bdag gis dbul ba 'di bzhes la/ /bdag la bka' drin stsal du gsol/ /badzra d+hUp+pe pU dza s+pha ra Na/ sna tshogs me tog yid 'ong ba/ /rab tu yid 'ong 'bar ba yi/ /byang chub yan lag me tog 'di/

bdag la brtser dgongs bzhes su gsol/ /badzra puSh+pe pU dza s+pha ra Na/ ting 'dzin mar me dge ba 'di/ /sreg byed ngan 'gro 'jigs las skyob/ /lha yi spyan ni thob byed pa/ /bdag la brtser dgongs bzhes su gsol/ /badzra a lo ke pU dza spa ra Na/ ga pur la sogs byug pa

ni/ /dri zhim la sogs me tog rgyan/ /hUM dbyangs snyan par rol 'byung 'di/ /bdag la brtser dgongs bzhes su gsol/ /badzra gan+d+he pU dza s+pha ra Na/ sna tshogs bza' ba yid 'ong ba/ /bza' dang bcas dang bldag dang gzhib/ /yid 'ong gdung ba sel ba 'di/ /bdag la brtser

dgongs bzhes su gsol/ /badzra nai bi t+ye pU dza s+pha ra Na/ sna tshogs btung ba yid 'ong ba/ /'bru yi chang dang bcos pa'i chang / /myos byed bdud rtsi dpa' bo 'di/ /bdag la brtser dgongs bzhes su gsol/ /badzra su ra pU dza s+pha ra Na/ rin chen ri'am rgya mtsho rin chen rnams/ /bzhad

dang sgeg dga' rol dang bde ba dang / /dpag bsam shing dang na bza' shing rnams kun/ /'khor lo bla mar bcas la dbul bar bya/ /bo d+hi rat+na a la ka ra/ sa ha la se ra ti kri ha sau khya a nut+ta ra/ a nut+ta ra bo d+h+yaM laM ka ra bas+t+ra pU dza me g+ha sa mu tra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM zhes dbul lo/ /bsrungs

nas phyi rol byung nas kyang / /phyogs skyong rang rang rnal 'byor gnas/ /sdig med sha khrag chu zan gyi/ /gtor ma phul nas nang du 'gro/ /'di ni gzhan du bshad pas der shes par bya'o/ /gos dang rgyan gyis rab brgyan te/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad bdag bsgyur la/ /dkyil 'khor bskor

ba yang byas te/ /phyag 'tshal me tog sngon po dor/ /bdag pos bcing bsams mgo ru bcings/ /de yi gong 'og cho ga rnams/ /rnam par dag par 'gyur bas na/ /dag pa'i dag pa rnam dag pa'o/ /de nas lha rnams tshim bya'i phyir/ /thab la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i/ /

sbyin sreg gnas su song nas kyang / /sbyor ba ldan pas mnyes par bya/ /'di'i cho ga yang gzhan du bshad pas der shes par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor mchod pa yang byas te/ /shis pa'i phyir na bkra shis glu/ /'khor lo bskor nas bdag nyid kyis/ /pheg rdob pa yi gar gyis

kyang / /hUM hUM 'khor ba 'don byed sku 'dzin pa/ /gnyis gnyis 'khyud pa'i sbyor ba'i mchog /mi bskyod rdo rje khyod 'ba' zhig /te na hUM te na hUM te na te te hUM/ khyod kyi zhabs kyi pad+ma la/ /lha dang mi yis 'dud pa'i mchog /sprul pa'i me tog sna tshogs dang / /mi

bskyod rdo rje khyod 'ba' zhig /te na hUM te na hUM te na te te hUM/ dngos po rnam grol rnam par bsnyen/ /gsang ba'i gsang ba 'dzin pa khyod/ /bdud rtsi mtha' med gsol ba khyod/ /khyod kyi dgongs pa pad rgyas yin/ /te na hUM te na hUM te na te te hUM/ rtsom spangs sems can don mdzad pa/ /rgyu med

gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /te na hUM te na hUM te na te te hUM/ dung dang ku mu ta yi gzugs/ /rgya mtsho dngas ma zla gzugs 'dra/ /te na hUM te na hUM te na te te hUM/ rol pa gnyis med rnal 'byor mdzad/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya 'dzin/ /te na hUM te na hUM te na te te hUM/ sgyu 'phrul las kyi 'gro ba bzung / /rkyen

gyis ma byas gzugs can yin/ /te na hUM te na hUM te na te te hUM/ de nas 'og nas 'byung ba'i rim/ /bdag nyid zhugs byas lha yis kyang / /chu nas bka' stsal bar gyi dbang / /bskur bsams 'khor lo de la ni/ /slob ma rnams ni gzhug pa'i phyir/ /rdo rje 'chang ba las byung ba'i/ /

dkyil 'khor rten dang bcas pa yi/ /de bzhin nyid ni lan gsum brjod/ /nam mkha' las byung mtshan ldan phyir/ /thog ma tha ma med pa'i sems/ /rdo rje sems dpa' che rang bzhin/ /mi bskyod rdo rje deng grub shog /mchog chen dngos grub thams cad dang / /dbang phyug rdo rje 'dzin

pa'i lha/ /thams cad rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gzugs/ /dam pa'i yi ge grub par shog /skyon med rtag pa la sogs pa/ /'dod chags kun la rjes su chags/ /'dod chags chen po dga' ba che/ /de nyid bcom ldan bdag la grub/ /gtan du dag pa kun gyi mchog /gdod ma

nas grol de bzhin gshegs/ /kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub bo/ /dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog /dbang phyug chen po'i phyag rgya yis/ /rdo rje snying gtso bdag la ni/ /rdo rje sngags chen grub par shog /sems can kun gyi yid khyab pa/ /

sems can kun gyi snying la gnas/ /sems can kun gyi de bzhin pha/ /dam tshig mchog gi 'dod pa'i mchog /bden pa gang gis ye shes kyi/ /shes rab thabs dag dkyil 'khor ni/ /mgon po khyod kyi bden pa des/ /bdag gis 'dod pa yongs su skongs/ /gzugs brnyan

dang ni mnyam pa'i chos/ /dag cing dang ba rnyog med pa/ /gzung med brjod du med pa yang / /rgyu dang rkyen la kun du byung / /de nyid de nyid bskyed pa ni/ /de dag bden pas dkyil 'khor la/ /gzugs brnyan gsal bar slob pa ni/ /sdig med pas ni blta bar bgyi/ /thun mong sdom

pa dang ldan pa/ /bsnyen sgrub gsum gyis bsgrubs nas su/ /yol bas bar du bcad pa la/ /'khyil bzlas chu yis gtor bar bya/ /dmar po sham gyis gdong g.yogs nas/ /dga' ba khyod gang yin zhes dri/ /dga' ba skal ldan bdag yin zhes/ /'jug pa po yis smra

bar bya/ /de nas me tog snyim bkang nas/ /'khor los bzhes zhes gtor nas ni/ /gtong sems bskyed nas bla ma la/ /yon ni rab tu dbul bar bya/ /yul mkhar khyim dang glang po rta/ /bran dang bran mo chung ma drug /bu mo shin tu yid 'ong dang / /gang gis rang gi lus 'di yang / /

deng nas brtsams te dbul par bya/ /ci yi phyir ni dbul bya na/ /slob dpon du ni nyer gnas phyir/ /snying rje chen pos nyer gnas phyir/ /sems can thams cad skyob don du/ /bdag gi lus 'di dbul bar bgyi/ /hUM gis snying kar rdo rje bsgom/ /oM sarba yo ga tsit+ta ut+pA da ya mi/

su ra ta s+t+waM sid+d+hi badzra ya thA su khaM/ brjod pas byang chub sems bskyed la/ /lus kyi 'khor lo bskul bar bya/ /de ring khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro/ /khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi gsang chen 'di/ /dkyil 'khor du ma

zhugs pa rnams kyi mdun du smra bar mi bya'o/ /dad par mi byed pa yang mi rung ngo / /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'am/ /a khaM bI ra hUM brjod nas/ /drangs nas 'jug pa'i sgor gnas te/ /snga ma'i sdom pa brtan par bya/ /de ring khyod de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyi rigs la rab tu chud do/ /de bas ngas khyod la rdo rje ye shes bskyed par bya'o/ /ye shes de khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob na/ /dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de'i thabs 'di khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong

ba rnams kyi mdun du ma smra shig /khyod dam tshig las 'da' bar mi rung ba'i phyir ro/ /snying gar rdo rje bzhag nas ni/ /de ring rdo rje sems dpa' nyid/ /khyod kyi snying la yang dag gnas/ /gal te tshul 'di 'das na ni/ /snying 'gas sdug bsngal de ltar 'byung / /badzra sa twa hUM/ pad+ma'i ban+d+har

bdud rtsi lnga/ /yi ge gsum gyis 'bar byas la/ /rdo rje yis ni de yi khar/ /mi ldog phyir ni blud par bya/ /'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam las 'da' na sreg par byed/ /dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub pa'i/ /bdud rtsi rdo rje chu 'thung shig /badzro da ka Tha/ de nas de yis mi 'gyur byas/ /sems

g.yo dogs phyir bstan pa yi/ /dam bcas 'di ni bla ma yis/ /lan gsum du ni bsgrags par bya/ /de ring phyin chad khyod kyis phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyi/ ngas ci smras pa'i bya ba thams cad khyod kyis bya dgos so/ /khyod kyis bdag la brnyas par mi rung ste/ /brnyas na ya nga ba ma spangs pas shi

ba'i dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bas ma 'gro shig /de nas slob ma de yis kyang / /brtan nas rang nyid dag bya'i phyir/ /gsol ba gdab pa 'di yi mchog /smros shig ces ni bla mas smras/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la rdo rje sems dpa' bdag

cag la dbab du gsol lo/ /de yi snying ga ru ni hUM/ /laM byung dbang chen dbus su bsam/ /mgrin par a ni baM byung ba'i/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor dbus su bsam/ /spyi bor haM ni dkar po che/ /yaM byung rlung dbus bsams nas ni/ /skul byed dz+haiM ni rkang mthil gnyis/ /rlung gis

bskyod pas 'bar byas dbab/ /oM A be+e sha ya staM b+ha ya ra ra ra ra tsa la ya tsa la ya/ hUM a ha dz+hai/ rdo rje dril bu sgra dang bcas/ /'jigs rung gar gyis smin ring bskyod/ /mig bgrad so gtsigs bzhad byed pas/ /slob ma dbab pa rab tu bya/ /lce la thig le'i yi ge AH/ /bsams nas

bzlas shing dge mi dge / bru hi badzra zhes brjod nas/ /dbab pa brtan par bya ba'o/ /pra ti badzra ho brjod la/ /me tog dkyil 'khor dor du gzhug /de yis bcings par rab bsams la/ /blangs nas mgo ru bcing bar bya/ /'di ni stobs chen sems dpa' bas/ /'di yi ma

'dres so sor zung / /phyag mtshan nye'am mi nye ba/ /re'u cha'i gnas las shes par bya'o/ /yang na rang gi skal ba yis/ /gdong phye me tog de la gtor/ /mig gnyis oM 'bar bsams nas ni/ /gdong phye las kyi kha dog bstan/ /de ring rdo rje sems dpa' nyid/ /nan tan byas

te khyod mig phye/ /bla na med pa'i rdo rjes mig /thams cad la ni mig phye 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor gtso bo nas brtsams nas/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil par bstan pa'am/ /yang na bdud rtsi 'khyil pa las/ /gtso bo'i bar du bstan bya'o/ /slob mas thal mo sbyar byas la/ /rdo rje dkyil

'khor chen po yi/ /dkyil 'khor nyid du bdag zhugs so/ /sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yi/ /dkyil 'khor de ring bdag gis mthong / /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yi/ /dkyil 'khor du ni bdag dbang bskur/ /de skad lan gsum brjod par bya/ /bum pa rnams chu

gcig tu byas/ /mi bskyod rdo rje rab bskyed la/ /zhugs nas slob ma'i mgo bo ru/ /'khor los sgyur bzhin dbang bskur bya/ /rin chen la sogs dbu rgyan la/ /rin chen 'byung ldan gyur byas te/ /dbus su rang gi lha bzhag pas/ /cod pan dang ldan dbang bskur bya/ /rdo rje rtse mo dgu

lnga pa/ /'od dpag med bsgoms yongs gyur te/ /byin nas snying gar de bzung ba/ /rdo rje'i dbang ni bskur bar bya/ /dril bu don yod grub pa ru/ /bsgoms nas yongs gyur byin nas ni/ /rdo rje dril bu la 'khyud tshul/ /bdag por dbang ni bskur bar bya/ /spyi gtsug ltag pa la

bcug ste/ /spyi bor phyag reg ming gi dbang / /che ge rdo rje zhes bos nas/ /khyad par gzhan yang mthong bar bya/ /gang gang snang ba kun bdag ste/ /de yi gtso bo mi bskyod mgon/ /chos rnams rang bzhin gyis dag pas/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge tshul/ /kun gyi gtso bo yin pa'i

phyir/ /ming gong dpal gyi sgra gzhug bya/ /go ba nyid du bsgrags pa'i phyir/ /dang po kye sbyor mtha' yi bar/ /hUM bskyed rdo rje lag byin nas/ /'chang bas rdo rje lan gsum gsor/ /brtul zhugs 'di ni dang po ru/ /rnal 'byor pa yis blang bar bya/ /

'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na gnas/ /rtag par khyod kyis kyang bzung ste/ /lag na rdo rje brtul zhugs brtan/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badzra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e Sha twaM d+ha ra ya mi/ hi hi hi hi hUM/ de yi de nyid bshad par bya/ /sngon mtha' med pa'i

sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun du bzang po kun gyi bdag /rdo rje snying po'i gtso bo'i gtso/ /a las byung ba'i dril bu ni/ /lag g.yon byin nas phyogs brgyad dkrol/ /brtul zhugs 'di yang dang po ru/ /de yi grogs su sbyin pa'o/ /'di ni

sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /shes rab dbyangs chen 'khrol bar 'dod/ /rtag par khyod kyis kyang bzung ste/ /rgyal ba byang chub mchog tu 'dod/ /de nyid bshad par bya ba ni/ /'di ni khyod kyis dkrol bya ste/ /srid pa rang bzhin gyis dag phyir/ /rang bzhin gyis ni 'byung bar byed/ /

rang bzhin dag pas sems can kun/ /dam pa'i srid pa byed pa po/ /slob ma rdo rje dbyings phyug dang / /ldan par bsams nas bcom ldan 'das/ /mngon byed 'das pa mchog 'di yis/ /phyag rgya'i dam tshig sbyin pa'o/ /phyag rgya chen po'i byin brlabs te/ /snying po bsnyen pa la sogs

grags/ /dam tshig 'dod gzugs sogs rnams kyis/ /sngags ni dbugs su rtogs nas bzla/ /rang gi rang bzhin de rnams kyis/ /phyogs bcu dus gsum khyab pa yi/ /ma lus gtso bo mchod byas nas/ /bdag dang gzhan yang mnyes par bya/ /dka' thub dam bcas de dag

gis/ /bstan par byas kyang 'grub pa med/ /mi snang mngon shes mkha' 'gro med/ /sku gsung thugs las grub skyes so/ /de bas sangs rgyas sems can rnams/ /sngags kyi spyod pa mchog bzung ste/ /'dod pa kun la longs spyod pas/ /chos kyi yi ge mchog thob 'gyur/ /

bde sdug gnyis med bdag nyid kyis/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga bsten te/ /chags chen ye shes don sbyor na/ /de kho na nyid kun kyang 'grub/ /sku gsung thugs grub yang dag ste/ /gang gzhan dman pa yang skye 'dod/ /de yang sku gsung thugs bsgoms nas/ /sngags bzlas

pa yis 'grub pa'o/ /thun mong ma yin sdom par ldan/ /sbyor ba ma nyams yon phul nas/ /rdo rje slob dpon dbang nod phyir/ /de yis lan gsum gsol ba gdab/ /byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la/ /mchod chen ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/ /bdag kyang rab tu bsgral ba'i phyir/ /

nam mkha' rdo rje bdag la stsol/ /'jug pa'i sgo ru khru do bar/ /pad+ma dkar po 'dab brgyad la/ /sa bon gyis mtshan dbang stegs bri/ /seng ge mtshan par 'dug tu gzhug /de nyid ting 'dzin gsum ldan par/ /byas nas bla ma'i lus dkyil 'khor/ /sangs rgyas sogs spro

rnam dgug cing / /nam mkha'i khams kun dga' bar bya/ /de yis rnga dril sil snyen dang / /rgyal mtshan 'phen sogs pheg rdob cing / /bum pa gtso sogs gzung byas nas/ /sngon bzhin chu sogs dbang bskur bsam/ /dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ni/ /khams gsum kun gyis

phyag byas pa/ /gsang gsum gnas las byung ba yi/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis sbyin pa yin/ /de skad lan gsum brjod nas su/ /dge ba'i phyir dang shis pa'i phyir/ /bum pa spyi bor rab bzung ste/ /bkra shis dbyangs 'di brjod par bya/ /dpal ldan gser gyi ri bo ltar 'bar ba/ /

'jig rten gsum mgon dri ma gsum dang bral/ /bcom ldan pad rgyas lta bu'i spyan mnga' ba/ /bkra shis des ni deng khyod zhi byed shog /de yis bstan pa'i dri med mchog rab ni/ /'jig rten gsum grags lha dang mis mchod pa/ /cho ga skye dgu rnams ni zhi bar byed/ /bkra shis gnyis

pa deng 'dir khyed la shog /dam pa'i chos ldan thos gang bkra shis shing / /dge 'dun lha dang lha mi'i mchod 'os pa/ /ngo mtshar dpal rab mchog rab tshogs rnams kyi/ /bkra shis gsum pa deng 'dir khyed la shog /de nas de dag thams cad kun/ /ye shes ngo bor zhugs bsams

pas/ /dbu rgyan ye shes sems dpa' bskyed/ /bskor byas slob dpon gnas par bya/ /sngon bzhin mchod dang bstod pa dang / /bdud rtsi myang ba yang byas nas/ /dkyil 'khor de bzhin nyid bstan bya/ /sangs rgyas ma rgyas mnyam pa'i phyir/ /gru bzhi

ru ni rab tu bstan/ /dran pa nyer bzhag shar gyi sgo/ /yang dag spong ba lho yi sgo/ /rdzu 'phrul rkang pa nub kyi sgo/ /dbang po stobs ni byang gi sgo/ /bsam gtan bzhi ni twa ra Na/ /ting 'dzin rnams ni kha khyer brgyad/ /gzungs rnams der gnas lha mo'o/ /bsam pa bskang phyir

lha tshogs rgyan/ /gsung rab yan lag 'phags sogs so/ /byang chub yan lag dra ba sogs/ /rnam par thar brgyad ka ba brgyad/ /sngags tshul rdo rje phreng ba zlum/ /phyi logs rnam dag yon tan lnga/ /dri med stobs sogs mchod pa lnga/ /bum pa chus gang thugs rje dang / /

tshogs rdzogs ser po ye shes gter/ /'gro ba rnams dang dbyer med kyang / /de yi nyes pas mi gos phyir/ /sna tshogs pad+ma bcu dgu ni/ /sdong bu dang ni bcas pa'o/ /mi dge 'dam rdzab skam mdzad phyir/ /dge ba'i myu gu gso mdzad pa/ /nyi ma'i gdan ni bdun rnams so/ /nyon

mongs tsha ba bsil byed dang / /ma rig mun nag sel ba'i phyir/ /zla ba bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'o/ /tshor ba gsob la sogs pa dang / /'ju ba la sogs dus bcu gnyis/ /zad dus sgron bdun rnam dag pas/ /grangs ni nges par bstan pa'o/ /nyon mongs thams cad las grol

phyir/ /gzhal yas khang du btags pa yin/ /snying po la ni 'dus pa'i phyir/ /dkyil 'khor zhes su bshad pa yin/ /rnam par shes pa zhe sdang thugs/ /chos dbyings rnam dag mi bskyod pa/ /gzugs phung gti mug che dang sku/ /me long rnam dag rnam snang mdzad/ /tshor ba'i

phung po mnyam pa nyid/ /nga rgyal rnam dag rin chen 'byung / /'du shes phung po 'dod chags gsum/ /so sor rtog pa snang mtha' yas/ /'du byed phung po nan tan dang / /phrag dog rnam dag don yod grub/ /sa dang stong nyid thabs dang ni/ /snying rje zhi byed spyan ma'o/ /byams dang mtshan med

smon lam dang / /chu khams srung byed mA ma kI/ /dga' dang smon med stobs dang ni/ /me khams rgyas byed na bza' dkar/ /btang snyoms ye shes rang bzhin gsal/ /rlung khams sgrol byed sgrol ma'o/ /sbyin pa rnam dag gzugs rdo rje/ /tshul khrims rnam dag sgra rdo rje/ /bzod

pa rnam dag dri rdo rje/ /brtson 'grus rnam dag ro rdo rje/ /bsam gtan rnam dag reg rdo rje/ /shes rab rnam dag chos rdo rje/ /phyi yi longs spyod kyis mchod phyir/ /dbyung sngags ting 'dzin gsungs pa'o/ /mi la sogs pa rnam dag phyir/ /de nyid du ni bkod par gsungs/ /dbyung

sngags ting 'dzin ma gsungs pas/ /sa snying la sogs phyir mi dgod/ /'jigs sogs shes bya phung po'i bdud/ /dad dag gshin rje gshed 'gugs pa/ /nyon mongs de bdud mthar 'dzin lha/ /brtson dag 'jug byed shes mthar byed/ /skye sgrib 'chi bdag log par lta/ /

dran dag 'ching byed rta mgrin no/ /las dang lha bdud mchog 'dzin lha/ /ting 'dzin mgu mdzad bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /chos dang longs spyod sprul pa dang / /ngo bo nyid de rnam bzhi ni/ /thugs sogs rdo rje ye shes sems/ /phyag rgya bzhi zhes bshad pa yin/ /rnam par rtog pa dang bral

phyir/ /gting dpag dka' bas zab mo ste/ /phyag rgya chen por rab snang ba/ /rang bzhin smin byed gsal ba po/ /zab mo dang ni yang dag gsal/ /shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid de/ /mtha' gnyis skyon ni rab bkag pas/ /dus thams cad du dbyer med do/ /de bzhin slob

ma dbang bskur dang / /dngos grub sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi/ /sgrub pa'i thabs ni rab bstan pas/ /gang zag gnyis su shes par byed/ /gzugs brnyan glegs bam la sogs pa/ /yod na khyod kyis rab gnas mdzod/ /de ni ji srid bar du ni/ /sems can don du 'gyur

ba'o/ /de ltar lung bstan dbugs dbyung dang / /bka' stsal pa yis dbang bskur nas/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa kun bstan te/ /bka' lung g.yar gyi blang ba'o/ /bum pa'i dbang gi cho ga'o/ /lo 'am yang na zla ba ru/ /rig dang slob dpon dbang thob pas/ /lus dang

zang zing thabs dang bcas/ /spyod pa mchog gis bla ma bkur/ /rin chen sna bdun la sogs pa/ /rjes su mthun pa dbul bya ste/ /bla ma dgyes par byed pa'i ched/ /bu mo gzhon nu gzugs bzang ba/ /rgyan ldan dam sdom dbang bcas pa/ /lus rgyas

mdzes pa dbul byas nas/ /bla ma'i g.yon du bu mo bzhag /rgyal po mu stegs chom rkun gyis/ /gnod med dben pa'i sa phyogs su/ /mchog gi dris byugs pad sogs gdan/ /bla re rgyal mtshan sogs kyis bklubs/ /rol mo sil snyan sna tshogs sgras/ /gong gi

'khor ram yang na sku/ /tshogs kyi mchod pa chen po yis/ /dbyer med 'khor lo mchod byas nas/ /me tog snyim bkang gsol ba gdab/ /kun mkhyen ye shes phung po sogs/ /pus btsugs thal sbyar mgrin dma' bas/ /gsang ba mchog gi sdom pa che/ /yang dag

blangs nas bsrung bar bya/ /ji ltar dbang bskur sogs tshul gyis/ /sangs rgyas la sogs thob pa bzhin/ /byang chub spyod pa gzhan gyis ni/ /'dul ba'i dge ba de bzhin med/ /de bas dam tshig bus srungs shig /rtag tu sdom pa yang skyongs shig /sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga

bza' ste/ /de las gzhan yang dam tshig srungs/ /dkon mchog bla ma brnyas byed gzhom/ /gzhan gyi bud med spyad pa dang / /ma byin par yang blangs byas nas/ /brdzun gyi tshig kyang smra bar bya/ /rnal 'byor rgyud las gsungs pa bzhin/ /de ni cho ga bzhin du srungs/ /de ltar bya'o

zhes gsol nas/ /yang na me tog phreng ba gtor/ /thal mo sbyar nas gsang ba yi/ /dbang nod phyir ni gsol ba gdab/ /rdo rje sems khyod la sogs pa/ /tshigs bcad lnga yis lan gsum du/ /zhugs nas slob ma dam pa ni/ /mdzes pa'i chas ldan gyis bya'o/ /de nas bla

ma yon tan mtsho/ /mchog gi mchog gis de gsan nas/ /zhal ni mdangs dang ldan byas nas/ /snying rje de la bskyed par bya/ /gzugs sogs phun sum tshogs ldan pa'i/ /lha mo de ni byin brlabs nas/ /thub pa'i dbang po zhugs byas nas/ /rdo rje nang du gnas par bya/ /mthe

bo srin lag gis bkab nas/ /slob ma dpal ldan snang mdzad khar/ /spro ba'i sngags kyis phab nas su/ /gnyi gas 'di ni brjod par bya/ /a ho a ho su kha ho/ /gzhan yang blo yi bye brag gis/ /dbang bskur byas nas mgrin pa ru/ /de nyid myong bar byas nas su/ /de
