nas 'di yis bsngags pa'o/ /de 'di rdo rje thams cad kyi/ /dbang bskur mchog tu bsngags pa ste/ /thams cad sngags ni 'grub 'gyur te/ /las mchog khyad par can yang 'grub/ /zla ba za ba rab byung ba/ /lung bstan dbugs dbyung bka' stsal pa/ /'og nas 'byung

bzhin sbyin par bya/ /rdo rje bzlas pas phyi nang tshogs/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu la sogs pa'i/ /'dod don phyag mtshan mdog dang dbyibs/ /bsam mi khyab pa'i rnam smin sku/ /bsgom pa la gnas de bsgom gzhug /gsang ba'i dbang gi cho ga'o/ /de bzhin gong ma'i rim pa yis/ /

mtshan dang ldan pa'i rig pa che/ /btsal te bla ma dag la yon/ /rjes mthun dang bcas dbul bar bya/ /sngon bzhin gsol btab sdom pa blangs/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /nyan thos rang rgyal de bzhin te/ /sku gsung thugs su sbyor ba na/ /phyag 'tshal na ni ma rung

'gyur/ /kun du rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /lus ngag yid kyi dkyil 'khor la/ /bsam gtan rdo rje gsum sbyor bas/ /sngags zlos pas ni bsam gtan bya/ /mdor na sems can thams cad ni/ /bsam gtan rdo rje bskul bar bya/ /de 'di rdo rje thams cad kyi/ /dam chos rab tu

bstan pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor dag kyang yang mi bri/ /glegs bam bklag par mi bya zhing / /mchod rten dag gi las mi bya/ /rdo rje gsum mchog phyag mi bya/ /gal te byang chub mchog 'dod na/ /lag pa'i phyag rgya mi bcing ngo / /de ltar bya zhes gsol bar bya/ /yang ni me tog gtor

byas nas/ /mchod sbyin rdo rje la sogs pa'i/ /tshigs bcad lan gsum gsol btab nas/ /shes rab ye shes yang dag blang / /de nas lha mo bdag nyid dang / /dam tshig sdom pa'i mchog smras nas/ /bde chen za ma tog gi ni/ /lha mo'i bsngags pa rab tu brjod/ /de dag

mdun du gnas pa'i lag /g.yas g.yon 'og dang steng bzhag nas/ /byin gyis brlabs pa'i lha mo 'di/ /sngags 'di yis ni sbyin par bya/ /yid 'ong gzugs ma 'di nyid ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod du gnang / /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rim pa yis/ /

dam pa'i bde ba khyod kyis myong / /de nas rab mnyam bzhag pa yis/ /dal ba'i bya ba rnam gsum gyis/ /rdo rje skyil krung nang du sems/ /rin chen dkyil du rtogs pa bya/ /rang gi lha yi 'khor lor ldan/ /dbyings kyi dbang phyug dang 'brel pa/ /yol bas bcad de bde myong la/ /

sngon bzhin dbang bskur byas nas thim/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga badzra swA b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ gti mug rang bzhin gti mug sbyor/ /gti mug dga' dang yang dag ldan/ /gti mug rgyun gyis dbang bskur na/ /gti mug rdo rje'i bdag nyid 'gyur/ /zhe sdang rang bzhin zhe sdang sbyor/ /

zhe sdang dga' ma dang ldan par/ /zhe sdang rgyun gyis dbang bskur na/ /zhe sdang rdo rje'i bdag nyid 'gyur/ /'dod chags rang bzhin 'dod chags sbyor/ /'dod chags dga' dang yang dag ldan/ /'dod chags rgyun gyis dbang bskur na/ /'dod chags rdo rje'i bdag nyid 'gyur/ /

shes rab ye shes bdag sbyar na/ /rdo rje dga' ma dang ldan par/ /ye shes rgyun gyis dbang bskur na/ /shes rab ye shes bdag nyid 'gyur/ /shes rab ye shes so/ /de nas bla mas g.yon pa yi/ /phyag ni slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag /de bzhin gshegs kun dpang byas la/ /

rig pa'i brtul zhugs sbyin pa'o/ /thabs gzhan gyis ni sangs mi rgya/ /de bas rig ma 'di ni mchog /chos kun gnyis su med pa la/ /gnyis kyis rnam par mtshon pa yin/ /de bas rtag tu 'khor ba ru/ /khyed kyis 'bral bar ma byed cig /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /

rig pa'i brtul zhugs bla na med/ /blun chen gang zhig 'da' byed na/ /mchog gi dngos grub de la med/ /de ltar de bzhin gzhir yang /sngon bzhin gnyis ni rgyas btab pas/ /gsal zhing rab dga' mkha' 'dra ba'i/ /man ngag tu ni de nyid brtag /bla ma de bzhin

gshegs gyur na/ /snying gar khu tshur chos gos g.yon/ /g.yas pas mchog sbyin phyag rgya bya/ /bdag nyid bzhengs nas lung ston bya/ /oM khyod la bdag gis lung 'di ston/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /srid pa'i ngan 'gro thar byas nas/ /yang dag srid pa

grub pa'i phyir/ /sa bla sa steng sa 'og tu/ /kye rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba/ /rang byung rang nyid grub gyur cig /sngags pa gang la lung 'di bstan/ /de ni 'gro ba kun gyi gtso/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub la/ /bde gshegs kun gyis lung bstan yin/ /lung bstan pa'o/ /ji

ltar dbang bskur thob pa yis/ /slob mas yon tan brjod par mos/ /dam tshig gsum gyis dbugs phyung nas/ /'di yis bsngags pa brjod pa'o/ /dam tshig gsang chen dkyil 'khor la/ /rab tu zhugs nas mthong bas na/ /khyod ni sdig pa kun las grol/ /de ring shin tu

kho nar gnas/ /bde chen theg pa 'di la ni/ /phyin chad shi ba yong med de/ /mi thub mi shigs gzhan gyis kyang / /rol zhing 'jigs par ga la 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal srid las mya ngan 'das/ /srid pa gtan du dag pa'i phyir/ /yang dag 'byung ba ston pa'i mchog /srid pa

gtan du dngos grub po/ /dngos grub dam tshig sdom pa 'di/ /rig ma rtag tu bsrung bar bya/ /dam pa'i shes rab bstan pa ni/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par gsungs/ /byang chub sems ni spang mi bya/ /gang zhig rdo rje phyag rgya zhes/ /de ni bskyed pa tsam gyis kyang / /sangs rgyas

nyid du the tshom med/ /dam pa'i chos ni smad mi bya/ /ma rig pa dang gti mug gis/ /de ni bor bar mi bya'o/ /rang bdag yongs su spangs pa dang / /dka' thub sdug bsngal gzir mi bya/ /ji ltar bde ba 'di bzung nas/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas pa 'di las 'byung / /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag

rgya rnams/ /nam yang spang bar byar mi rung / /bla ma sangs rgyas dang mnyam phyir/ /rdo rje slob dpon smad mi bya/ /de ni sangs rgyas kun mnyam phyir/ /slob dpon la ni smod byed na/ /sangs rgyas thams cad smad pa yin/ /des ni rtag tu sdug bsngal thob/ /rims dang 'or dang dug dang nad/ /mkha'

'gros gtses dang bzung ba dang / /bgegs dang tshogs bdag drag po yis/ /bsad nas dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de bas nan tan thams cad kyis/ /mchog gi dge ba mngon 'gyur ba'i/ /rdo rje slob dpon bla chen la/ /nam yang brnyas par byar mi rung / /

gus pas bla ma yon du ni/ /rjes su 'thad pas dbul bar bya/ /des ni rims nad la sogs pa/ /phyi nas 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu rang gi dam tshig bsgrub/ /rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mchod/ /rtag tu bla ma la yang dbul/ /sangs rgyas kun dang de mnyam phyir/ /de byin

sangs rgyas thams cad la/ /rtag tu byin pa nyid du 'gyur/ /de byin bsod nams tshogs yin pas/ /tshogs la byang chub mchog tu 'gyur/ /ci phyir shin tu 'dir gnas pas/ /khyed kyi tshe 'di 'bras bur bcas/ /dam tshig lha dang mnyam pa ru/ /gnas par the tshom med pa'o/ /rdo rje

dang bcas sangs rgyas kyis/ /de ring khyed rnams dbang bskur bas/ /rgyal po chen po khams gsum na/ /rgyal po gtso bo brtan par 'gyur/ /de ring bdud rnams rnam bcom nas/ /gzhal yas khang mchog du chud phyir/ /sangs rgyas nyid phyir de kho nar/ /khyab bdag gis ni

the tshom med/ /rab tu dang ba'i yid kyis ni/ /rdo rje de dag kun mdzod cig /zad med rang gi dam tshig bde/ /bde bar sems bskyed la bsnyen cing / /myur bar 'gro ba'i bde chu ru/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra ba yi/ /mnyam pa de ru gyur nas su/ /khyod rnams de la 'gro bar shog/ /

dbugs dbyung ba'o/ /de nas slob mas phyag 'tshal te/ /bla ma'i zhabs kyi bka' drin gyis/ /sogs pa'i tshig gis thams cad kun/ /gnang ba'i dbang ni blang bar bya/ /ji lta ji ltar 'dul 'gyur ba/ /sems can rang bzhin du 'gro bgyis/ /de lta de ltar sems can don/ /'dod

chags la sogs dag par bya/ /nyin re yi ni mtshams gsum la/ /ting 'dzin gsum gyi sbyor ldan ni/ /bsgrubs nas sgrub pa thun mong dang / /cig shos dngos grub bsgrub par bya/ /mi snang stong ni chung ngu la/ /mngon shes nyi stong bar ma la/ /rig 'dzin dag ni stong gsum

la/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa 'gro kun gtso/ /zhi ba rgyas pa sogs las gang / /de las gzhan nam gang 'dod la/ /dkyil 'khor kun du chags sbyor na/ /bsgrub pa myur du 'grub par 'ong / /rdo rje bdag po thams cad kyis/ /'dod chags de nyid don bsams te/ /sems can thams

cad phan byed pa'i/ /byang chub 'dod chags las skyes mdzad/ /de bas byang chub 'dod bsngags pas/ /sku gsung thugs ni bsgom byas te/ /cho ga bzhin du las byed na/ /de kun rtogs par 'gyur ba yin/ /de dag byang chub thob 'dod kun/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis

thams cad dbul/ /gang zhig phongs pas yid mi bde/ /dad pa'i mchog ldan de yin no/ /bka' stsal pa'i dbang ngo / /dad pa mchog tu gus ldan pas/ /bla ma'i zhabs ni spyi bor blang / /ji ltar rje btsun bka' stsal ltar/ /de ltar bya zhes spyan sngar gsol/ /bkra

shis smon lam dang ldan par/ /yang dag gnas par gyur cig brjod/ /snod rung byas pa'i slob ma la/ /bla ma shin tu dgyes pa na/ /de dag kun las gsang ba dang / /rab gsang shin tu gsang ba yi/ /bsgrags min mna' yis btab byas nas/ /som nyi med par bshad

par bya/ /'byor ldan slob ma kun tshogs nas/ /sbyin sreg gnas su gnas byas nas/ /bla ma slob ma sbyor bar ldan/ /mar la sogs pa rgya chen rnams/ /slob mas g.yon pa'i mthe bong ni/ /bla ma'i g.yas pa'i mthe bong dang / /gung mo yis ni gzung byas nas/ /sdig pa

rnams ni zhi bar bya/ /de bzhin de ru sa bdag dang / /phyogs skyong rgyal po la sogs pa/ /zhi bar bya phyir bdun nam ni/ /yang na gsum mam gcig tu bya'o/ /bdag nyid bshad dang nyan pa dang / /bsam dang bsgom dang dngos grub bsgrub/ /tha na 'jig rten las grub dang / /khyod kyis

grogs ni mdzod cig ces/ /gsol ba btab nas gshegs su gsol/ /sngon bzhin mchod pa thams cad dang / /glu gar sil snyan la sogs dang / /bza' dang btung ba'i mchog rnams kyis/ /bdag gzhan 'khor lo mnyes par bya/ /de nas pog snod lag thogs te/ /

dril bu gsil nas pus mo btsugs/ /ye shes 'khor lo thams cad kun/ /sngags 'dis gshegs su gsol ba'o/ /oM sems can kun don mdzad nas su/ /dngos grub stsal te rigs pa bzhin/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs su gsol/ /

yang ni 'byon par mdzod cig muH/ /de bzhin oM dang AH dang hUM/ /brjod pas ting 'dzin 'khor lo rnams/ /rdo rje gsum la bsdu byas nas/ /de yang nam mkha' lta bur mos/ /oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM/ Ad+ya nu t+pa n+na t+w+'+ta oM AHhUM swA hA zhes brjod pas/ gzugs brnyan

stong pa nyid dmigs la/ /snod gtsang ma ru bsdus nas su/ /'dod pa la ni nyung shas sbyin/ /lhag ma chu yi skye bo sogs/ /phan phyir gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / /'phan sogs sil snyan rab ldan pa/ /dge 'dun tshogs kyis bteg nas su/ /chu bo chen por blug par bya/ /

rdo rje rtse mos ri mo dbyi/ /bum pa bla re la sogs pa/ /spyad rung bla mas blang bya ste/ /lhag ma gong bzhin dor bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor 'di ru gzugs brnyan dang / /glegs bam la sogs rab gnas kyi/ /cho ga bya ba gzhan du bshad/ /mkhas pa rnams kyi der shes bya/ /'di ni

dang po rnal 'byor pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga dang por gsungs/ /gzhan du khyad par ma gtogs pa/ /cho ga rgyas par 'dir shes bya/ /cung zad ye shes dbang thob pas/ /'bebs pa'i cho gas bri bar gsungs/ /khams gsum skye bos smon 'dzugs phyir/ /rnam pa gzhan du

mi bya'o/ /ri rtse nyams ni dga' ba dang / /nags tshal rab tu dben pa'am/ /mchod rten kun dga' ra ba sogs/ /dgon pa'i gnas su spyad bya'o/ /bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis ma/ /de bzhin bcu gnyis lon pa'i khye'u/ /cho rigs btsun zhing drang por skyes/ /rma sogs spangs

dang bzhin mdzes shing / /so yi thags bzang rab gtsang ba/ /skra gnag mig dkyus ring ba dang / /rang bzhin dul ba rig pa che/ /bzung nas dbab par rab tu brtag /de la gong du smos pa dang / /snod rung sogs kyis zhus nas su/ /de rnams don du tshogs skyed phyir/ /rnam par

dag pa'i bzlas pa bya/ /de bzhin sa btsal la sogs nas/ /sbran pa'i cho ga'i bar byas nas/ /lha dang bum pa sems can rnams/ /sta gon du ni gnas par bya/ /thig skud rdul tshon byin brlabs na/ /gong gsungs snod ni khrus byas te/ /gos dang rgyan gyis rab bklubs te/ /ri ska

la sogs kyis bdug bya/ /de yi gnas gsum snga ma bzhin/ /dbang chen chu dang rlung dkyil 'khor/ /yi ge gsum gyi byin brlabs la/ /rkang mthil gnyis su skul byed pa/ /rlung gis sbar bas sdig pa bsreg /ye shes yang dag dbab pa'i phyir/ /rigs gsum bdag

nyid rdo rje dril/ /'jigs rung gar dang bcas pa yis/ /de yi snying ga phye byas nas/ /chu dang mar bzhin ro gcig gyur/ /gzi byin la sogs ldan gyur na/ /babs pa'i rtags kyis shes par bya/ /spyan dang rnam par snang mdzad zhugs/ /khru gang tsam mam khru do'am/ /khru lnga

tsam mam brgyad tsam du/ /'jigs shing skrag tshul 'bar bar 'gyur/ /snang ba mtha' yas gos dkar zhugs/ /phreng ba'i sngags dang dbyung ba'i sngags/ /de bzhin snying po rig pa sogs/ /ma bslabs par yang brjod par 'gyur/ /mi bskyod mA ma kI babs pas/ /'das

dang ma 'ongs dus dag gi/ /ji ltar byung 'byung dngos po rnams/ /skad cig gis ni yang dag ston/ /de nas sngags kyis bstan par bya/ /de gnyis bla ma slob ma'i tshul/ /thig 'debs dang ni tshon 'gyed dang / /phyag rgya'am sku sogs 'god par byed/ /de nas mdun du 'dug byas

nas/ /ji ltar bgyi zhes bka' nod byed/ /mchod pa sna tshogs rab byas la/ /ye shes lha ni gshegs su gsol/ /snod gnyis zas dang skom rnams dang / /yon gyis mnyes par byas nas su/ /grangs lhag rung bar bya ba ste/ /rang gi gnas su gtang bya'o/ /de nas 'khor lo

gnas bsam dang / /mchod dang zhugs dang dbang bskur ba/ /bsdu ba dang po rnal 'byor bzhin/ /cho ga rgyas par bya ba'o/ /'di'am gong du slob ma'am/ /gzhan don rab tu bya ba'i phyir/ /bri ba'i gsung gi cho ga ni/ /gzhan du bshad pas der shes bya/ /'di ni cung zad dbang gyur

pa'i/ /bri ba'i cho ga gsungs pa'o/ /sgrub pa la yang ri mo ni/ /tshul 'di dang ni mtshungs zhes bya/ /ye shes dbang sgyur rnal 'byor pas/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog las rgyal mchog /rdzogs pa'i bsam gtan

gyis bsgrub bya/ /bla ma'i man ngag rab thob cing / /sbyor shes de dag lhur len pa/ /rtags shes dang po pha rol phyin/ /yul la zhen pa dang bral ba'i/ /bdag nyid chen po nyag gcig des/ /de 'dra'i sa bcu mgon po che/ /rang gi nus pa dang phrad pa/ /mnyes bya de yis yang dag

blang / /me tog la sogs mchod pa'i tshogs/ /phyi rol nang du bcas sngon song / /thal sbyar pus mo btsugs nas ni/ /bla chen de la gsol ba btab/ /'jig rten sgron mchog rnal 'byor kun la 'phags/ /khyod ni skyon rnams dag pa'i pha rol phyin/ /srid pa'i mtsho las

sems can kun sgrol ba/ /ded dpon chen po khyed la skyabs su mchi/ /bdag cag thabs bral 'khor bar 'khyams gyur te/ /ma rig mun pas bsgribs pas dmus long gyur/ /sdug bsngal gyis gzir yang dag don ma rnyed/ /bdag nyid chen po khyod kyis bskyab tu gsol/ /

de skad gsol nas de yi tshe/ /bla ma bdag nyid chen po des/ /snying rje chen po rab bskyed nas/ /tshig 'dis gnang ba sbyin pa'o/ /bu tshur shog cig bsam gtan gyi/ /'khor lo chen po nga yis bstan/ /khyod kyis kyang ni mnyam zhog la/ /nga yi bkod pa lta bar gyis/ /de skad

gsol nas bsam gtan gyi/ /dkyil 'khor rim pa 'di yis bsgom/ /lhun gyis grub pa'i sbyor ba ni/ /skad cig ye shes kyis rdzogs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas 'khor lo sbyar ba yis/ /bsam gtan 'khor lo rab rdzogs bya/ /ye shes 'khor lo bsam gtan gyis/ /'khor

lo can kun mngon sum zhugs/ /gong gsungs mchod pa'i cho ga ni/ /bsam gtan ldan pas mnyes par bya/ /de nyid brjod pas 'khor lo bskul/ /zhugs sogs gong bzhin rab byas te/ /ye shes dbab pa sngon 'gro ba'i/ /mthong ba'i yul bzhin rnam par gnas/ /

ye shes kyi ni 'khor lo la/ /gnyis med 'khor lo gzhug par bya/ /de nas byin gyis brlabs brjod la/ /sa bcu'i mgon po'i dkyil 'khor la/ /dngos grub rtags ni shes bya'i phyir/ /me tog 'dod par bya ba ste/ /sku'am dbus su nub gyur na/ /phyag rgya chen po bsgrub

par bya/ /zhal gyi dkyil 'khor la babs na/ /sngags kyi dngos grub thob par bshad/ /lte ba'i dbus su rab babs na/ /thun mong dngos grub brgyad 'grub bo/ /sku smad cha ni gar 'bab kyang / /zhi sogs dngos grub 'byung ba'o/ /ring zhing thal bas dngos grub kyang / /da dung

rgyang ring 'gyur ba'o/ /phyag rgya chen po ji lta bzhin/ /bsgrub pas ji bzhin dus thob bo/ /ye shes babs pa'i mthu nyid kyis/ /dman mchog gsum dang rang gi las/ /ji skad bshad bzhin gyis rab thob/ /de las gzhan pa ji snyed pa/ /bla ma'i ye shes stobs kyis ni/ /sbyar

ba yis ni rnyed pa'o/ /de nas mkha' dbyings thams cad kun/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /rig pa'i lha mo khro bo tshogs/ /chu sogs rkyen bzung gang bar bsams/ /de dag kun gyis bum pa dang / /gsang dang shes rab ye shes dang / /brtul zhugs lung

bstan dbugs dbyung dang / /bka' stsal pa rnams rim bzhin dbang / /de yis de yi byang chub ni/ /sku gsung thugs kyi byang chub che/ /sems can thams cad phan 'dod pas/ /ngo mtshar chen po rab tu grub/ /bsam gtan dkyil 'khor bsam gtan gyis/ /mchod dang

dbang bskur de bzhin du/ /byas nas gzhan la 'ga' yi don/ /bsgrub phyir lung 'di bsgo ba'o/ /nga yis khyed ni dkyil 'khor du/ /bcug zin dbang bskur yang zin gyis/ /khyod kyis slob dpon sgrub po las/ /'dod bzhin du ni gyis shig ces/ /gnang nas bsnyen la

sogs pa la/ /'jug par gang yin 'gyur ba ste/ /de yis kyang ni khyod shes bya/ /bsam gtan 'khor los sbyang phyir ro/ /gnyis pa de ru 'jug mi nus/ /mthong ba'i yul la mngon zhen zhing / /blo gros ngan zhing sbyor ba spangs/ /dad ldan snod rung de mthong nas/ /don rnams

yal bar mi 'dor phyir/ /snying rje chen po rab bskyed nas/ /dag sogs cho ga sngon 'gro ba'i/ /phyi yi bya ba bsten bya ste/ /ye shes cung zad dbang gyur ltar/ /ri mo'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /dbang bskur yang dag brtsam bya ste/ /gnyis med man

ngag gis sbyang bya/ /de bzhin sku sogs 'khor lo la/ /cho ga sngon bzhin rgyas bya ste/ kun khyab chos kyi dbyings ye shes/ /thams cad de ru rnam dag pas/ /bde gshegs gnas su mi bskyod dgod/ /gzhan gyi gnas su gzhan bkod de/ /gnyis shes rdo rje mtshon la sogs/ /

khyad par gzhan yang rtogs par bya/ /rdo rje slob dpon slob ma sogs/ /gong dang 'og gi cho ga rnams/ /sems kyi 'ba' zhig gtso bor gsungs/ /dman pa las ni mchog mi 'gyur/ /sems nyid glang po yan lta bu/ /gzugs la sogs la 'phyan byed pas/ /ngan 'gro g.yang

sar ltung bar 'gyur/ /de nyid rab tu rtogs byas la/ /dran pa'i thag pa dam po yis/ /dmigs pa'i ka ba la btags te/ /'dod bzhin ba yi yul spyod pas/ /ji lta bzhin du 'dus par bya/ /ji skad du/ sems can kun gyi sems gang ni/ /brtan pa'i phyir na sems dpar

brjod/ /mnyam par gzhag na ting 'dzin te/ /de bstan pa las rdo rjer 'gyur/ /sems dpa'i byin rlabs sbyor ba las/ /slar yang rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur/ /zhes so/ /bsod nams tshogs kyi yan lag phyir/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis lus ngag gi/ /bya ba bstan te drang srong ltar/ /

dang po rab tu 'drid pa'o/ /khang skas yan lag dang po bzhin/ /steng phyin ma yin dgos med min/ /de yi rten gyis de bzung ste/ /de nyid 'ba' zhig rtogs par bya/ /de bas sems la khyad par 'byung / /longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul pa'i sku/ /de yi zhing khams yongs dag pa/ /sems nyid

'ba' zhig las 'byung ste/ /mtshams kyi rnam shes ji lta dang / /klu khros pa yi sems bzhin du/ /mi mthun ltar yang snang ba ste/ /de bas sems nyid rtogs par bya/ /rnal 'byor pa rnam pa gsum gyis slob ma rnams dbang bskur ba'i cho ga rgyas par bshad zin to// //da ni dngos

grub sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga bshad par bya'o/ /de la sgrub pa po'i gang zag ni/ /brtul zhugs sdom pa sngags ldan pa/ /mi brtan lha yi nga rgyal bral/ /cung zad ye shes dbang gyur pa/ /thun mong sgrub pa shes par bya/ /rgyu dang mi rgyur bcas pa rnams/ /sgyu 'drar sems can

dbyer med rtogs/ /thun mong cig shos dngos grub kyi/ /sgrub par ye shes dbang gyur pa'o/ /de yi yid dang mthun pa'i gnas/ /shin tu dben pa'i ri dgon dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs ri bo dang / /klung dang 'bab chu rnams dang ni/ /dur gyi khrod la sogs par yang / /bsam gtan

bsdus pa 'di bsgom mo/ /dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs ni/ /me tog 'bras bu sogs kyis brgyan/ /ri bo dben pa dag tu ni/ /dngos grub thams cad bsdus pas 'grub/ /lam gyi bzhi mdo shing gcig drung / /mtshan ma gcig dang zhi gnas su/ /rdo rje dgug pa'i khyad par

gyis/ /sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu bsgrub/ /dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs sam/ /rab tu rnam par dben pa'am/ /ri bo nags 'dab chu ngogs su/ /ting 'dzin byas nas ting 'dzin 'thob/ /rdo rje 'gug gnas mig sman dang / /ka pA la ru bsgom par bya/ /yid du 'ong dang shis pa'i gnas/ /

sgrub pa po yis rab nges bya/ /rjes su mthun pa'i shis pa'i zas/ /nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang / /chu dang shel dang sman dang dri/ /phyag rgya chen po rig 'dzin gyis/ /lam la mkhas pa rnams kyis sngags/ /glang chen sha yis mngon shes bsgrub/ /rta yi sha yis mi snang bsgrub/ /'gugs pa

ba lang sha yis bsgrub/ /khyi sha yis ni thams cad bsgrub/ /nus pa yis ni dgug par bya/ /med na bsam pas rnam par brtag/ /ngo bo nyid dang mthun dag dang / /rang bzhin gyis ni de 'grub pa'o/ /de ltar byas nas sangs rgyas dang / /byang chub sems dpa' grags chen mnyes/ 'dod

khams 'jig rten dbang phyug gi/ /las kyi go 'phang thob par 'gyur/ /gtso bo gzi chen stobs dang ldan/ /mdangs bzang mthong na yid du 'ong / /mthong bas bskul ba ma byas kyang / /'jig rten 'di dag dbang du 'gyur/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /gsang ba dam pa byang chub ste/ /

yang dag sngags kyi gsang ba 'di/ /rmongs pa'i man ngag sems 'da'o/ /mi snang stobs dang brtson 'grus dang / /dam tshig chen po bsgrub pa dang / /rdo rje 'gugs pa mchog dag kyang / /dam tshig 'di yis rnam par grub/ /grub pa yi ni mtshan ma ni/ /shin tu

'bebs pa thob pa yis/ /gdon mi za bar 'grub 'gyur te/ /bsod nams tshogs kyi yan lag rdzogs/ /spyi yi mtshan mar shes par bya/ /bzlas dang bsgom dang rang lha yi/ /khyad par gang yin rtogs par mdzad/ /rmi lam bye brag rab byed pas/ /so so'i mtshan ma shes par bya/ /

bsam gtan ngag gi bzlas pa yis/ /dus sam byin rlabs rab sdud du/ /'dod pas rnyed pa'i mtshan ma ni/ /rmi lam du ni shes par bya/ /rmi lam na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs tha dad par mthong ba dang / rmi lam na bdag nyid ye shes mchog thob nas sangs

rgyas thams cad dang mthu mnyam par mthong ba dang / rmi lam na mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan pa'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rgyud dag pa la snang bar bdag nyid mthong ba dang / rmi lam na brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang drag pa sogs pas bdag nyid la me tog la sogs pas mchod par mthong ba dang /

rmi lam na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyi nang gi 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas bdag la mchod par mthong ba dang / rmi lam na bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang ba'am/ rtag pa la sogs pa'i gzugs su mthong ba dang / rmi lam na rdo rje gsum mam spyan ma la sogs

pa'am/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bdag la btud cing phyag 'tshal bar mthong ba dang / rmi lam na mngon dga' la sogs pa'i zhing du mi bskyod pa la sogs pa mthong ba dang / de dag kyang thugs rab tu dgyes nas chos kyi mdzod chen po gtad par mthong ba dang / rmi

lam na bdag nyid shAkya thub pa la sogs pa'i gzugs lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin la sogs pas bskor zhing chos bshad par mthong ba dang / rmi lam na bdag nyid la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis nam mkha' la gdugs dkar po bteg cing / seng ge'i khri la

bzhag nas chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur bar mthong ba dang / rmi lam na gdol ba'i bu mo'am/ khyi'am/ rta rgod ma la sogs pa'am/ snyoms par 'jug pa de dag phyag rgya chen po grub pa'i mtshan ma'o/ /gzhan yang rmi lam na kha dog sna tshogs pa'i kun dga' ra ba dang skyed mos

tshal yid du 'ong ba mthong ba dang / rmi lam na lha'i bu mo gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / snyan cha dang / mgur chu dang / nu 'bur dang / zur phud la sogs pas brgyan pa dang / mi'i khye'u dang bu mo yid du 'ong ba bcu drug pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa mthong ba ni thun mong gi 'grub pa'i

mtshan ma'o/ /rigs 'dzin la sogs yongs smin las/ /'dzam bu gser 'dra'i sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /de bas de dag thams cad kun/ /cig shos mtshan mar shes par bya/ /sngon du bya ba'i las kyi rgyal po mchog ni/ sngags pa rnam par dag pa yis/ /de dag rab tu rtogs

byas nas/ /sngon gyi phyir na gnyis kyis kyang / /ci rigs gsang sngags bzlas brjod bya/ /dben par gtsang gtor byas nas su/ /bgegs bskrad sa la gsol ba btab/ /cig shos la yang gsol byas nas/ /bka' stsal sa ni brko bar bya/ /sngon gyi rim pa shes byas

la/ /sa stengs rgyan dang ldan pa dang / /dag bya'i phyir na gong bzhin du/ /dbang bskur blang bas yid sbyang bya/ /rdo rjes khyad par byas pa yis/ /sa 'dzin lta bur byin brlabs la/ /bdag nyid ting 'dzin gsum gnas pas/ /de dbus nga rgyal gsum ldan bya/ /sngon bzhin rtag sogs

gsol btab nas/ /byin brlabs stangs thabs brtsam pa'o/ /phur bus btab nas sa srung ste/ /nub gcig sta gon gnas par bya/ /lha rnams gnas par byas nas su/ /brod bskyed mchod pa sna tshogs brtsam/ /dgongs par bya phyir gong ma bzhin/ /'khor lo gsol

ba gdab par bya/ /lha mo bzhi dang mi bskyod pa/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i bum pa ni/ /rdzas dang ldan par sta gon bya/ /yod na bcu dgu nges pa'o/ /skud pa tshon rtsi 'dus byas la/ /sngon bzhin 'bebs ba'i cho ga bya/ /de yis thig dang tshon btab nas/ /zhal sogs ldan pa'i

phyag rgya dgod/ /gzhan la ma thos sems can rnams/ /gzung bar bya phyir sngon bzhin bshad/ /gnas rnams stong ba mi mdzes pas/ /dang chung srid pas de ma bsngags/ /mi rnams kyis ni phye ma yis/ /zhal la sogs pa rdzogs mi 'gyu/ /yan

lag ma rdzogs byin mi rlob/ /de bas lha yi mdzes pa bsngags/ /rang gi phyag rgya'am sems kyis su/ /lha rnams rab tu gnas byas nas/ /byin rlabs sngon du mchod pa sogs/ /brtsams te 'byung gtor khyad par du/ /rnam rgyal spyor bas skyon bsal nas/ /tshim par

bya phyir lha rnams la/ /ji srid rdzas kyi thab rnams su/ /sbyin sreg gis ni mnyes bya'o/ /slob ma gzhug pa'i rim pa bzhin/ /bdag nyid 'khor lor zhugs par bya/ /sdig bshags me tog 'dor ba'i bar/ /byas nas lha rnams kyis gnang ba'i/ /sngon bzhin bum pa gsang ba

dang / /shes rab ye shes brtul zhugs dang / /lung bstan dbugs dbyung bka' stsal thob/ /de yis bsgrub pa brtsam pa'o/ /sgrub pa'i thabs gang zhe na/ dang po de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /rig 'dzin sgrub thabs bshad par bya'o/ /ji bzhin byas pa'i sngags pa yis/ /thun

mong cig shos bgegs bsal nas/ /spyi gzugs gyur nas rtag pa las/ /byung ba'i gzhal yas khang pa bsgom/ /lnga dang bzhi las mchog dang po/ /rab bskyed skye rim bzhi spangs nas/ /dri za rab tu zhugs byas pas/ /de ni cho ga bzhin du zhu/ /rang gi tshangs pa'i spyod pa bzhi/ /

mA ma kI la sogs gyur nas/ /bskul te thim gyur sa bon gyur/ /phyag mtshan des mtshan bshes gnyen zhugs/ /de las rtag pa sngon bzhin bskyed/ /de yi thugs kar zla ba la/ /oM las 'khor lo oM gyis mtshan/ /bsams nas sngags kyis byin gyis brlab/ /oM d+harma d+hA tu

swA b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ gnyis sogs ma gtogs de phyag rgyas/ /gnas nas sngags 'di bsgom par bya/ /oM AH oM dzin dzika hUM/ /brjod pas oM las 'od zer tshogs/ /dkar ba'i rgyun gyis nang gsal te/ /ba spu'i bu ga nas spros pa'i/ /'od rtse rtag pa'i tshogs rnams

kyis/ /nam mkha'i khams kun bkang byas nas/ /sangs rgyas rtag pa spyan drangs nas/ /rang gi ba spu'i bu gar gzud/ /brtan pa'i ngo bos phyag byas nas/ /yang nas yang du dus bzhir bsgom/ /de nas zhag bdun la sogs nas/ /nye ba'i mtshan ma mthong nas ni/ /'byung

po rnams la gtor byin nas/ /yang ni sbyin pa der zhen bya/ /'di lta bu yi sbyor ldan pas/ /rdo rje'i sku ni rgya mtsho dag /zla ba phyed na nges pa ru/ /the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur/ /ye shes lnga ldan bsten nas ni/ /rnam par snang mdzad dang 'dra ba'i/ /sangs rgyas sku ni 'bar

ba'i 'od/ /rdo rje bskal pa gsum du gnas/ /thams cad sngon bzhin rab byas te/ /'od dpag med bsgoms mgrin pa ru/ /AH las pad+ma AHyis mtshan/ /bsams nas bzlas brjod yang bya'o/ /oM AHA ro l-ika hUM/ /de yis sngon bzhin 'od dpag med/ /spros te bkug

nas rang la btsud/ /brtan byas sngon bzhin rab bsgrubs nas/ /zla ba phyed na 'grub par nges/ /ye shes lnga dang ldan pa yis/ /rdo rje chos ni bsten byas nas/ /de dang 'dra ba'i 'od thob ste/ /rdo rje bskal pa gsum du gnas/ /sngon bzhin mi bskyod rab bskyed de/ /thugs kar hUM

las rdo rje la/ /hUM gis mtshan pa rab bsams la/ /sngags kyi bzlas brjod bya ba'o/ /oM AHhUM badzra d+h+r-ika hUM/ sangs rgyas mi bskyod tshogs rnams kyang / /btsud nas chags par byas nas su/ /sngon bzhin nye mtshan mthong bsgrubs nas/ /zla phyed 'grub par the tshom med/ /ye

shes lnga ldan bsten na ni/ /ston pa rdo rje thugs 'dra ba/ /ye shes yon tan rgya mtshor 'gyur/ /rdo rje bskal pa gsum du gnas/ /thams cad sngon bzhin rab gnas te/ /mi bskyod cho ga bzhin bskyed nas/ /thugs kar rdo rje bum pa ru/ /oM bsams bzlas brjod bya ba'o/ /oM

d+harma d+hA tu dz+nyA na rastu hUM/ mi bskyod tshogs bkug sngon bzhin du/ /zhugs nas chags byas nye bar mthong / /gtor ma btang nas rab bsgrubs nas/ /zla phyed mi bskyod 'dra ba thob/ /mi bskyod pa yi sku dag dang / /gsung dang thugs mchog 'dra ba 'dzin/ /'jig rten khams rnams

thams cad du/ /mi bskyod rdo rje mchod par 'gyur/ /rin chen 'byung ldan sngon bzhin bskyed/ /thugs kar mtshan ma la gnas pa'i/ /oM bzlas pa yis 'grub pa'o/ /de dang 'dra bar bsgrub par bya/ /oM AH oM sa man+ta dz+nyA na rastu hU~M/ de yis rin chen 'byung

ldan tshogs/ /spros pa bkug nas rab tu btsud/ /brtan byas gong bzhin rab bsgrubs nas/ /zla ba phyed na rab tu 'grub/ /lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi/ /rin chen 'byung ba'i 'od dang 'dra/ /de ni byang chub bdag med dang / /ye shes gsang ba'i gnas su 'gyur/ /'od dpag

med pa bsgom byas la/ /de yi thugs kar pad+ma la/ /gnas pa'i oM ni bzlas byas pas/ /dpag med 'dra ba bsgrub par bya/ /oM AH oM pra t+ya bek+Sha Na dz+nyA na rastu hUM/ 'od dpag med pa'i tshogs spros pas/ /bkug nas brtan byas chags byas nas/ /gong ma bzhin du rab bsgrubs nas/ /

zla ba phyed na 'grub par nges/ /sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi/ /dpag med pa yi 'od dang 'dra/ /'di ni sems can thams cad kyi/ /theg chen lam gyi mchog tu 'gyur/ /sngon bzhin don yod grub bsgoms la/ /thugs kar ral gri'i yu ba la/ /zla ba'i dbus su oM bsams la/ /

sngags kyi bzlas brjod brtsam pa'o/ /oM AHoM kri ta a nuSh+Tha na dz+nyA na rastu hUM/ de yis don yod grub pa'i tshogs/ /spros te bkug byas zhugs byas la/ /gnas brtan ngo bor chags byas na/ /zla ba phyed na de dag 'grub/ /sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi/ /rdo rje thogs med 'dra ba 'ong / /de ni

dpal ldan ye shes mtsho/ /sems can don kun 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin snang mdzad bsgom byas te/ /sngags kyi bzlas brjod bya ba'o/ /oM AHoM A daR+sha dz+nyA na badzra rastu hUM/ sngon bzhin zhugs sogs rab byas nas/ /zla phyed de dang 'dra bar 'grub/ /thams cad snga ma bzhin

byas te/ /snang mdzad mgo mgrin thugs ka ru/ /'khor lo pad+ma rdo rje la/ /zla ba'i dbus nas oM gsum gnas/ /oM AHoM oM oM tri ga ka ra ya rastu hUM/ de yis rdo rje gsum gyi tshogs/ /bkug nas gnas gsum du brtan par/ /byas nas nye ba'i mtshan ma mthong / /gong bzhin

byas na zla phyed 'grub/ /sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi/ /sangs rgyas snang mdzad 'dra ba'i mdog /de ni byang chub ye shes dang / /sku gsum ye shes 'grub par 'gyur/ /de yi rim pas mi bskyod sogs/ /rang rang ngo bos rab bsgrubs na/ /dpal ldan zla ba phyed grub nas/ /

rdo rje bskal pa gsum du gnas/ /de bzhin de ltar de gnyis sam/ /gcig la'ang gsum du goms byas nas/ /rgyal ba'i sras po mos pa yis/ /nyung ngam lhag par gnas par 'gyur/ /sngon bzhin thams cad rab byas la/ /rnam par snang mdzad cho ga bzhin/ /bskyed

nas chos dbyings byin brlabs nas/ /lag pa g.yas pa 'khor lo bskyed/ /'khor lo gser sogs dngos byas la/ /oM bskyed lte bar rtag pa yi/ /'khor lo chen po rab bsgoms te/ /sngags kyi bzlas brjod brtsam pa'o/ /oM AHdzin dzika tsakra ar+tha sid+d+hi hUM swA hA/ 'od

zer gyis bkug rtag dkyil 'khor/ /bsdus te bcug nas brtan byas pas/ /drod dang dud 'thul 'bar ba dang / /nam mkha' la ni 'phar bar 'gyur/ /de yi steng du su bsams nas/ /lag tu babs nas spyan mas bzla/ /'byung po rnams la gtor sbyin la/ /chags byas zla

ba phyed nas 'grub/ /ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi/ /rab tu phra ba'i rdul snyed kyi/ /rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra ba kun/ /de yi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur/ /sngon bzhin mi bskyod rab bsgoms la/ /rdo rje dngos byas hUM bskyed de/ /rdo rje rigs kyi 'khor lo bsgom/ /sngags kyi bzlas brjod bya

ba'o/ /oM AH badzra d+h+r-ika badzra ar+tha sid+d+hi hUM swA hA/ rdo rje rigs kyi spro dang bsdu/ /brtan par byas la chags byas nas/ /sngon bzhin rab tu bsgrub gyur na/ /zla ba phyed na 'grub par nges/ /ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi/ /rdul phran ji snyed yod pa yi/ /de snyed kyi ni bud med rnams/ /

yon tan can gyi bdag gir 'gyur/ /drag po dag gis phyag byas pas/ /khams gsum rdo rje chen por 'gyur/ /sngon bzhin rgyas par rin chen 'byung / /bsgoms nas swa bskyed rin chen dngos/ /rin chen rigs kyi lha bsgoms la/ /sngags kyi bzlas brjod bya ba'o/ /oM

AH rat+na d+h+r-ika rat+na ar+tha sid+d+hi swA hA/ rin chen rigs kyi lha rnams kun/ /spro zhing bsdu bas brtan byas nas/ /nye ba'i mtshan mthong sngon bzhin bsgoms/ /zla ba phyed 'grub the tshom med/ /ye shes lnga ldan bsten na ni/ /bskal ba gsum gyi yun gnas shing / /

phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /gsang ba gsum la bsnyen bkur byed/ /de bzhin dpag med tshe bsgoms la/ /gser sogs pad+ma AH las skyes/ /lte bar gsung rigs lha bsgoms la/ /bzlas brjod rab tu bya ba'o/ /o AHA ro l-ika ka ma la ar+tha sid+d+hi

swA hA/ de spros gsung gi rigs bkug nas/ /bcug nas brtan bya yang yang bsgom/ /mtshan ma thob nas gtor ma btang / /zla ba phyed na de 'grub 'gyur/ /ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi/ /rab tu phra ba'i rdul snyed la/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la/ /dag pa'i bdag nyid

'jog par byed/ /don yod grub pa sngon bzhin bsgom/ /ral gri dngos byas ha las bskyed/ /las kyi lha rnams yu bar bsgom/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa brtsam pa'o/ /oM AHpradz+nyA d+h+r-ika khad+ga ar+tha sid+d+hi swA hA/ las kyi rigs kyi lha rnams spro/ /bsdu zhing bcug nas chags

byas na/ /de mtshan mthong nas sngon bzhin bsgrub/ /zla phyed kyis ni nges par 'grub/ /khams gsum kun gyis rab mchod cing / /tshangs la sogs pas phyag kyang byas/ /stong gsum na ni mchog tu dpa'/ /mi mchog gsang ba 'dzin par 'gyur/ /gang rnams 'dod

dang bsam pa dag /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje thugs las rab byung ba/ /de lta bu yi dngos grub ster/ /'khor lo la sogs grub pa'i mchog /sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /gang gA'i bye snyed thams cad du/ /grub pa kun du rnam par spyod/ /dam tshig

dam pa thams cad kyi/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur/ /rdo rje sku ni rab bsgoms pas/ /de ni dam tshig mchog tu 'gyur/ /thams cad snga ma bzhin byas te/ /'jam dpal bskyed pa'i cho ga rdzogs/ /thugs kar ral gri'i yu ba la/ /haM gi 'od ldan bzlas brjod bya/

oM AHhaM many+dzu shrI hUM phaT/ de yi 'od kyis nang gsal nas/ /ba spu las byung 'od zer lngas/ /thams cad 'jam dpal skur byas te/ /bkug cing bu gar thim par bya/ /yang nas yang du brtan byas pas/ /ba spu dbang po gzhu mthong nas/ /'byung po gtor byin chags byas

na/ /zla ba phyed kyis nges par 'grub/ /'jam dpal dam tshig longs spyod la/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /sa bcu dag la gnas pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpa' de 'gyur ro/ /yang ni 'jam dpal de bzhin bsgom/ /ral gri yu bar bcug 'phan gnas/ /bzlas

brjod byas la gong bzhin dpag /de dang 'dra bar bsgrub par bya/ /oM AHth+liM many+dzu hUM swA hA/ de ni zla ba phyed na yang / /'od zer 'bar bar gyur pa yin/ /rdul phran rdo rje lus ngag gi/ /rdo rje sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /snga ma bzhin du kun shes bya/ /gshin rje gshed la sogs pa bcu/ /

longs spyod dang po rdzogs pa la/ /mtshan ma yis ni de 'dra 'grub/ /tho ba dbyug pa pad+ma dang / /rdo rje lcags kyu dbyug gsal zhing / /ral gri 'khor lo rdo rje rnams/ /dngos byas 'khor lo gcig bsgom brjod/ /oM AHya mAn+ta kr-ita mud+ha ra sid+d+hi hUM/ oM AHp+r+dz+ny+'+n+ta kr-ita badz+ha d+ha na da sid+d+hi

hUM/ oM AHpad+man+ta kr-ita pad+ma sid+d+hi hUM/ oM AH big+h+r+nA kr-ita badzra sid+d+hi hUM/ oM AHTak+ki rA dza aM ku sha sid+d+hi hUM/ oM AHnI la daN+Da'i daN+Da sid+d+hi hUM/ oM AHma hA ba la tri shU la sid+d+hi hUM/ oM AHa tsa la khad+ga sid+d+hi hUM/ oM AHtsakra warti tsakra sid+d+hi hUM/ oM AH su b+ha badzro sid+d+hi hUM/ de yis khro bo'i

tshogs bkug ste/ /bcug nas brtan par byas nas su/ /sngon bzhin gtor sogs kyis bsgrub na/ de 'dra zla ba phyed na 'grub/ /yang na rtag pa 'od dpag med/ /mi bskyod pa yi mtshan ma rnams/ /bsgrubs te rang gi lha bcug pas/ /zla phyed de dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /mi snang ba

bsgrub pa'i cho ga bshad par bya'o/ /sngon du spyi yi cho ga sogs/ /rgyas par rab tu bshad 'gyur yang / /bde blag tu ni rtogs bya'i phyir/ /yang ni thugs rjes bsdus te bstan/ /mtshan ma thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /'dzab bzlas cho ga la sogs nas/ /lhas dbang bskur ba'i

par zhugs la/ /bde ba'i stan la 'dug par bya/ /bgegs bzlog cho ga nas brtsams te/ /brgyad kyis nam mkha' snying po bskyed/ /chos dbyings byin rlabs lus kun la/ /gnas bzhi ma gtogs khaM gis mtshan/ /oM AH khaM na kha gar+b+ha hUM/

de yi 'od kyis sangs rgyas rnams/ /nam mkha'i snying po'i skur byas la/ /bkug ste khaM kun la bstims la/ /nam mkha' bzhin du stong par bsam/ /bdag gi yan lag mi mthong sogs/ /'byung po gtor ma yang byin te/ /chags byas yad du bsgrub 'gyur na/ /zla ba

phyed na mi snang 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /yang dang yang du mchod pa dang / /bskal pa gcig tu gnas pa dang / /sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs 'gyur/ /gzhi yi 'bras bu gzhan yin phyir/ /de bshad gsang ba'i thig le las/ /rim pa 'di

bzhin tshig 'grub pa/ /'jig rten dbang po bsgrub pa bshad/ /thams cad sngon bzhin rab byas la/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang bsgom par bya/ /de lce hrIHlas pad+ma ni/ /'dab brgyad mdun du rdo rje ni/ /oM AHhrIHlo ke shwa ra b+ha d+ha na ar+tha sid+d+hi hUM swA hA/ bzlas pa thos pas sangs

rgyas rnams/ /'jig rten dbang ni bskur byas te/ /bkug ste lce la bcug nas ni/ /gnas brtan ngo bor chags par bya/ /lce de rdo rje mthong gyur nas/ /gtor ma byin te yang yang bsgom/ /zla ba phyed na nges pa ru/ /tshig gi dngos grub thams cad 'grub/ /bden pa ru ni smra ba

dang / /shags dang rgol ba sun 'byin dang / /kun thos rnams ni yid 'ong bar/ /'gyur ba 'di la the tshom med/ /de las yang ni sgrub pa'i mchog /mtshon cha rnams ni 'jig 'gyur ba/ /phyi mas gsungs pa 'byung ba'i phyir/ /de yi sgrub pa'i cho ga bshad/ /sngon

gsungs rgyas par bshad pa yi/ /cho ga rnams ni rdzogs byas la/ /klu shing me tog mtshan pa yi/ /snang mdzad 'dra ba'i byams pa bskyed/ /thugs kar mtshan ma la gnas pa'i/ /me ni cho ga bzhin bsgoms la/ /bzlas brjod byas pas byams pa yi/ /tshogs kyis

khams gsum dgad pa'o/ /oM AHme ma hA me d+ha ra sa ra Na hUM swA hA/ de yis sems can thams cad la/ /byams pas dmigs byas snying rje sogs/ /khro dang bral bar rab bsams la/ /sems can de dag rab tu bsdu/ /brtan par rab tu chags byas la/ /ral gri so

sogs ma gtogs te/ /'byung po gtor sbyin yang bsgoms na/ /zla phyed mtshon chas mi tshugs so/ /'phen dang mi 'phen la sogs pa/ /mthong ba tsam gyis 'jig par 'gyur/ /btab 'gyur 'thor ram me tog 'gyur/ /gang mthong byams sems dang ldan pa'o/ /sngon bzhin bya ba

thams cad bya/ /'jam dpal cho ga bzhin bsgoms la/ /thugs kar ral gri'i yu bar maM/ /bsams nas bzlas brjod par bya'o/ /oM AH maM many+dzu shrI ar+tha sid+d+hi hUM swA hA/ 'od zer stug pos nang gsal te/ /ba spu'i bu ga las byung bas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'jam

dpal skur/ /byas te bkug nas ba spu yi/ /bu gar bcug nas stong pa nyid/ /bsams pas sngon bzhin rtogs 'gyur na/ /bar chad zhi bar byas nas su/ /bsgrubs na zla ba phyed na 'grub/ /dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du/ /rdo rje 'jam pa'i 'od dag gis/ /rgyan rnams kun

gyis brgyan pa yi/ /grub pa'i mtshan ma snang bar 'gyur/ /tshangs pa drag po la sogs ltas/ /nam yang mthong bar mi nus so/ /yang ni sngon bzhin thams cad bya/ /phyag rgya chen po gang yang rung / /cho ga bzhin du dang pos bsgrub/ /de yis bsgrub pa'i ri lu gsungs/ /bdud rtsi lnga

lnga'am rta shar sbyar/ /khyi sha'am sha chen dag dang sbyar/ /ba lang sha'am shang srin bu/ /ga bur tsan+dan dang sbyar ba'am/ /gi waM a ka rur sbyar ba'am/ /ga pur gur kum sbyar ba yi/ /ril bu skrod byed lnga sbyor tsam/ /nyi ma zla ba sred byed kyi/ /nyi ma man cha bzhi dang ni/ /sreg byed

gcig ste zla ba gnyis/ /bkri ba tsa na'i 'bru tsam du/ /oM 'am AH'am hUM las bskyed/ /khar bcug nas ni de dbus su/ /rang gi 'khor lo rab bsgoms la/ /de yis de yi sangs rgyas tshogs/ /bkug ste bcug nas bzlas brjod bya/ /oM AHku la ar+tha sid+d+hi hUM/ /brtan pa'i

ngo bor chags byas nas/ /'bar sogs mtshan ma mthong bar 'gyur/ /'byung po gtor ma yang byin nas/ /bsgoms na zla phyed mi snang 'gyur/ /rdo rje sku dang rab 'dra zhing / /nyi ma shar ba'i 'od 'dra ste/ /'dzam bu na da'i gser 'od kyi/ /byang chub ye

shes thob par 'gyur/ /'di ni dpal dang ldan pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'od dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /dpag tshad bye ba gang gA yi/ /steng du rdo rje 'gro bar 'gyur/ /'dod khams gnas pa'i bu mo ni/ /lha yi longs spyod brtul zhugs ma/ /yang na gzugs khams gnas pa la/ /

stobs chen gyis ni 'dod pa spyod/ /thams cad sngon bzhin rab byas te/ /rang gi lha ni dang po dmigs/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su man 'ji'i steng / /thod pa yis ni brgyan par bya/ /bdud rtsi lnga ni go rims bzhin/ /gong gi cho gas dag byas nas/ /oM AHhUM yig gsum po

ni/ /brgya dang brgyad du bzlas par bya/ /de yis dro ba la sogs pa/ /mthong nas bar chad zhi bya ste/ /yang ni sbyor bas brtan byas na/ /zla phyed sangs rgyas kyis mi mthong / /de bzhin bshad pa 'ba' zhig gam/ /khyi sha rta sha 'bras chan sha/ /gong gi cho gas rab zos nas/ /

sangs rgyas nyi mas mi mthong ngo / /mi snang gyur pa kun las mchog /stong khams dag ni snang bar byed/ /sangs rgyas kun la 'phrog pa dang / /lha yi bu mo mchog la spyod/ /mig sman sgrub pa bshad par bya'o/ /mtshan ma thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /thams cad sngon

bzhin rab byas la/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba ni/ /longs spyod dang pos rdzogs par bya/ /nya yi dus su brtsams nas ni/ /dro sogs rgyu las rab byung ba/ /brgyad kyi dus su shes byas la/ /bcu bzhi'i dus su bsgrub par bya/ /gong gi gnas su song nas kyang / /thod pa gnyis

kyi steng 'dug nas/ /mdun du thod pa'i man 'ji la/ /skyes pa'i thod pa bzang po bzhag /de yi nang du tshil chen la/ /khrag dang bdud rtsi lnga yis dgang / /pad+ma'i khong srog dur ras dkris/ /de la me mar 'bar bar bya/ /spyad mkhan thod pas steng bkab nas/ /de yi dud pa blangs

nas su/ /'ug pa'i mgo ni bsreg byas nas/ /pad+ma'i rak+ta bsre bar bya/ /srod kyi dus su btags nas su/ /bya rgod rje ngar nang bkang la/ /pad+ma'i zil pas brlan par bya/ /'od med thur mas mig la bsku/ /de yi tho rangs dus nas ni/ /gnod sbyin gter rnams mthong

ba dang / /'gro kun dbang du 'gyur ba dang / /gzi can kun gyis mi mthong 'gyur/ /rig 'dzin grub pa'i rnal 'byor ba/ /bskal par gso bar gnas pa'i rgyu/ /bdud rtsi sman gyi cho ga mchog /ji bzhin du ni bshad par bya/ /thabs dang shes rab dbye ba yis/ /dkon mchog

dpal dang 'od dpag med/ /dbu rgyan la ni bsam byas la/ /gnyis su med pa'i ros zhu 'gyur/ /tshim pa'i cho ga bzhin drangs nas/ /rtsa rgyus thams cad khyab par byas/ /rlung dang bad kan mkhris pa ni/ /khros par gyur kyang mi thub bo/ /skal dbang rnam pa gsum po

yis/ /mos pa'i sems can gzung ba'i phyir/ /mthun pa'i cho ga la gnas nas/ /rang rang dam tshig gis gnas bya/ /thugs rjes non pa'i sngags pa yis/ /nyan thos gzugs kyis gnyis med spang / /dge ba bcu la btsud nas ni/ /rang gi ngo bor 'gyur ba'o/ /de

bzhin rang sangs rgyas gzugs kyis/ /lus kyi rdzu 'phrul dpag med mdzad/ /btsud nas de don 'di la bkod/ /slar yang rang gi ngo bor 'gyur/ /de bzhin skad cig oM las bskyed/ /tshangs pa chen po zhal bzhi ba/ /mtshan dang rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa/ /tshangs

skud se ral cod pan la/ /rdo rje sems dpas mtshan pa yi/ /dang po dbyug pa rtse gsum gyis/ /mtshan pas zhi ba'i ku tsa btsir/ /gnyis na bgrang phreng gun+d+d+he 'dzin/ /dang steng pad+ma zla bar gnas/ /gti mug lam gyis dman pa rnams/ /'jigs pa bskyed cing

mos ma thag /rang gi lha yi skur 'gyur ro/ /a las bskyed pa'i drag po ni/ /thal mdog zhal gcig spyan gsum pa/ /zla phyed dang ldan cod pan la/ /rdo rje sems dpas mtshan pa'o/ /kha T+wAM mgul pa dril mtshan pa'i/ /phyag g.yas kyi ni phrag pa brten/ /bdud rtsi

lngas gang thod pa ni/ /g.yon pas bsnams shing 'khyud pa'o/ /u ma sku mdog ser po ste/ /me tog sna tshogs sku la dkris/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rab brgyan pa/ /rdo rje rtse mo nang bltas bsnams/ /gnyis kyis de yi ku tsa 'dzin/ /stag

lpags sham thabs glang steng na/ /pad+ma zla ba la gnas nas/ /zla ba'i 'od kyis rgyan du mtshan/ /de yi gzugs kyis 'dod chags can/ /bud med dngos po gsum spyad na/ /btsud nas mos ma thag tu ni/ /rang gi ngo bor 'gyur ba'o/ /hUM las bskyed pa'i khyab 'jug

gzugs/ /nag po rin chen dbu rgyan can/ /rdo rje sems dpa' ral pa mtshan/ /phyag bzhi 'khor lo rtse gsum dang / /'bud dung rin chen ldan pa'o/ /lha mo gser sku'i bdag nyid 'dra/ /thod du me tog sna tshogs dkris/ /mtshan ma bdag 'dra rgyan rnams brgyan/ /

dang po gnyis kyis legs par 'khyud/ /khyung steng pad+ma nyi ma la/ /nyi ma'i 'od kyis rgyab brten mdzad/ /de yis gzugs khams gsum na gnas/ /sdang ba rnams ni bsad nas su/ /yal bar mi 'gyur brtson byas nas/ /slar yang rang gi bdag nyid 'gyur/ /de ltar

de bzhin sha bza' zhing / /gzhan gyi bud med spyod pa yis/ /gnod sbyin pho mo bsgrubs na ni/ /don byas yang ni grol bar 'gyur/ /'o ma dang ni phra ma dang / /'dod yon lnga dang dri rnams kyis/ /klu yi bu mo bsten byas na/ /yang ni grol nas ngo bor gnas/ /khro zhing nga rgyal

gnod sems ldan/ /spos dang me tog spyad pa yis/ /lha min bu mo mnyes byas la/ /grol nas rang gi skur 'gyur ro/ /thos rung bdug pa 'bru mar gyis/ /srin po rnams ni dga' bar bya/ /de bzhin 'byung po rnams kyang ngo / /des kyang gtsang ba'i don chen byed/ /bdud rtsi lnga'am

khrag dag gam/ /chang la sogs pa 'thung ba yis/ /gau ra'i la sogs mnyes byas la/ /sdang ba ma lus gsad par bya/ /de bzhin brgya byin la sogs pa'i/ /ngo bo dam tshig la gnas nas/ /de 'dra'i sems can gdul bya'i phyir/ /gzugs kyis de tsam gnas pa'o/ /

ngo bo nyid kyis kun 'byung ba/ /khams rnams dag na rnam par spyod/ /sems can kun la phan 'dod pas/ /dam tshig ma lus spyad par bya/ /gang dang gang gis bsam pa yis/ /'dul bar 'gyur ba'i gzugs can de/ /thugs rjes non pa de dang der/ /snying rje'i bdag

nyid rnams kyis bstan/ /da ni mngon par shes pa lnga/ /bsgrub pa'i cho ga bshad par bya'o/ /mtshan ma thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /sngon bzhin bzlas pa'i cho ga nas/ /ri mo'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs byas nas/ /lha yis dbang bskur bar zhugs te/ /bgegs dgra

sbyor ba nas brtsams te/ /chos kyi dbyings su byin gyis brlabs/ /gnyis kyi bsgrub pa rnam par bshad/ /gcig la 'bras bu gnyis su shes/ /mig gnyis dang ni rna ba gnyis/ /dpral ba snying ga lte ba ru/ /sngon bzhin k+ShiM sogs mtha' gnyis las/ /'khor

lo la sogs de yis mtshan/ /de las bzhi po gcig gnyis skyed/ /de rnams thugs kyi 'od zer gyis/ /sangs rgyas rnams bkug zhugs byas pas/ /rdo rje sngar gyur bcud 'phan mtshan/ /oM AHbadzra d+h+r-ika pany+tsa b+hi b+h+yid ar+tha sid+d+hi hUM swA hA/ de brjod 'od zer 'phros pa

yis/ /sangs rgyas sa snying sogs byas pas/ /bkug ste gnas bcug brtan byas nas/ /bar du chod pa'ang mthong la sogs/ /dngos grub bar chod nyer zhi'i phyir/ /'byung po sogs la gtor byin nas/ /gong gi sbyor bas chags byas na/ /zla ba phyed na 'grub

par 'gyur/ /de bzhin rtag pa rin chen 'byung / /'od dpag med dang don yod grub/ /'khor lo rin chen pad+ma dang / /ral gri gyur pa bcud 'phen mtshan/ /oM AH dzin dzika pany+tsa a b+hi b+h+yid ar+tha sid+d+hi hUM swA hA/ oM rat+na d+h+r-ika pany+tsa a b+hi b+h+yid ar+tha sid+d+hi hUM swA hA/ oM A ro l-ika

pany+tsa a b+hi b+h+yid ar+tha sid+d+hi hUM swA hA/ oM pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika pany+tsa a b+hi b+h+yid ar+tha sid+d+hi hUM swA hA/ brjod cing spros pas gong ma ltar/ /sa snying la sogs bcug byas te/ /mtshan mthong bar chad zhi byas nas/ /zla ba phyed na nges par 'grub/ /gang gA'i bye snyed sangs rgyas rnams/ /nyid kyi rdo rje

gdan bzhugs pa/ /shing tog lag tu bzhag pa bzhin/ /rdo rje mig gis mthong bar 'gyur/ /gang gA'i bye snyed zhing dag na/ /rna ba'i drung na 'khod pa bzhin/ /sgra grag pa yi ji snyed pa/ /mngon shes rna bas thos pa'o/ /gang gA'i bye snyed zhing dag

gi/ /sems can kun gyi sems rnams ni/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs kyis mtshan/ /gar mkhan la sogs rig par 'gyur/ /bskal pa gang gA'i bye snyed du/ /'khor ba dag na gnas pa yi/ /sngon gyi gnas kyi gtan tshigs brtag/ /zhag gsum 'das pa

bzhin du dran/ /gang gA'i bye snyed zhing dag tu/ /sangs rgyas sprin gyis brgyan pa'i sku/ /bskal pa gang gA'i bye snyed du/ /rdo rje rdzu 'phrul mchog gis 'gengs/ /sangs rgyas mngon shes rgyu yi phyir/ /phul du 'byung bar bshad pa ste/ /grangs dang tshad du rab ldan

pa'i/ /mngon par shes pa rtogs par bya/ /gang gA'i bye snyed grangs med pa'i/ /'khor gyis yongs su bskor nas su/ /rdo rje sku dang gsung thugs kyis/ /'jig rten khams kun bgrod par 'gyur/ /da ni dgug pa'i cho ga'i las 'ga' zhig bshad par bya'o/ /

mtshan ma thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /gang gsungs gnas su ji lta bzhin/ /ri mo'i dkyil 'khor bri byas nas/ /lha yi dbang bskur byas nas zhugs/ /bka' yi 'khor lo sogs sbyor bas/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i sngon 'gro ba'i/ /'dod pa'i lha ru dmigs byas la/ /

mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs/ /lcags kyu gnas ni bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /rdo rje gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs/ /yi ge gsum par rang rang sngags/ /rig pa dang bcas bzlas par bya/ /rdo rje gsum las 'phros pa yi/ /lcags kyus mtshan pa'i lha rnams

spro/ /skyes pa bud med la sogs pa/ /sems can ma yin pa yang rung / /rlung gi dkyil 'khor thog gnas pa/ /lcags kyus snying gar sbyar bar bya/ /rim bzhin 'ongs te lam byung gis/ /phab ste mdun du zla gnas la/ /'og 'byung cho gas mA ma kI/ /spyan ma zhi

dang bsrung bar bya/ /de ltar byas pas ji tsam du/ /'dod pa'i las ni byed nus pas/ /cho ga'i mchog ni 'di nyid ni/ /dgug pa kun la spyi ru sbyar/ /de bzhin bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yang / /rdo rje gsum gyis mtshan pa bsgom/ /sngon bzhin rlung dkyil la gnas pa'i/ /mi yi

bu mo mchog rnams dgug /oM AH big+hAn+ta kr-ita bu mo che ge mo A kaR+Sha ya dza hUM dza/ brgya rtsa lnga bcur brjod par bya/ /sngon bzhin 'dod pa'i rgyal po yang / /rdo rje gsum gyis byin brlabs la/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i/ /nam mkha'i bu mo dgug par bya/ /

oM AHTak+ki rA dza nam mkha'i bu mo A kaR+Sha ya dza hUM dza/ sbyor ba de ltar gnod mdzes kyang / /rdo rje gsum gyis mtshan bsgoms la/ /lha ma yin gyi bu mo mchog /rlung dkyil tri shU lcags kyus dgug /oM AHsum+b+ha rA dza lha ma yin gyi bu mo A kaR+Sha ya dza hUM dza/ sngon bzhin

'jam dpal rdo rje bskyed/ /rdo rje gsum gyis byin brlabs la/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i/ /gnod sbyin bu mo'i cod pan la/ /mnan phyir khro bo gshin rje gshed/ /bskal pa'i bsregs pa ltar bsams la/ /lcags kyu zhags pas snying gar sbyar/ /

mngag bzhug don du dgug par bya/ /rang rang sngags kyi khyad par dang / /phyag rgya'i khyad par thams cad kyis/ /dgug par rang rang thabs su gsungs/ /gzhan du byas na mi 'grub 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /yang dang yang du bskul bar bya/ /de nyid lha

rnams thams cad dang / /rgyal po rab tu brtan pa'o/ /rdo rje rgya mtsho rkang pas gnon pa'i cho ga bshad par bya'o/ /mtshan ma thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /ri mo'i cho ga sngon bstan bzhin/ /chu yi drung sogs bris nas kyang / /lha yi dbang bskur bar gyis zhugs/ /

bka' yi 'khor lo la sogs pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed nas kyang / /dri za 'jug pa la sogs pas/ /byang chub sems su zhu bar 'gyur/ /de las phyogs bzhi dbus lnga'i chu/ /b+h+rUM 'aM dzr-I khaM hUM du gyur/ /de la mtshan ma de yis mtshan/ /spro bsdu las ni rigs

lngar gyur/ /mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs/ /rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum bkod/ /de rnams kyi ni ye shes kyis/ /bskul sogs sngon 'gro dbang bskur bya/ /de yi dbu la bdag nyid ni/ /rdo rje 'chang ba rig mar bcas/ /mi bskyod

dbu gnas zhabs bzhi yi/ /sangs rgyas bzhi yi spyi bor bsgom/ /oM AHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha ma ku At+ma haM hUM/ nga rgyal de yis brtan par gnas/ /chu la sogs ba reg rung ste/ /'byung po mnyes par byas nas su/ /chags byas zla ba phyed na 'grub/ /de nas rtag pa la sogs

pa'i/ /rnal 'byor ldan pas chu yi rdul/ /spyan la sogs pa bsgom byas nas/ /dus de nyid du 'grub par 'gyur/ /'jam dpal rdo rje la sogs pas/ /chu rnams rang gi gnas su bsgom/ /gong bzhin brtan par rab byas nas/ /zla ba phyed na 'grub par 'gyur/ /grub

nas rgya mtsho bzhi la sogs/ /thams cad kun du 'chag 'gyur te/ /thang la bya ba ji bzhin du/ /rnal 'byor pa ni spyod par byed/ /thams cad sngon bzhin rab byas te/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sngon 'gro ba'i/ /baM dang rdo rje ser po las/ /dpa' bo rdo rje bsgrub par bya/ /cung

zad ser la g.yas g.yon zhal/ /gnag dang dkar po bsgom par bya/ /dang pos 'khyud cing lhag ma na/ /rdo rje ral gri nor bu pad/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa/ /mig dang lus rdzogs byin brlabs nas/ /bskul ba la sogs sngon 'gro ba'i/ /mi bskyod

pa yis dbu brgyan bsam/ /oM AHbi bi ra badzra hUM phaT swA hA/ /bzlas pa sngon bzhin rab byas pas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad de ru byas/ /bkug ste bcu gnas brtan byas pas/ /zla ba phyed na bka' nyan te/ /dgug dang dbang du bya ba sogs/ /sman dang sngags kyi

dngos grub rnams/ /sgrub pa po ni ci 'dod pa'o/ /de dag thams cad sbyin par byed/ /yang ni sngon bzhin thams cad bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i/ /tsuM dang pad+ma dkar po las/ /tsuM gyis mtshan pa bsam par bya/ /de yi 'od 'phros sangs rgyas kyis/ /phyogs bcu la

gnas sangs rgyas sogs/ /skul byed pa yi gzugs byas nas/ /bkug ste de ru gzhug par bya/ /de la sangs rgyas rdo rje ma/ /dkar mo g.yas g.yon gnag dang dmar/ /dang pos thabs la 'khyud pa dang / /pad snod ral gri nor bu 'bar/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis

brgyan pa yi/ /mig dang lus sogs byin brlabs la/ /bskul pa sngon du 'gro ba yi/ /mi bskyod pa yis dbu brgyan bya/ /de yi ye shes sems ma yi/ /thugs kar zla ba tsuM bkod de/ /spro bsdu gzhug pa snga ma bzhin/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa bya ba'o/ /oM a ca le tsu le

tsun+da le swA hA hUM swA hA/ de yis zla ba phyed na ni/ /zhi ba la sogs gang yang rung / /sgrub po'i yid la 'dod pa yi/ /dngos grub rnams ni ster bar 'gyur/ /khyad par du ni bum bzang dang / /yid bzhin nor dang dpag bsam shing / /rnal 'byor pa ni gang 'dod pa/ /sgrub pa po

la sbyin par byed/ /snga ma bzhin du thams cad bya/ /rdo rje sems las byung ba yi/ /dzaM dang ral gri 'bras bu ni/ /dzaM gis mtshan pa bsam par bya/ /de yi 'od kyis sangs rgyas rnams/ /gnod gnas kyi ni skur byas nas/ /bkug nas de la thim par bya/ /de la gnod sbyin

dbang po che/ /gsus che rkang pa thung ba ste/ /gser 'dra g.yas g.yon gnag dang dkar/ /dang pos 'phags ma nor rgyun 'khyud/ /lhag mas pi dza pU ra dang / /sre mo rin chen skyug byed dang / /rin chen ral gri 'dzin pa'o/ /zhabs g.yas rdo rje mtshan pa yi/ /bum pa bzang

la rab bzhag ste/ /g.yon pa btsan dkyil du gnas pa/ /zla steng de yi 'od kyis mtshan/ /nor rgyun de 'dra dang po na/ /mchog sbyin 'bras kyi snye ldan pa/ /sku 'jam dbu la me tog gi/ /sna tshogs thod bcings zhi ba'o/ /gzhan gyi spyan zlum yid dga' ba'o/ /spyi bo snying

ga lte ba dang / /gsang ba dang ni rkang mthil du/ /zla ba nyi mar go rims bzhin/ /rtag pa mi 'khrugs rin chen che/ /'od dpag med dang don grub bsgom/ /sku sogs byin gyis brlab byas nas/ /bskul ba sngon du 'gro ba yi/ /mi bskyod pa yis dbu brgyan bya/ /de yi ye shes

sems dpa' yi/ /thugs kar zla bar dzaM bkod de/ /sngon bzhin nor gyi char 'bebs pa/ /rtsom pa bcug ste bzlas brjod bya/ /oM AHdzam+b+ha la dza len+d+rA ya hUM phaT swA hA/ de yis zla ba phyed na ni/ /nyin re gser srang stong stong gi/ /sgrub pa po la rab

sbyin par/ /'gyur ba 'di la the tshom med/ /yang ni rang 'dod sbyor ba yis/ /yan lag brgyad ni rdzogs byas te/ /rdo rje pad+ma sbyar brtsams nas/ /bde gshegs rang gi zhal du gzhug /zhu nas rdor phyung pad nang du/ /byang chub sems la dzaM bcu dgu/ /de las gtso bo

gnod gnas kyis/ /'brel pa'i 'khor lo brtan par bya/ /de yi mig la sogs pa dang / /sku gsung thugs ni byin gyis brlabs/ /yang na rang gi sa bon gyi/ /'od kyis bde gshegs dgug par bya/ /zhal zhugs zhu gyur rdo rjer phyung / /de yi lce la dza bkod nas/ /

'od kyis drangs nas sngags 'di yis/ /zhal du dbab par byas nas dbul/ /oM AHdza dan de hi de hi hUM/ de yis tshim nas dbu rgyan la/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mchog bsgom zhing / /zla ba phyed du dus bzhi ru/ /de 'dra'i chu rgyun byin nas 'grub/ /ji tsam 'dod pa'i nor ldan zhing / /

'bru yi char ni 'bebs par mdzad/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs pa'i/ /yid bzhin nor bu 'dra bar 'gyur/ /thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la/ /rang 'dod lha yi rnal 'byor ram/ /'jam dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor gyis/ /gnod sbyin mo ni bsgrub par bya/ /ci gsungs gzhal

yas khang bsgoms la/ /de yi sbyor bas dbus su gnas/ /mdun du gser mdog zla ba la/ /zla gam thig le rtse ldan pa/ /k+ShiM bsgoms de las 'od zer spro/ /kha dog sna tshogs 'phros pa yis/ /spyan sogs lha mo bkod pa la/ /phog pas gnod sbyin mo ru 'gyur/ /bkug

ste de la thim gyur nas/ /de gzugs gnas gyur gnod sbyin mo/ /rgyud gzhan las ni gsungs pa bzhin/ /sgrub po'i mdun du rnam par bsam/ /gser mdog mdzes pa'i cha lugs can/ /bud med gzhon nu'i skra tshul ldan/ /dar gyi na bzas stod smad dkris/ /rgyan rnams

kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /g.yas pas gdugs ni dkar po thogs/ /g.yon pas dpag bsam shing la brten/ /cung zad 'dzum zhing zhal mdzes shing / /kha dog lnga pa'i me tog las/ /me tog phreng ba sogs kyis mdzes/ /byas pa'i phyed krung thor tshugs can/ /rin

po che yi ri phug na/ /gnas par rab tu bsam pa'o/ /de yi gzugs la sogs pa lnga/ /shrI bud+d+ha haM b+ha lnga yis/ /lha mor bskyed nas gnas gsum du/ /yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs/ /bskul pa sngon du 'gro ba yi/ /dbang bskur byas pas dbu rgyan la/ /gshin

rje gshed po rnam bsgoms te/ /de yang ngar 'dzin mnan par bya/ /de nas rang gi sa bon gyi/ /'od kyis ye shes sems dpa' bkug /thugs kar bcug ste snyan tshig gis/ /bzhams te bsgo bas bsgrub par bya/ /de nas de yi ye shes sems/ /rang gi sems dpar rab bcug

pas/ /rang bzhin gcig tu gyur byas nas/ /sngags kyi bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas sha dang khrag dang ni/ /til phye sgur gdong la sogs pa'i/ /gtor mas mnyes par byas nas su/ /zhi ba'i sbyor bas bsgrub par bya/ /yang ni de yis ma grub na/ /drag

shul gyis ni bsgrub par bya/ /ye shes sems dpa' der bcug la/ /rdo rje sbyor ba brtsam par bya/ /gnod sbyin mo la 'khyud byas nas/ /rdo rje rtse lnga 'od zer 'bar/ /pad+mar stsal nas sngags bzlas pas/ /nang du 'od zer spro bar bya/ /oM AHya mAn+ta kr-ita yak+ShiM yak+ShiM dz+wa la

dz+wa la hUM phaT/ /'od zer me ltar 'bar ba yis/ /ye shes sems dpa' gdung byas pas/ /tsha ste skrag nas sgrub po la/ /zla phyed 'phral du dngos grub ster/ /sgrub po'i mdun du thal sbyar nas/ /rje gcig bdag la bka' stsol zhes/ /'dzum pa'i bzhin bltas bka' len

te/ /sgrub pos de la bka' stsal pa/ /ma dang sring mo chung ma dang / /g.yog mo'i bya ba gyis zhes bya/ /de nas de yis rje gcig gi/ /bka' ni spyi bos nod ces len/ /gal te ma yi bya ba byed/ /tho rangs srod la 'ongs byas nas/ /gser srang bcu dang mu tig gi/ /ha ra

bdun ni bzhag nas 'gro/ /sring mo yi ni bya ba byed/ /nyi ma'i gung la drung 'ongs te/ /gser srang bdun dang ha ra bdun/ /phul te ming po sang 'od zer/ /gal te chung ma'i bya byed na/ /yid kyi 'dod pa'i dus su ni/ /'phral du drung du 'ong bar byed/ /

cang mi smra bar 'dod pa spyad/ /gser srang lnga dang ha ra gcig /bzhag ste rang gi gnas su 'gro/ /gal te gtam smras gyur na ni/ /phyin chad ci yang mi ster ro/ /g.yog mo'i bya ba byed pa yis/ /zas dang gos dang gser la sogs/ /bzhon pa la sogs ci 'dod pa/ /

bka' tsam gyis ni sbyor bar byed/ /gzhan ni na chung yid du 'ong / /bkug nas byin te rang gnas skyel/ /de sogs gnod sbyin mo rnams kyi/ /yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab thob/ /sngags kyi khyad par rnams kyi sgrub pa khyad par bshad zin to// //da ni zhi ba'i las kyi rim

pa bshad par bya'o/ /spyan gyi tshul gyi rnal 'byor gyis/ /bsam gtan 'di ni brtag par bya/ /yang na mos pa'i rnam pa yis/ /rnal 'byor rab tu brtsam ba'o/ /grong ngam yang na grong khyer ram/ /[(]ljangs [,]ljongs [)]rnams gang ba'i nad la sogs/ /zhi bar bya phyir bsam gtan

mchog /'di ni rtag tu sbyar bar bya/ /thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la/ /zhi ba'i sems kyis shar bltas te/ /rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa mchog /ta la bdun tsam nam mkha' la/ /phyogs de 'greng bur rnam par bsam/ /de yi bum pa gzhal yas khang / /gdan dang bcas pa rnam bsams te/ /de nang

rtag pa'i 'khor lo ni/ /dkar po sngon bzhin nyi shu bsgom/ /mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang byas la/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa las byung ba'i/ /'od zer rnam par spro bar bya/ /oM AHbruM dzin dzika che ge mo'i nang dz+wa la dza hUM swA hA/ de brjod lha dang rdo rje yi/ /lus las 'phros pa'i 'od zer

gyis/ /zad dus me 'drar 'gro kun gyi/ /nad rnams rab tu bsreg 'gyur ro/ /shel ltar rab tu gnas pa la/ /mi ldog bya phyir rgyas bya'i phyir/ /gsang sngags 'di ni brjod pa yis/ /spyan la sogs pa spra bar bya/ /oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ni sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni nad

shin+tAM ku ru swA hA/ mkha' dbyings yongs su bkang byas nas/ /bdud rtsi lngas gang bum pa yis/ /de rnams spyi bor bkra shis sgra/ /ldan par blangs nas dbang bskur stsol/ /oM kA ya badzra nad shIn+taM ku ru swA hA/ oM wA ka badzra nad shIn+taM ku ru swA hA/ /oM tsit+ta badzra nad shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ de rnams

brjod pas rdo rje gsum/ /ba spu'i bu ga las spros pas/ /sngon bzhin dbang bskur rab byin na/ /nges pa'i nad kyang zhag bdun 'jig /rdo rje bsam gtan 'di yis ni/ /gang dka' ba'ang rab tu 'gengs/ /de ni sbyin pa rab grub cing / /yid bzhin nor bu dpal 'drar

'gyur/ /bskal pa gsum gyi yun gnas shing / /sangs rgyas thams cad byin gyis rlob/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /gsang ba'i sku ste skyon med pa'o/ /yang na 'ga' zhig don gyi phyir/ /thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la/ /chu zla'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /

rtag pa'i 'khor lo nyi shus bskyed/ /mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang byas la/ /de yi ye shes sems dpa' yi/ /thugs kar zla ba'i steng du ni/ /zhi bar 'dod pa gzhag par bya/ /de nas gong du gsungs pa yi/ /spyan ma'i sngags ni rig mar bcas/ /bzlas brjod byas pas ba spu yi/ /

bu ga las ni spyan tshogs spro/ /de rnams 'od zer lnga 'bar ba'i/ /'od zer tshul gyis nad pa la/ /zhi bar bya phyir rgyas bya'i phyir/ /de la gzi brjid dbab par bya'o/ /yang na mi ldog bya ba'i phyir/ /gong gi dbyung ba'am sa bon nam/ /yi ge gsum par rig par bcas/ /

bzlas pas rtag pa'i tshogs spro bya/ /de rnams spyan dang bcas pa yis/ /bdud rtsis gang ba'i bum pa bzung / /dbyangs dang bcas pas dbang bskur bya/ /nad ni zhag bdun gyis zhi byed/ /rdo rje bsam gtan 'di yis ni/ /dgang dka' ba'ang rab tu 'gengs/ /de ni de ma thag tu

yang / /dpal ldan rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur/ /thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la/ /spyan ma'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo mchog /cho ga nyi shus rdzogs byas la/ /mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang ba bya/ /de yi ye shes sems ma yis/ /shi ba'i ro ni gzhag byas na/ /sngags 'di rnam

par brjod par bya/ /oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+hi lo tsa ni sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni shi ba sos par gyur cig swA hA/ de yis de nas laM 'phros pa'i/ /lcags kyu'i gzugs su phyung byas te/ /de yis shi ba'i rnam par shes/ /bar ma do na gnas pa'am/ /yang na skye

gnas chud kyang rung / /dri med mar me'i tshul gnas pa'i/ /bkug ste ro yi snying ga ru/ /bcug nas dbyung sngags de la dgod/ /de yi zer gyis ro bsregs te/ /rang min tha mas spyan ma yi/ /gzugs su bskyed nas phung po dang / /khams dang skye mched kyis dag bya/ /

de lus gang ba'i phreng sngags kyis/ /phyi nang bar mtshams med par gtams/ /sngags las sngon bzhin spyan ma spro/ /bsdus nas 'od zer spro bar bya/ /bskal pa'i bar du gnas bya'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas rtag pa'i tshogs spros pa'i/ /dbang bskur byas pa las skyes pa'i/ /

shi ba zhag ni bdun nas 'tsho/ /'tsho na'ang lnga brgya'am stong gi bar/ /'di nyid du ni gnas par 'gyur/ /spyan gyi ye shes kyis btab phyir/ /rim gyis sangs rgyas thob pa'o/ /thams cad snga ma bzhin byas te/ /rnam par snang mdzad rnal 'byor pas/ /lta ba rdo rje dug

la sogs/ /mi bzad dug ni dbrog par bya/ /bdag nyid g.yas pa'i bar ma ru/ /'khor lo dkar po rtsibs brgyad pa/ /lte bar oM dkar po yis mtshan/ /'od zer dkar po spros nas brtsam/ /nad pa mdun du gzhag byas la/ /sgrub pos spyi bo la bzhag ste/ /dug

rnams dbrog pa'i ched du ni/ /sngags 'di brjod la 'od zer spro/ /oM AHdzi na dzika che ge mo'i dug zhi bar mdzod cig hUM swA hA/ brjod pas 'od zer dkar po ni/ /spyi bor zhugs pas nag po dbyung / /'od zer de yis nam mkha'i khams/ /phyogs bcu kun du gtor bar bya/ /

de yi shul du 'od zer ni/ /dkar zhing bsil ba phab byas pas/ /zhag bdun na ni nam mkha' kun/ /gang ba'i dug kyang med par byed/ /yang ni sngon bzhin thams cad bya/ /mi bskyod 'khor lo dang ldan pas/ /ha la ha la la sogs pa/ /sbyor ba 'di yis gso bar bya/ /

bsgrub bya mdun du rab bzhag la/ /de yi thugs kar hUM byung ba'i/ /rdo rje dkar po rtse lnga pa/ /'od zer dkar po 'bar ba bsam/ /de yang zla 'od ltar bsil zhing / /bsil bas lus kun khyab pa'i dug /snying ga lkog ma dpral ba dang / /mgo bo'i gnas su yang dag

bsdu/ /de ltar lan gsum bar bsams la/ /thams cad snying ga'i dbus su bsdu/ /de nas 'di ni brjod pa yis/ /nag po skyug pa'i tshul du bsam/ /oM AHbadzra d+h+r-ika che ge mo'i dug sos par gyur cig swA hA/ de ltar byas pas zhag bdun na/ /nam mkha'i khams kun

gang ba yi/ /dug rnams kyang ni zad byed na/ /bsgrub bya'i lus ni smos ci dgos/ /sngon bzhin thams cad rab byas la/ /'od dpag med kyi rnal 'byor gyis/ /'bras dang phol mig 'brum phran sogs/ /nye ba'i dug rnams dbyung bar bya/ /g.yas kyi bar mas as bskyed

pa'i/ /pad+ma dkar po 'dab brgyad pa'i/ /lte bar 'od zer lnga 'bar ba'i/ /a bsams nas ni byab par bya/ /bsgrub bya mdun du rab bzhag la/ /a yi 'od zer gyis bsdus nas/ /nag po'i mdog ni rnam pa ru/ /bsgrub bya'i lus las byung bar bsam/ /de yis

kun du rab spros pas/ /dug spangs kha dog dkar po bsam/ /de ltar dus bzhir gsang sngags 'di/ /bzlas pas zhag bdun dug rnams 'byang / /oM A ro l-ika che ge mo'i nye ba'i dug zhi bar gyur cig hUM swA hA/ de yis las skyes snying 'bar ba'i/ /dug rnams thams cad

zad byed na/ /bsgrub bya'i lus gcig la gnas pa'i/ /nye ba'i dug rnams smos ci dgos/ /thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la/ /khro bo'i rgyal po rta mgrin ni/ /kha dog dkar po rab bsgoms te/ /dug rnams thams cad bsal bar bya/ /bsgrub bya mdun du gzhag byas la/ /de yi

snying gar zla ba la/ /hUM dkar 'od zer dkar po 'bar/ /'od zer de yis lus kun gyi/ /dug rnams rab tu sbar byas la/ /g.yas pa'i bar mar hUM dkar po/ /de bskyed pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad/ /dkar po'i lte bar hUM bsam mo/ /rang ming yi ge dang po yis/ /bsgrub

bya rnam par bsams nas ni/ /gsang sngags 'di yis de yi ni/ /dug rnams kun du bsal bar bya/ /na maHsaman+ta kA ya wAka tsit+ta badzrA NAM/ /oM hUM hUM hUM tu rul bi ru la/ sarba bi sha ga ta ya/ dza li ta/ pi s+phu ling ga tata/ ha sa ke sa ris ta

to pa/ badzra khu ra ni ra ga ta/ tsa li ta ba su tata la nish+tsa sa ma ru tod k+Shi bi da da ra ni da ra/ bi sha na ta ha sa/ a pA ra mi tA/ pa la par kra ma/ Ar+ya be+e ga ste b+hu ta ga na/ b+hU ta b+hu ta/ ha ya grI ba kha da kha da/ pa ra man+t+ra na tshin+d+hi tshan+d+ha/ sid+d+hi me de ma me da da bi sha/ A be sha ya ra k+Sha dza/

bi sha tsa nan/ sarba gra he sh+tsa bya/ pra ti ta to ta b+ha ba badzra daM Sh+Ta ki tsa mA ra ya si/ i daM du Sh+Ta/ gra ha na duSh+Ta sarbA na/ du na du na/ ma tha ma tha/ ma ta ma ta/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ bud+d+ha ra ma sang+ga nu dz+nyA na ta ka ra naM/ ku ru sri ban ha ya grI ba ya phaT/ badzra ya phaT/ badzra ga ta ya phaT/ badzra nai tra ya

phaT/ badzra daM Sh+Ta ya phaT/ badzra khu ra ya phaT/ badzra khu ra nir ga ta ya phaT/ pa ra man+ta bi nA sha na ya phaT/ trai lo kya ta ba yi kar ya phaT/ sarba karma sh+tha pra ti ha ta ya phaT/ badzra ku la ta pa na phaT/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ swA hA/ hUM las 'od zer dkar po yi/ /bdud rtsi babs

pas bsgrub bya yi/ /lus las nag po'i dug blangs te/ /sa la sogs par spro bar bya/ /shul du bdud rtsi dkar po yi/ /'od zer bab par byas nas su/ /de bzhin thun bzhir bya bas gyur na/ /zhag bdun na ni nam mkha'i dbyings/ /dug gis yongs su gang ba yi/ /

rdo rje mi bzad pa yi dug /sbyar ba tsam gyis sel bar byed/ /sngon bzhin thams cad rab byas la/ /yang ni dug rnams zad bya'i phyir/ /sbyor ba rnams la brgyad ldan par/ /gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba bsgom/ /gser 'dra g.yas gnag g.yon dkar te/ /dang pos

rang 'od rig ma 'khyud/ /g.yas pas 'og 'byung 'khor lo 'dzin/ /lhag mas ral gri rin chen pad/ /'di la rnam snang lta bur sbyar/ /bruM las 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad ni/ /dkar po bruM gyis mtshan pa bsam/ /bsgrub bya ming gi dang por bskyed/ /sgrub po'i mdun du

rab bzhag la/ /sbyor ba gsum gyis spang bya'i phyir/ /gsang sngags 'di ni brjod pas su/ /bruM las 'od zer dkar po spro/ /na maHsa man+ta kA ya wAka tsit+ta badzrA NAM/ oM AHsarba la bu ti/ lo ka diR+sha/ yan+t+ra man+t+ra tan+t+ra/ tsUr+Na pra yo gi ti/ ma ma kr-i ti ye na ke na tsi ta kr-i ti/ tA

ni sarba n+tu/ tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha/ bin+d+ha b+hin+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ kaM pa ya kaM pa ya/ bang+h+riM sa ya/ sha ta sa ha srA/ bi tsUr+Na ya/ oM uSh+NI Sha badzra tsakra warti/ b+h+rU~M b+h+rU~M b+h+rU~M/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT swA hA/ de nas 'od zer tshogs spros pas/ /spyi bo nas ni phul byas te/ /rkang pa'i

mthil du phyung byas la/ /sa yi gting du mnan par bya/ /yang ni 'od zer de yis kyang / /mdun du bsnun pas dug rnams kun/ /rgyab tu phyung bas sa la sogs/ /'byung ba rnams su spro bar bya/ /de bzhin 'od zer gyis bsdus nas/ /phyung ste gtor nas de shul du/ /

bdud rtsi dkar po rab 'bab pas/ /dug ni rnam par spang bar bya/ /dkar po dang ni ser po dang / /nag po bsam gtan 'di yis ni/ /rdo rje gsum gyi sprul pa yis/ /dug rnams kyang ni zhag bdun 'byin/ /yang ni sngon bzhin thams cad bya/ /rnam par snang mdzad

'khor lo che/ /kha dog dkar po bsam byas te/ /'don pa'i sngags kyis nad rnams bsal/ /nad pa mdun du gzhag byas te/ /bdag nyid khros nas gsang sngags 'di/ /brjod pas 'od zer tshogs spros pas/ /bsgrub bya'i lus la gzhug par bya/ /oM AH

dzi na dzika che ge mo'i nad a pa na ya hUM/ de yis nad rnams bskul bar bya/ /rlung mkhris bad kan las byung ba'i/ /spre'u'i gzugs brnyan lta bu'am/ /de bzhin khyi ni rkang pa gsum/ /yi dwags gcer bu'i gzugs dag tu/ /bsgrub bya'i lus las phyung nas su/ /

phyogs bcu dag tu rab rgyug cing / /'bros par gyur par rnam par bsam// //oM AHdzi na dzika che ge mo'i nad mA ra ya hUM phaT/ brjod pas thugs las 'phros pa yi/ /khro bo'i 'khor los mtshan pa yi/ /spre'u la sogs pa'i nad rnams kun/ /mtshan mas phye mar rlag

par byed/ /bkug ste 'ongs pa rang gnas kyi/ /mtshan mas phye mar brlag 'gyur te/ /bsgrub bya nad dang rnam bral bas/ /shel 'dra'i kha dog lta bur bsam/ /de nas bdag nyid 'khor lo che/ /kha dog dkar po rnam bsams la/ /sngon

bzhin spyan ma'i sngags brjod pas/ /'od zer 'bab pas lus dgang bya/ /oM AHdzi na dzika nad pa che ge mo la a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM swA hA/ zhes brjod sngon bzhin rtag pa'i tshogs/ /spyan dang bcas pas bum pa 'dzin/ /dbang bskur byas te brgya rtsa brgyad/ /zhag bdun

bar du dus bzhir bya/ /de ltar byas na phyi nang gi/ /myong bar nges pa'i nad kun yang / /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' bzhin du/ /the tshom med par 'byang bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin mi bskyod rin chen dpal/ /'od dpag med dang don yod grub/ /yi ge'i tshig ni gang mos pa/ /dad pa

bskyed de nad rnams bsal/ /oM AHbadzra d+h+r-ika che ge mo'i nad a pa na ya hUM/ oM AHrat+na d+h+r-ika che ge mo'i nad a pa na ya hUM/ oM AHA ro l-ika che ge mo'i nad a pa na ya hUM/ /oM pAHpradz+nyA d+h+r-ika che ge mo'i nad a pa na ya hUM/ oM AHbadzra d+h+r-ika che ge mo'i nad mAr ya phaT hUM/ oM

AHrat+na d+h+r-ika che gi mo'i nad mA ra ya phaT hUM/ oM AHA ro l-ika che ge mo'i nad mA ra ya phaT hUM/ oM AHpradz+nyA d+h+r-ika nad pa che ge mo'i nad mA ra ya phaT hUM/ oM AHbadzra d+h+r-ika nad pa che ge mo la a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM swA hA/ oM AHrat+na d+h+r-ika nad pa che ge mo la a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM swA hA/ oM AHA ro

l-ika nad pa che ge mo la a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM swA hA/ oM AHpradz+nyA ng+h+r-ika nad pa che ge mo la a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM swA hA/ de yis nad rnams phyung byas te/ /rang rang mtshan mas sngon bzhin bsad/ /stobs dang dbang bskur sogs pa yi/ /snga ma bzhin du rab tu bya/ /sbyor bas zlos pas zhag

bdun du/ /myong bar nges pa'i nad rnams kun/ /rdo rje bsam gtan cho ga des/ /phyi dang nang du bcas pa sel/ /da ni rgyas pa'i las kyi lam gyi rim pa rgyas par bshad par bya'o/ /sngon bzhin bzlas pa'i cho ga nas/ /dbang bskur yan chad rdzogs byas te/ /rdo rje pad+mo can

gyi ni/ /sbyor bas rgyas pa'i las brtsam mo/ /stobs la sogs pa'i chos rnams dang / /lhag ma'i tsher 'gyur 'dod pa dang / /mdzod po che ni rgyas byas phyir/ /rgyas pa'i sems kyis bya ba'o/ /bka' yi 'khor lo sbyor ba yis/ /sngon bzhin khang pa brtsegs pa'i

dbus/ /rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor ser po'i dbus/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsams nas ni/ /gser zhun lta bu'i 'od dpag med/ /'khor lor bcas pa bsam byas la/ /mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang ba bya/ /de yi ye shes sems

dpa' yi/ /thugs kar zla ba'i steng du ni/ /'dod pa rnam gsum bzhag nas ni/ /thams cad gsang sngags 'di ni zlos/ /oM ka Ti bi ka Ti ni ka Ti ka TaM ka Te ka ro ba re che ge mo puSh+TiM ku ru hUM/ na bza' dkar mo la sogs tshogs/ /mngon par 'dod pa'i don char 'bebs/ /nam

mkha'i khams kun rab bkang nas/ /rjes su 'od zer bsdu bar bya/ /de ni 'od zer rnam pa lnga/ /'dod pa'i spyi bo mgrin pa dang / /thugs ka'i gnas ni gsum po ru/ /'dod pa gsum gyi tshul du bzhag /de rnams mi bzad bya ba'i phyir/ /thams cad kyi ni gsang sngags

'di/ /brjod nas 'od dpag med pa'i tshogs/ /bum pa gang ba gzung bar bya/ /oM AHdzi A ro l-ika che ge mo puSh+Ti ku ru hUM/ bkra shis glu dbyangs tshigs bcad kyi/ /dbang bskur ba ni stsol bar bsam/ /de ltar dus bzhir zhag bdun du/ /sbyor bas thams cad rgyas par

'gyur/ /rdo rje bsam gtan 'di yis ni/ /dgang dka' ba yang rab tu 'gengs/ /de ni sbyin pa rab bsgrub cing / /yid bzhin nor bu dpal 'drar 'gyur/ /yang na 'di ltar gos dkar ba'i/ /'khor lo ldan pa'i sbyor ba bsgom/ /ye shes sems ma'i thugs ka ru/ /

'dod pa dag ni gzhug par bya/ /oM ka Te bi ka Te ni ka Te ka TaM ka Te ka ro ba re che ge mo puSh+ThiM ku ru hUM/ brjod pas de mtha' dbus yig la/ /nam mkha'i khams ni dkar mos gang / /de nyid gzi brjid tshul gyis su/ /rjes su 'od zer sngon bzhin dbab/ /gong gi sngags kyis

'od dpag med/ /spros nas dbang bskur stsal bar bsam/ /de ltar dus bzhir zhag bdun du/ /byas pas bsgrub bya rgyas par 'gyur/ /bsam gtan sngags kyi sbyor ba 'dis/ /rtag par chos kyis rgyas par mdzad/ /rtag tu mdzod po che dang

ldan/ /nad rnams med cing tshe rgyas 'gyur/ /da ni dbang gi las kyi rim pa bshad par bya'o/ /thams cad sngon bzhin rab byas la/ /ri mo'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /don yod grub pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /dbang du bya ba brtsam pa'o/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje sde chen dang / /sems

can khams rnams ma lus pa/ /dbang du byed dam byed 'dod phyir/ /chags pa'i yid kyis bya ba'o/ /bka' yi 'khor lo rab bskor bas/ /khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbus su ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor zla gam la/ /ji bzhin sbyor bas

ban+du ka/ /don yod grub pa'i 'khor lo che/ /bsgoms nas mchod pa bstod pa dang / /bdud rtsi myang bas mnyes par bya/ /de yi ye shes sems dpa' yi/ /thugs kar zla ba'i steng du ni/ /gong gi gnyis po bzhag nas ni/ /thams cad kyi ni gsang sngags brjod/ /oM AH

khaM pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika che ge mo ba shaM raM rA ga ya ho/ /de brjod thams cad ba spu yi/ /sgo las sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis/ /mkha' dbyings yongs su dgang bar bsam/ /de rnams 'od zer rnam lnga yi/ /tshul gyis thams cad 'dus byas la/ /

thugs kar 'dod pa de lus la/ /rjes su stobs ni dbab par bya/ /gong gi sngags brjod sngon bzhin du/ /dbang bskur de la stsol bar bsam/ /de ltar sbyor bas dus bzhi ru/ /bzlas pas zhag bdun 'grub par 'gyur/ /de ni de ma thag tu yang / /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs su

byon/ /'jam dpal dang ni gzi brjid mnyam/ /las thabs byed par de 'gyur ro/ /dga' bas myong ba'i dbang po dang / /dgyes nas ci 'dod rab tu stsol/ /bskur pa chen po ma byas kyang / /'gro ba 'di kun dbang du 'gyur/ /yang ni de ltar sgrol ma yi/ /'khor lo ldan

pa rab bsgoms la/ /de yi ye shes sems dpa' yi/ /thugs kar zla ba'i steng du ni/ /dbang du bya ba bzhag nas ni/ /dbus su yi ge tAM dmar po/ /mtha' ma phreng sngags dmar po ni/ /gyen du 'greng bas bskor bar bsam/ /dmar ba'i mtshan ma rnams dang ni/ /tAM

las 'od zer dmar po'i tshogs/ /gsang sngags 'di ni brjod nas su/ /bsgrub bya bskul phyir dbyung bar bya/ /oM tA re tu t+tA re tu re che ge mo pa shaM ku ru ho/ /skyes pa'i snying dang mgrin par bskul/ /bud med gsang ba nas bskul bya/ /phreng ba'i sngags las 'od zer dmar/ /

rang gi skye gnas nas phyung bya/ /gong gi sgo ru rab zhugs pas/ /bsgrub bya'i sems ni bkag 'dra ba/ /zla ba'i dbyibs 'dra bkug nas ni/ /rim pa gnyis su chud par bya/ /gal te lha mo mda' can ma/ /'og nas 'byung bzhin byin brlabs la/ /bskul ba la sogs de

bzhin bya/ /des kyang dbang du byed pa'o/ /gzhan yang snga ma bzhin du 'dod/ /de ni thugs kar rab bzhag la/ /dpa' bo btang sogs cho ga yis/ /gzhan la stobs ni dbab par bya/ /de ltar sbyor bas dus bzhi ru/ /zhag bdun bar du rab byas na/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje sde

can dang / /sems can khams rnams ma lus pa/ /de ma thag tu bran bzhin du/ /thams cad yod med dbang du byed/ /thams cad snga ma bzhin bsgoms la/ /rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i/ /'jam dpal rdo rje 'khor lo yis/ /dbang du bya ba brtsams pa'o/ /sngags

byed dang ni dal byed dang / /'dod byed dang ni rmongs byed dang / /dbang gi rang bzhin mda' lnga ni/ /cho ga 'di yis byin brlab bya/ /smyug ma a yis byin brlabs te/ /mde'u ni hUM gis byin brlabs la/ /g.yon gyis laM bskyed gzhu bzung nas/ /dbu rgyan rtse mor sbyar byas la/ /

drangs te rna drung du bkang nas/ /sngags kyis rab tu gdab pa'o/ /oM AHmaM many+dzu shrI che ge mo pa shaM ku ru ho/ /de yis spros pas bsgrub bya yi/ /mgo dang snying ga lte ba dang / /gsang ba dang ni rkang mthil du/ /khro bo'i tshig gis rab tu gdab/ /sngags kyi 'od zer dmar po

yi/ /rdo rje gnyis las phyung nas kyang / /zla ba spyad ldan lta bu'i sems/ /'od zer gyis ni dgug par bya/ /bdag ni skye gnas nas bcug ste/ /ye shes sems dpa' de bzhin no/ /dngangs shing brgyal bar rab bsgoms te/ /sdong po bcad bzhin zhabs

'og 'gyel/ /sbyor ba de yis dus bzhi ru/ /zla ba phyed du rab bsgoms na/ /byis pa'i blo ni grags chen pos/ /gsang ba'i bskul ba bsgom byas pas/ /rdo rje kun gyis rab gsang ba'i/ /rdo rje don ni chud par gsungs/ /de nas mngon spyod lam gyi rim pa bshad par bya'o/ /

sngon bzhin bzlas pa la sogs pa'i/ /dbang bskur yan chad rdzogs byas te/ /rdo rje khro bo rnal 'byor gyis/ /las 'di rab tu brtsam pa'o/ /dkon mchog gnod byed ma chags pa/ /gdug pa'i sems can rnal 'byor gcod/ /bla ma smod brtson ma rungs pa/ /gtum pa'i

yid kyis bsgrub pa'o/ /de rnams bskrad pa 'jigs 'jigs lta/ /sta gri gtun shing lag na 'dzin/ /gnod par byed pa rab brtson la/ /bsams nas bsam gtan rab tu bya/ /mkha' dbyings sems can sangs rgyas kyis/ /yongs su gang bar rab tu bsam/ /gdug

pa'i sta gri gtun shing gis/ /gsad par rab tu bsam pa'o/ /de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /mkha' dbyings yongs su gang bar bsam/ /sta gri gtun shing gis gsad par/ /bsams nas dgra rnams myur du 'chi/ /de yis dran rnyed mtshon cha bor/ /skyabs

med skrag cing 'jigs pas dkrugs/ /sdug bsngal dang ldan gzigs byas la/ /snying rje chen po'i khro ba bskyed/ /rang lha goms pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /rnal 'byor byas nas gsum pa ru/ /ye shes sems dpa'i 'od zer gyis/ /sangs rgyas tshogs spro bka' lung blang / /

khams bzhugs mgon po rnams kyis ni/ /bdag rtsom las 'di gzigs mdzad phyir/ /gro ba tsan+dan dkar po sogs/ /las brtsam bris pa snyan du gsol/ /phan mdzad khyed cag rnams la ni/ /'di yi thabs 'di ma brtsams na/ /'di ni mnar med skyi g.ya' ba'i/ /

bud shing du ni 'gyur bar nges/ /snying rjer ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /khyod kyi bka' lung bdag cag byed/ /de bas las ni bgyid pa la/ /rdo rje can rnams bdag bka' stsol/ /bdag cag khyad par ma mthong bar/ /dad pa kho na dang ldan pas/ /snying rje 'di la phan pa'i

phyir/ /khyed kyi bka' stsol byed pa'o/ /gong bzhin khro bo'i tshogs spros pas/ /de dag snyan du rig pa dang / /sngon bzhin du dang gal bcu yis/ /snyan gsan dbab par bsam pa'o/ /las mdzad 'di la khyod kyis ni/ /grogs po mdzad pa rigs pa yin/ /de ltar min na khyed

cag 'dir/ /dam tshig 'gal bar gyur pa'o/ /de nas de dag thams cad kyang / /zhal gyis bzhes par bsam byas nas/ /'khor lo dang bcas nag por bsgyur/ /khros nas bka' yi 'khor lo spro/ /bgegs kyi tshogs kun nyan par byos/ /sku gsung thugs la gnas

pa yi/ /dpal ldan bdag ni che ge mo/ /bka' yi 'khor lo byed pa'o/ /gal te nga yi bka' 'gom na/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i gzugs 'di yis/ /'dod gsum bskyed lus 'jig byed de/ /'gas par 'gyur te gzhan du min/ /de nas sa bon 'od zer gyis/ /mkha' khyab

sangs rgyas zhal bcug ste/ /zhu gyur rdo rje pad+ma ru/ /cho ga bzhin gyis bskyed byas la/ /mi bskyod lta bu dang pos 'khyud/ /rdo rje lcags kyu ral gri zhags/ /'dzin pa'i khro bo sum+b+ha'i gzugs/ /de yi srung ma dgug don bskyed/ /snying rje ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /dbyangs

yig 'og la hUM yig steng / /rdo rje rgya gram kha sbyor phyir/ /sngags 'dis srung ma dgug pa'o/ /oM AHhe sum+b+ha ni che ge mo'i srung ma khug cig dzaHhUM/ de yis dgug la g.yon du bzhag /gnod mdzes de la bcug byas te/ /de yi lus gnas 'khor lo la/ /de yi nyes pa

bsgo ba'i phyir/ /dpal ldan gnod mdzes mdun du gnas/ /rig pa'i tshogs kyis gsol gdab bya/ /las kun rnam pa gang gis ni/ /da lta mthu ni yod 'gyur ba/ /ma 'ongs bde ba 'dod pas na/ /khyod kyis 'di nyid spang bar bya/ /sangs rgyas gsod byed ma chags pa/ /

bla ma smod par byed pa'o/ /'di yi srung dang byin rlabs kyis/ /da lta ru ni spang bar gsol/ /de ltar min na khyed cag kun/ /rang gi bstan pa 'di la ni/ /brdzun gyis sgrub po bslus 'gyur bas/ /khyed rnams dam tshig 'gal ba'o/ /de dag thams

cad mgrin gcig tu/ /bdag gis spangs kyi 'dod bzhin gyis/ /dgyes te bsad dbyung rang lha yi/ /'khor lo ru ni gzhug par bya/ /bsrung ba la sogs rnams dang yang / /de yi lha rnams mnan bya'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas rnams kun bgegs dgra'i gzugs/ /sngon
