bzhin phur bus bskyed byas nas/ /g.yas pas tho ba gzung byas nas/ /g.yon pas mgul pa brten byas te/ /stong pa dran par bya ba'i phyir/ /sngags 'dis rab tu btab pa'o/ /oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya sarba du Sh+T+rA na phaT/ ka'i la ya ka'i la ya sarba duSh+T+rA na ye shes srung ma phaT/

hUM hUM hUM badzra kI la ya/ badzra d+ha ro A dz+nya pa ya ti/ sarba du Sh+T+rA na ye shes sems dpa'i kA ya wAka tsit+ta badzra kI la ya hUM phaT/ de yis rang gi ye shes sems/ /gnyis su med par 'gyur bar bsam/ /skra bshig gcer bu 'bru mar byugs/ /'jigs bcas dran nyams srog med pa/ /

me la gnas shing gzi brjid bral/ /skyabs byed srung mas rnam spangs pas/ /khang stong lta bur bsams nas ni/ /las kyi dngos gzhi la 'jug bya/ /sngon bzhin thams cad rab byas la/ /dang po mgon po las byung ba/ /sa bon las skyes kha bzhi pa'i/ /rtse lnga mgon pos

byin gyis brlabs/ /'od zer bde gshegs thams cad la/ /bsgrub bya'i skyon brjod de dag kun/ /mi bskyod ngo bor khror gyur nas/ /zhugs bzhin de la thim par 'gyur/ /de gnyis zhu bar gyur pa las/ /g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang mi bskyod pa/ /drag po sbrul gyi ske

rags can/ /mgon po rten sogs kyis mtshan pa/ /dang po sbyor bas rnam bsgoms te/ /de kho na bzhin rtag pa sogs/ /sbyor ba gnyis pas bsgom byas te/ /mchod pa sogs kyis mnyes par bya/ /de nas badzra ng+h+r-ika sogs ni/ /yid kyis brjod pas rab bskul la/ /

sangs rgyas zhi ba'i tshul spros pas/ /skrag pa spang phyir dang po dgra/ /'od kyi gong bu'i tshul du ni/ /sha glan phyir na gnas gsum du/ /btsud de rang sngags brjod pa yis/ /ji ltar gzugs bzhin spro bar bya/ /oM AHbadzra b+h+r-ika che ge mo mA ra ya phaT hUM/ sems lus khros pa'i

khro bo che/ /mi sdug 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs/ /gsod pa'i don rnams sems pa'i phyir/ /sta gri tho ba sogs 'dzin spro/ /gzhan yang gri dang ka pA la 'dzin/ /skra 'greng srin po'i tshogs rnams dang / /ring du sgra 'byin pa yi tshogs/ /khwa dang bya rog sna tshogs spro/ /bya

rgod lcags kyi mchu can dang / /lcags kyi mche ba can gyi khyis/ /nam mkha'i khams kun gang bar bsgom/ /bskal pa'i me bzhin 'bar ba yis/ /gru gsum la gnas sngon bzhin du/ /gnas pa'i bsgrub bya de dag gis/ /khros nas rtog cing 'thab pa'i tshul/ /drag po'i

tshig gis bskul bar bya/ /sha rnams gcod cing rgyus rkang drangs/ /rus 'chos khrag 'thungs rab bsgoms te/ /dus bzhir rab tu brtan byas te/ /nyi ma bdun du bsgrub par bya/ /de ltar bsgoms na dgra rnams 'chi/ /snying rje'i dbang gis 'og bzhin brtsam/ /gal te

rmongs pas 'grub mi 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'dzin yang zla phyed 'chi/ /sngon bzhin thams cad rab byas la/ /gshin rje gshed kyi 'khor lo che/ /rang gi rdo rje rab brtan la/ /gsum pas las 'di brtsam pa'o/ /oM AHya mAn+ta kr-ita hUM phaT/ /de yis ba spu bu ga las/ /zhi ba'i tshul

spros sangs rgyas kyis/ /sems can bsdu par byas nas su/ /rang gi sku gsung 'khor lo gzhug /oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwI kri tA na na che ge mo na sha ya s+t+waM b+ha ya mA ra ya hUM phaT/ brjod pas de dag spro bar bya/ /gshin rje gshed gzugs 'ba' zhig tu/ /spros pas gdug sems dgra bo rnams/ /

sngon bzhin gcod par byed par bsam/ /thun mtshams bzhi ru zhag bdun du/ /brtan pas rab tu chags byas nas/ /ma mo'i bdag gshed yang 'chi na/ /gdug sems ldan pa smos ci dgos/ /rtse gcig ma gyur pa yis kyang / /bsrung ba'i dam tshig bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /nyin mtshan

bzlas pa la sogs brtson/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pas gdug pa gzhom/ /thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la/ /rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i/ /gdug pa'i dgra bo 'ba' zhig gam/ /'khor lor bcas pa bsam byas nas/ /mchod pa sogs kyis

mnyes par bya/ /oM AHbig+h+nAn+ta kr-ita che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ brjod pas ba spu'i bu ga las/ /gong ma lta bu'i srin po dang / /gtum zhing mi bzad khro bo spros/ /me steng gnas pa'i bsgrub bya ni/ /bcings shing brdegs pa la sogs pas/ /de ni skrag par byas par bsam/ /de

bzhin 'ug pa khwa ta dang / /ring du sgra 'byin pa spros pas/ /mig dang rna ba la sogs par/ /rtse zhing deng bar rab bsams te/ /skrag cing 'jigs par bsams gyur nas/ /dgra bo da yi mod la 'chi/ /de bzhin sbrul nag mgo brgya pa/ /re re lce gnyis mche phreng can/ /rgyud dang

gnas dug bdag nyid spro/ /dpral bar dug bsams gdug pa 'chi/ /yang na bdag gi lag pa ru/ /tho ba rab tu drag po bsam/ /bsgrub bya gong mas mdun bkug la/ /'og ma'i sngags kyis snying gar brdeg /de bzhin lag na gnas pa yi/ /rdo rje ste gri gtun shin

sogs/ /bsgrub bya bshig cing gtub bsams na/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'ang 'chi bar 'gyur/ /sngags kyi cha lugs dran byas nas/ /phyag 'tshal la sogs sbyor ba yis/ /spros pa rnams kyis bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /sngags 'di brjod par bya ba'o/ /na maHsa man+ta kA ya

wAka tsit+ta badzrA NAM/ /oM hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Sha tiSh+Sha ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ gar+dz+dza gar+dz+dza/ bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ che ge mo'i srog dzI bi tA na ka ra ya phaT/ sngags rgyud sbyin sreg las rnams la/ /'di yi las la de mchog yin/ /phyogs bcu sems can thams

cad la/ /'tshe zhing gnod pa 'byung ba yi/ /dgra rnams 'jig par byed pa la/ /bskul ba dam pa 'di mchog yin/ /snga ma bzhin du thams cad la/ /sku gsung thugs kyi snying po mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i/ /dang po las byung hri bskyed do/ /de la tri shUl hri

yis mtshan/ /de yis sangs rgyas thams cad kun/ /mkha' 'gro'i gzugs byas hri la zhugs/ /de gnyis rdo rje mkha' 'gror bskyed/ /drag po mi sdug khros pa ni/ /ut+pal sngon po lta bu la/ /g.yas dkar g.yon dmar phyag drug pa/ /dang po rdo rje mkha' 'gro

'khyud/ /g.yas pa tri shUl rdo rje bsnams/ /g.yon pa thod pa rin chen 'dzin/ /nyi ma'i gdan la brkyang bskum du/ /khro bo'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa bskyed/ /dkon mchog gzhom pa la sogs pa'i/ /bsgrub bya nam mkha'i dbus su ni/ /khaM bskyed dmar gyis rgyal ba

ltar/ /brgyangs pa'i ye shes drang byas nas/ /mi bskyod pa ru bskyed byas te/ /lus de khang stong lta bur bsams/ /bdag gi lce la hrIHbsams te/ /de ni 'od zer mthing ga dang / /dkar ser dmar po ljang khu'i tshogs/ /lus dang yan lag bzhi ru bsam/ /rang gi

mtshan ma tri shUl dang / /rdo rje rin chen phur bu yis/ /gong ma rab tu phug byas te/ /bsam gtan sngags kyi sbyor ba yis/ /'od zer lnga yis thod pa ru/ /khrag drang pa ni bsam par bya/ /hUM hri khaM badzra ng+h+r-ika ni a nu ka sa ma ya rak+ta A kaR+Sha ya tsu sha ya hUM/ brtan par zhag bdun

thun bzhi ru/ /byas pas sangs rgyas chos sku yang / /skams par 'gyur na gdug pa kun/ /smos ci dgos te de lta yin/ /thams cad snga ma bzhin byas te/ /brgyud kyis dbyug sngon 'og bzhin bskyed/ /mchod pa bzlas pa mnyes byas la/ /sngags rgyud ldan pa'i las brtsam mo/ /

sha chen dur khrod sol ba dang / /bal mi kham sa khre tsi phug /bsgrub bya'i rkang rjes rnams dang ni/ /bong bu'i gcin gyis gzugs brnyan bya/ /de yi snying gar dur ras la/ /sna tshogs rdo rje rgya gram la/ /gnas pa'i me yi dkyil 'khor te/ /bsgrub bya'i ming dang phreng sngags spel/ /zhi ba'i

sa bon bton nas su/ /hUM phaT ldan par mi dgug par/ /dug khrag rams gyis bri byas la/ /de yi snying gar gzhug par bya/ /bsgrub bya bkug ste bcug byas na/ /rabs chad thod pa kha sbyar gzhag /shin tu khros pa'i g.yon pa yis/ /mnan te brgya dang brgyad du ni/ /nyi ma'i

gung dang nam phyed du/ /bzlas te rdo dang rus pa dang / /nim pa'i lo ma rnams kyis ni/ /gzugs brnyan de ni mnan par bya/ /na maHsa man+ta kA ya wAka tsit+ta badzrA NAM/ oM e h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn nI la badzra daN+Da/ ku ru ku ru/ la hu la hu/ hA hA/ ku la ku la/ ku la

pA ya ku la pA ya/ kra ma kra ma/ b+ha ga bAn/ ba yu be ge na/ bu dan shi kran/ da ha da ha/ ha ra ha ra/ ba ha ba ha/ ha na ha na/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ma ta ma ta/ ma ta pA ya ma ta pA ya/ sarba karma ni tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha/ bin+d+ha bin+d+ha/ bak+Sha ya bak+Sha ya/ me te maM sarba ru d+hi ra/ ma ma sa med madz+dza ru ti pri ya/

e h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn sarba big+h+nAM/ mU la karma ni/ sarba mU la gra ha na/ ha na ha na/ bany+dza bany+dza/ marda marda/ i di me gany+ya s+ya da ya/ hUM nI la ya nI la ya badzra/ d+ha na d+ha na/ du ru du ru/ big+h+nAM bi nA ya ka nA sha ya/ hu druM hu druM/ dIp+ta d+ha d+ha ya/ sarba man+t+ra na sha tru nAn/ hr-i da ya ni/ pri da ya/

tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha/ bid+ya nAn/ tiSh+Tha a nu smA ra ya sa ma ya badzra da ra pa tsa nAn/ da ra ma ni ni krin+ta hUM/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ du ru du ru/ ku ru ku ru/ phaT phaT/ hUM hUM kri dan+ta ya/ dai ba r-i Shi bir+ya ka pa ya/ badzra dan te na che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ g.yel med pa yis zhag bdun du/ /mtshan

ma mnan nas bzlas byas pas/ /de yi nyi ma kho na la/ /gdug pa rnams ni gsod par byed/ /de ru gal te ma grub na/ /nam phyed dus su dur khrod du/ /gang gi gzugs brnyan khyer nas ni/ /mi ro bsregs pa'i thal ba la/ /mngon spyod hom khung gzhung bzhin byas/ /nim pa'i

me ni sbar byas nas/ /zhal dang spyan rnams 'gyur ba yi/ /dbyig sngon kha gdangs dbus bsams la/ /gzugs brnyan mtshon cha rnon po yis/ /g.yon pa'i rkang nas bcad gtubs nas/ /gong gi sngags bzlas sbyin sreg bya/ /de yi mtshan mo 'chi bar nges/ /yang ni khro bo gang rung

gi/ /bzlas pas sngags pa dag byas la/ /rab tu dben pa'i gnas dag tu/ /'bum phrag tu ni rang sngags bzlas/ /ma mo'i gnas sam dur khrod dam/ /khang stong dang ni bzhi mdo dang / /ling ga gcig pa shing gcig drung / /mngon spyod las ni brtsam pa'o/ /dbyug sngon can bsrung rdzas

la ni/ /gzugs brnyan ming dang bcas byas nas/ /gan rkyal du ni gzhag byas te/ /dgug pa sngon 'gro kha sbyar dbye/ /de nas khro bo gang rung gi/ /rnal 'byor khros byas khrag chu yis/ /gsher ba'i gos ni gyon pa'am/ /bshang gcis sa gsher ba'i gos gyon bya/ /gzugs

brnyan rkang pas mnan nas ni/ /mngon sum bzhin du bsams byas nas/ /rang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad du bzla/ /de bzhin chu dron 'ba' zhig gam/ /bshang gcis gsher bar byas pa'i gos/ /ngan pa rul pa dri mnam pa/ /bgos te sngon bzhin bzlas pa bya/ /de bzhin thal

pa'i skyo ma yis/ /gsher ba'i gos gyon lus ngan 'khrugs/ /sngon bzhin brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'ang 'jig par 'gyur/ /yang na gcer bur rab phyung ste/ /skra bshig thur du 'phyang byas te/ /mche gtsigs mig ni bsgyur byas la/ /rkang bas gzugs

brnyan mnan nas ni/ /sngon bzhin brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ /lus ngag yid gsum khro byas nas/ /thun bzhir zhag bdun sogs sbyar bas/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyang 'jig par nus/ /yang na gong ma'i gnas de ru/ /rnal 'byor der gnas phur bus gdab/ /ro bsregs

sol dang thal ba dang / /chu ngogs pa dang phub ma dang / /rkang rjes dang ni bshang gcis brdzis/ /bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan snying ga ru/ /ske tshe dug dang lan tshwa dang / /nyungs mar snag tshas dur ras la/ /khro bo rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i/ /lte bar sngags dang ming spel ba'i/ /rang rang

sngags ldan mi dgug par/ /bris nas snying gar gzhug pa'o/ /kha sbyor dbye ba sngon 'gro ba'i/ /dgug pas gzugs la phab nas su/ /mi yi rus pa las byas pa'i/ /sor brgyad pa yi phur bu la/ /rang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas/ /gzugs brnyan snying gar btab

nas ni/ /dgra yi khyim mam sgo'am ni/ /grong la sogs par sba bar bya/ /sangs rgyas sku gsum mchog sbyin pa/ /shes dang mi shes rnam spangs pa/ /zla ba phyed ni tshun chad kyis/ /skams sam yang na 'jigs par 'gyur/ /rdo rje gsum gyi rnal 'byor gyis/ /mngon spyod las

la bgegs dgras sbyar/ /dkyil 'khor gsum dang rigs lnga'i las/ /ting 'dzin dag pas byed phyir ro/ /de yi rnal 'byor sngon bzhin bya/ /gzugs brnyan gong ma bzhin byas la/ /dgug pa sngon du 'gro ba yis/ /rtag pa'i sbyor bas las 'di

bya/ /mi yi rus pa'i phur bu la/ /sor brgyad rtse mor 'khor lo bsam/ /me tog sngon pos mchod cing ni/ /'khyil pa'i sngags ni rig bcas bzla/ /de yis spyi bor btab gyur na/ /rtag pa yang ni klad gzer can/ /'gyur na bdag sems ldan pa yi/ /dgra bo dag ni smos ci

dgos/ /de bzhin seng ldeng rtse mo las/ /byas pa'i phur bus pad+ma can/ /byin gyis brlabs bzlas sngon bzhin mchod/ /snying gar btab nas ling ga de/ /thod pa kha sbyar nang bcug ste/ /dur khrod me la gdung byas na/ /tsha ba'i nad kyis 'debs byed pas/ /dpag med rnal

'byor gyis bya'o/ /de bzhin mi bskyod rnal 'byor pas/ /gsod byed lcags byas phur bu la/ /rdo rje rtse mor byin brlabs la/ /mchod cing sngags bzlas snying gar gdab/ /me 'bar nang du de bcas bskur/ /de yi mod la gang sbyar ba'i/ /sku gsum 'jig par byed pa ste/ /

bdag sems ldan pa smos ci dgos/ /bdud ci 'khyil pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /sngon bzhin gzugs brnyan rab byas la/ /de mnan khro bo bka' nod bsgo/ /de nas btang nas bkug ste gzhug /sngon ma'am yams nad 'tshe ba'am/ /yul du sna tshogs 'byung byed pa/ /

gzugs brnyan de la phab nas ni/ /snying ga nas ni rkang pa'i bar/ /de bzhin du ni spyi bo'i bar/ /rdo rje gsum gyi sngags brjod cing / /gdug dang sdig pa bsal byas nas/ /che ge lus ngag yid gsum la/ /rdo rje phur bus thob ces pa'i/ /sngags ni gong ma bzhin du brjod/ /

thun bzhir g.yel med zhag bdun du/ /phur bu'i rnam 'phrul 'di bya'o/ /bsam gtan rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'bebs/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /phur bu btab na'ang myur du 'chi/ /de bzhin bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yi/ /rnal 'byor sngon

bzhin rab byas te/ /kha sbyor dbye ba sngon 'gro ba'i/ /sbyor ba bdun gyis bsgrub par bya/ /dur khrod thal ba la sogs la/ /sngon bzhin gzugs dang ming bcas pa/ /dgug pa sngon 'gro dur khrod du/ /skra bshig gcer bur phyung byas te/ /mtshan ma mnan nas sngon ma

yi/ /sngags ni brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzla/ /zhag ni bdun du thun bzhi ru/ /sbyor ba de yis khams gsum 'jig /ro bsregs thal ba 'ba' zhig la/ /gzugs brnyan la sogs sngon bzhin byas/ /gong ltar stong rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ /sbyor ba yis de mod la 'chi/ /chu

'gram gnyis kyis ba sogs la/ /bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan rab byas te/ /ske tshe lan tshwa 'bru mar dang / /dug dang da dur snag tshar sbyar/ /dur khrod ras la de yi ming / /sngags spel bris nas ming bcug ste/ /gan rkyal mgo ni byang du bstan/ /srang ko tsa dang 'byi tse ka /

gzhan ma btsos pas de'i lus la/ /til 'bru tsam du btsags byas la/ /bskul ba'i tshig dang sngags bcas pa/ /dgang zhing thun bzhir zhag bdun byas/ /sbyor ba de yis sangs rgyas kyang / /'jig par 'gyur na gnod sbyin kun/ /smos ci dgos te de lta yin/ /rus phye

dug dang khrag rnams la/ /gzugs brnyan ming dang bcas byas la/ /sol khur spangs ba'i gos gon la/ /khros nas rkang pas mnan te bzlas/ /che ge mo rak+Sha seng kra ha ya/ bskul ba'i tshigs bcad thun bzhi ru/ /zhag bdun bzlas pas dgra bo de/ /srin pos khyer bar

gdon mi za/ /ske tshe mar dang bshang gcir sbyar/ /gzugs brnyan yog par blugs byas la/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i rkang pa mchog /me yi 'khor lor byin gyis brlab/ /pra sha dza la che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ gong gi sngags spel thun bzhi ru/ /zhag bdun g.yel med

sems kyis bsgrub/ /tsha ba'i nad kyis 'debs par byed/ /gang yang rung ba'i rnal 'byor pas/ /thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la/ /phran tshegs rdo rje gsang ba yi/ /gsang ba'i las 'di bsgrub pa'o/ /rdo rgyus sam dur khrod sol ba la/ /de nyid gsum gyi bar bcug

pa'i/ /khaM ni brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ /dur khrod sa la sbrul gzugs bri/ /nag po mi sdug 'jigs byed pa/ /'od 'bar sems 'khrugs mche phreng gtams/ /lce gnyis myug pa mig bgrad pa/ /mjug ma rdeb pa'i tshul can no/ /de yi kha ru mi bzad

dug /sreg byed lta bu dmar nag tu/ /gnas pa'i yi ge khaM bsams te/ /de yis sbrul de gnas las bskyod/ /de yi lce yi rtse mo la/ /hrI ljang khu yi lcags kyu yis/ /rgyu ba dang ni gnas pa'i dug /ha la ha la la sogs kun/ /bkug ste bsdus nas khyer 'ongs nas/ /

lce yi rtse la gzhug par bya/ /de yis khams gsum dug blangs nas/ /de nyid dug gis gang bar bsam/ /oM kr-iSh+Na sarba che ge mo'i dpral gr-ih+Na na khaM hri phaT/ brjod pas de sod dpral bar bzung / /mche bas phug ste lces reg pas/ /rdo rje 'chang ba chen po yang / /dug gis

'chi nges dogs pa med/ /de kho na bzhin sdig pa dang / /sre mong lta ba e na pa/ /chu sbrul rlung sbrul la sogs pa/ /sa yi zas can sbal pa las/ /bsgrub bya 'dzin du gzhug pa'i phyir/ /bri ba'i rdzas dang gzugs dang bskul/ /gdug pa kun nas rbad btang bas/ /de yis

mi 'chi dogs pa med/ /gshin rje gshed kyi sbyor ldan pas/ /thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la/ /dkon mchog gnod byed gzhom pa'i phyir/ /sbyor ba bzhi yis bsgrub par bya/ /oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na che ge mo pa ta ya hUM phaT/ de yis dur khrod sol ba la/ /stong rtsa brgyad ni

btab nas kyang / /ro bsregs shul gyi sa la yang / /bsgrub bya'i gzugs bris bkug ste gzhug /bkas ba'i bsam pas sol ba de/ /gong gi sngags bzlas spu gri ltar/ /bsams te mgul pa'am spyi bo nas/ /de ltar thun bzhir zhag bdun sbyar/ /spyi bo 'gas sam

mgo 'chad par/ /'gyur bar 'di la som nyi med/ /de bzhin de 'dra'i rnal 'byor pas/ /de nyid lag pa g.yas par 'gyur/ /mdun du bsgrub bya'i lus bsams la/ /sngags 'di nyid kyis bsnun zhing brgyab/ /oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na che ge mo mu t+ka ra a ta ya hUM phaT/ de yis

thun bzhir zhag bdun du/ /bsnun zhing brdungs pas bsgrub bya de/ /g.yang du ltung nas 'chi bar nges/ /yang na de yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /g.yas par hUM las byung ba yi/ /rdo rje rtse lngas bsgrub bya yi/ /lus la bsnun zhing 'di brjod do/ /oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na che ge mo badzra a ko Ta ya

hUM phaT/ de yis thun bzhir zhag bdun du/ /kha phye bsnun pas bsgrub bya de/ /srin po la sogs 'jigs par byed/ /de ltar de yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /sngon bzhin sngags btab rdo rgyus sam/ /sol bas dur khrod sa gzhi la/ /bsgrub bya pho mo'i gzugs bris la/ /hUM bskyed sta

gri lag par bsam/ /khros te mgul par sngags bzlas nas/ /mid pa bcad par bsam pa ni/ /sbyor ba thun bzhir zhag bdun du/ /oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na che ge mo wAka ti pa ta hUM phaT/ brjod cing g.yel ba med pa yis/ /bzlas pas bsgrub bya mgul 'gags nas/ /kha zas

mi thar nad kyis 'dzin/ /de bzhin bgegs dgra'i sbyor ba yis/ /ro bsregs thal ba rus la sogs/ /khro bo nyi shu'am de phyed kyis/ /me thab dkyil 'khor gru gsum bya/ /mar chen dud pas kha dog bsgyur/ /kha phye rdo rje rtse gsum pas/ /dbus su kha khyer gsum byas te/ /

tsher ma'i me ni khros nas sbar/ /bshad pa'i cho gas me lha bskyed/ /gong gsungs rdzas byas gzugs brnyan gtub/ /de yi zhal du lan gsum du/ /gang ba'i sbyin sreg dbul bar bya/ /de yi ye shes sems dpa' ru/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pa zhal gdangs pa/ /hUM ljags mche ba

rnon po can/ /khro dang ldan pa sngon bzhin bsam/ /srog song steng ngam sra ba'am/ /yang na ci yang med pa ru/ /rkang pas rkang pa mnan nas su/ /sos ni so yang 'cha' bar byed/ /ba lang sha dang khyi yi sha/ /zangs phud can sogs sha rnams ni/ /bsgrub bya'i yan lag tu bsams

la/ /gong ma'i sngags kyis sbyin sreg bya/ /sha chen 'ba' zhig kho na la/ /dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni/ /de yi zhal du sbyin sreg byas/ /rdo rje las byung 'jig par bshad/ /sngon bzhin dgra yi gzugs brnyan la/ /bshang gci 'bru mar bcas byugs nas/ /sngon

gsungs sngags dang bskul bar bya/ /tsher ma'i me la khros te bsreg /thun bzhir zhag bdun brgya rtsa brgyad/ /bzlas pas sangs rgyas kyis sbyar ba'i/ /las kyang 'jig na dgra bo yi/ /sbyar ba'i las ni smos ci dgos/ /bsad pas de dag thams cad

kun/ /thugs rjes bzung phyir rnal 'byor ches/ /gnyis bral 'das pa'i de ma thag /'jug pa'i las 'di brtsam pa'o/ /de dag rnams kyis dngos po rnams/ /ma skyes par ni gzhig nas kyang / /'bras bu myong bar nges pa'i tshul/ /ye shes rang rig chen po mchog /

sa bon 'od zer gyis bkug nas/ /zhal du zhugs nas zhu gyur te/ /rdo rje lam byung pad+mar gnas/ /ye shes bdud rtsi'i gzugs gyur la/ /spyan sogs lha mos bskul pa la/ /hUM las rdo rje hUM gis mtshan/ /spro bsdus mi bskyod rdo rjer bskyed/ /chos kyi dbyings su byin gyis

brlab/ /rang las dgu gnyis drug phyung nas/ /gnyis dang gsum du rdzogs byas la/ /dang po rtog pa yongs dag phyir/ /sngags kyis phur bu dbyung bar bya/ /oM AHbadzra kI li ki lA ya hUM/ phyung nas de yi gnas su yang / /rang gi ye shes 'khor lo can/ /gnas bcas

bsams nas 'od zer gyis/ /sngon bzhin rang sgra sangs rgyas su/ /bskyed dang des bskyed lha mo'i tshogs/ /bdud rtsi lngas gang bum pa yis/ /dbang bskur de dang bla mar bcas/ /zhugs pas rdo rje sems dpar bskyed/ /oM badzra ng+h+r-ika sngags kyis phyung ste/ /mdun du rlung gi

dkyil 'khor steng / /'khor lo bcas pa mos byas la/ /mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang ba bya/ /a ho yaM gi sngags brjod pas/ /rlung gis bteg nas mngon dga' ru/ /gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags 'phangs pas/ /de dag sras su skye bar nges/ /rang rang lha yi sbyor

ba'am/ /de yi gnas pa gang rung du/ /blo gros ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /sbyor ba de kho na yis bya/ /gnyis po rang zhugs de ma thag /de yi ye shes rang lha'am/ /zhe sdang dag pa'i sbyor kho nas/ /gong ma bzhin du rab tu brtsam/ /bdag med sems med bems po ni/ /

lan gsum gyis ni gzhig byas pas/ /gong gi sbyor bas 'bras bu che/ /mjug tu brtsam mi dgos par 'byung / /de ltar thabs dang sngags ldan pas/ /'khor ba'i 'og ma'i rgyu ldan pa/ /bsad pas rang dang gzhan dag pas/ /ma 'khrul pa ru gsungs ba'o/ /sred pa

zhe sdang gis bslang ba'i/ /sems kyis gsod pa'i gti mug can/ /thabs med ye shes dang bral bas/ /thur du bltas te dmyal bar 'gro/ /da ni gnas nas spro ba'i cho ga bshad par bya'o/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la/ /gnyis kyi rab

tu bsgrub byas pa/ /gsum pa las 'di brtsam pa'o/ /thod pa srubs ni gang ba dag /pho dang mo yi bskrad pa la/ /de yi rigs pas btsal byas la/ /gnod byed yul gzhan dbyung bar bya/ /a ri lo ma'i khu ba dang / /rkang pa g.yon pa'i srin lag khrag /snag tshar

byas te bya rgod kyi/ /sgo rtsa'i smyu gus bri bar bya/ /mgar ba'i dur khrod ras ma la/ /gzhu 'dra rlung gi dkyil 'khor steng / /ral gri yis ni mtshan pa bri/ /de steng bsgrub bya'i gzugs gzhag la/ /gong gi ras la de yi ming / /sngags kyi bar bcug che ge mo/ /uts+tsha ta ya phaT

bris la/ /de yi snying gar gzhug par bya/ /bkug ste bcug nas de dkris la/ /thod pa ru ni bcug byas te/ /khro bo'i tshig gi rang rang sngags/ /rig dang bcas par brgya rtsa brgyad/ /thun bzhir zhag bdun bzlas byas nas/ /khyim mam grong ngam sgo dag tu/ /sbas te bzhag

na dus de ru/ /sangs rgyas dpung yang skrod par 'gyur/ /de bzhin tA la'i lo ma la/ /gro ga'am shog shog ras la sogs/ /snod med cho gas gong ma ltar/ /stong rtsa brgyad ni rig bcas bzlas/ /dgra yi khyim mam sgo dag tu/ /sbas te bzhag na myur ba ru/ /dkon

mchog 'joms pa'i dgra bo che/ /skams sam 'chi'am skrod par nges/ /las de bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yi/ /sbyor ba yis kyang rab tu bsgrub/ /thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la/ /cho ga 'di ni rab tu brtsam/ /rgyal mtshan ras ni chag gang la/ /gru bzhi lham par kha ti dang / /a ri

sha yi lo ma dang / /ro bsregs smyo byed sol ba dang / /mu zi'i dug dang rkang g.yon gyi/ /ming med khrag la snag tshar byas/ /khwa yi gshog pa'i smyu gu yis/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu 'dra la/ /phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad rtse bstan pa'i/ /ral

gri brgyad pa'i 'khor lo la/ /de dbus bsgrub bya'i gzugs bris la/ /de yi snying gar phreng sngags ni/ /gong gi rig pa dang bcas pa/ /dgug med bris nas snying gar glan/ /bkug ste bcug nas rkang g.yon gyis/ /mnan te brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzlas/ na maHsa man+ta kA ya

wAka tsit+ta badzrA NAM/ na mo badzra kro d+hA ya/ ma hA daM Sh+T+rA+o Ta/ /ka Ta b+hai ra ba ya/ a si mu sa la pa ra shu/ bA sha hastA ya/ oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li kha kha khA hi khA hi/ /tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ /ha na ha na/ pa tsa pa tsa/ gardza gardza/ bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ sarba big+h+nAM/ bi nA ya ka naM/ che ge mo uts+tsha ta ya

phaT/ de yang phyag 'tshal mjug tu yang / /bskul ba 'di ni bya ba dang / /phyag 'tshal bskul dang bod pa dang / /las brgyad de dag tu shes bya/ /de ltar bsngags nas ras ma de/ /ma mo la sogs gnas su sba/ /sangs rgyas dpung yang skrod byed na/ /bgegs kyi gnod pa smos

ci dgos/ /da ni bsgrub bya srin po la sogs pas 'dzin du gzhug pa'i chog bshad par bya'o/ /thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la/ /gzhan gyis mi thub rnal 'byor gyis/ /gsum pa'i dus su rdzas ldan par/ /cho ga 'di yis las 'di byed/ /rgyal mtshan dang ni mtshon bsnun dang / /

shi ba'i thod pa gnyis btsal la/ /dur khrod kyi ni sol ba la/ /khro bo'i sngags ni rig bcas bzlas/ /de yi thod par srin po'i gzugs/ /'jigs rung gyen brdzes mche gtsigs pa/ /sha rlon za zhing khrag 'dzag pa/ /g.yas g.yon ro langs gri dang ni/ /sdigs 'dzub byad

pa hUM bskyed bri/ /de yi snying gar rus phye dang / /dug dang mthe'u chung khrag gis ni/ /che ge mo ni zung shig bri/ /yang ni thod pa gnyis pa la/ /bsgrub bya'i rkang rjes sa dang ni/ /ro bsregs sa dang thal ba dang / /sol ba gcin gyis sbrus byas la/ /de yi gzugs brnyan byas

nas su/ /dug dang rus phye mdzub mo'i khrag /ming dang sngags bcas ta ler bris/ /de yis snying gar gzhug par bya/ /gnyi ga bkug ste bcug byas nas/ /de ni 'og bzhag gong ma steng / /srin po de yis bsgrub bya rnams/ /bzung bar bsams nas khros byas te/ /nag

po gnyis la dur khrod du/ /nam phyed song nas bsgreng byas te/ /sngags bzlas srin po'i 'dzin par 'gyur/ /na maHsa man+ta naM/ kA ya wAka tsit+ta badzrA NAM/ oM hUM dzi na ri ta che ge mo rak+Sha g+hi ha naM hUM phaT/ de bzhin sbrul dang seng+ge dang / /'byung po sdig la sogs pa rnams/ /cho ga gong

bzhin gnyis par bri/ /gong gi sngags de rigs bcas bzla/ /g.yeng med gnyis kyi mtshan dus su/ /khros nas bsgreng zhing bzlas byas pas/ /gal te mi bskyod yin na yang / /de dag rnams kyis 'dzin par 'gyur/ /de dag thar bar byed 'dod pas/ /'dzin byed de dag thams

cad kun/ /bsgrub bya'i lus la bsdus byas la/ /rkang pa gnyis kyis mnye bar bya/ /lag gnyis 'bar ba'i rdo rjer bskyed/ /de yis dbyug pas brdung bar bya/ /rdo rje 'bar bas brdung ba dang / /sngon gyi sngags bzlas lcug mas gdab/ /che ge mo rak+Sha sa 'di phyi mo tsa yi/ /srin

mo ma rungs gtum mo dang / /'jigs pa chen pos 'khrugs pa la/ /sbyor ba de yis rab sbyar na/ /cho ga bzhin du grol bar byed/ /da ni dgug pa'i cho ga rgyas par bshad par bya'o/ /ri mo'i dkyil 'khor bris nas su/ /lha yis dbang bskur yan chad ni/ /thams cad gong

ma bzhin byas la/ /bsam gtan 'khor los dgug par bsgrub/ /rnam par snang mdzad sbyor ba yis/ /'khor lo chen po rnam par bsams/ /mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang byas la/ /lcags kyu gnas ni bsgom par bya/ /oM AHdzin dzika che ge mo sems can nam sems

can ma yin pa A kaR+Sha ya dzaH/ brjod pas de las rab 'phros pas/ /lcags kyu zhags pas mtshan pa yi/ /lha yi sku ni mang po dag /bsgrub bya 'gugs phyir spro bar bya/ /dgug bya ming gi yi ges bskyed/ /yaM byung rlung dkyil la bzhag ste/ /lcags kyus snying btab zhags

pas bcings/ /rlung gis bteg nas 'ong bar bsam/ /rdo rje pad+ma 'khor lo sogs/ /mtshan ma'i lha rnams spros byas nas/ /de yis btab pas de bzhin du/ /dgug par the tshom med pa'o/ /laM gis phab ste mdun bzhag nas/ /sngon bzhin lha mo

gnyis kyis ni/ /'tshe ba bzlog nas bka' nod bsam/ /de ltar sbyor bas zhag bdun du/ /thun bzhir rab tu sbyar byas nas/ /dgug las mi 'da' kun gyis kyang / /sgrub po las thabs byed par 'gyur/ /de bzhin mi bskyod rdo rje dang / /rnam par snang mdzad 'od dpag med/ /

'khor lo chen po'i sbyor ba yis/ /lcags kyus gnas bsam rang sngags brjod/ /oM AHbadzra ng+h+r-ika che ge mo A kaR+Sha ya dzaH/ oM AHa ro l-ika che ge mo A kaR+Sha ya dzaH/ gzhan kun sngon bzhin dpag byas la/ /thun bzhir zhag bdun sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje gsum gyi nus pa yang / /

'gugs 'gyur bsgrub bya smos ci dgos/ /sems kyi spyod pa gzhan bral bas/ /rdzogs chen rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor bas/ /de yi bsam gtan 'ba' zhig gis/ /dgug pa dag ni thabs su gsungs/ /dga' dang dga' ba rab dga' yi/ /skyed pa gong du mngon byas la/ /

bsgrub bya ye shes ngo bo ru/ /byas te gnyis par chud byas te/ /ma 'phros rtse gcig pa yis gzung / /ye shes gsum gyis sku gsum mchog /de yi rgyud la 'gugs 'gyur na/ /sngags rgyud la sogs bsgrub bya ni/ /smos ci dgos te de mchog yin/ /de bas rnam pa thams

cad du/ /las rnams kun 'di bstan pa yin/ /lus sogs med pa'ang dgug sogs 'gyur/ /gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor pas/ /thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la/ /rang gi sngags kyi rig pa mchog /grangs med bzlas pa rab tu bya/ /de nas lus rtsal thob pa yis/ /

'bum phrag gcig ni bzlas pa bya/ /ri mo'i dkyil 'khor bris byas la/ /lha yis dbang bskur bar gyis zhugs/ /bud med gzhon nu'i thod pa ni/ /ma chag cing ni ma gas pa/ /pad+ma ltar mdzes yid du 'ong / /dum bu gcig pa blangs byas nas/ /gi wang la ni sngags bzlas

nas/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor steng du ni/ /pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad bris te/ /lte bar dgug par bya ba ni/ /gur gum go ro tsa nas bri/ /gro ga shog shog la sogs la/ /phreng sngags 'di ni mi dgug par/ /swA hA bton te dza bcug nas/ /bskul ba dang bcas bris nas ni/ /de yi

snying gar glan par bya/ /thod pa de yang kha sbubs nas/ /gshin rje gshed kyi zhabs g.yas brkyang / /g.yon pa bskum pas mnan byas la/ /khro dang bcas pas gsang sngags 'di/ /rdo rje gsum dang bcas bsams pas/ /lan gsum drag tu brjod par bya/ /na maHsa man+ta/

kA ya wAka tsit+ta badzrA NAM/ oM kha kha khA hi khA hi/ sarba duSh+T+rA nas twa da ma ka/ a si mu sa la pa ra shu pA sha ha stA ya/ tsa tur+b+hu dza tsa turmu kha/ Sho Da sha tsa rA ya/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ sarba duSh+T+rA na prA NAM a ha ri Ni/ ma hA big+hAn bi nA ya ka/ bi kr-i tA na na sarba b+hU ta b+ha ya ra ya/ A gat+ta ha sa da di

ni/ byA g+h+ra tsarma Ni ba sa na/ ku ru ku ru/ sarba karma tshin+d+hi tshi n+d+ha/ sarba man+t+raM b+hin+da b+hin+da/ pa ra mu traM/ bu mo che ge A kaR+Sha ya A kaR+Sha ya/ sarba b+hU tAM/ nir ma tha ya nir ma tha ya/ sarba du Sh+T+rAn/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ maN+Dal ma bi bi be ba swA hA/ dzI bi tAn+ta ka pri ya/ ku ru ku ru/

ma ma kaR+YaM/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ma bi lam+ba ma bi lam+ba/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra hUM hUM phaT phaT/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ sarba nA sha ya ni suM ka ra ka ra/ he he b+ha ga bAn/ kany+tsi ra ya si ma ma ar+tha sA d+ha yadz+dza/ de las 'phros pa'i gshin rje gshed/ /lcags kyu thogs pa mang po yis/ /

sngon bzhin rlung dkyil la gnas pa'i/ /bsgrub bya bud med dgug par byed/ /skrag pas 'tshe ba bzlog pa'i phyir/ /spyan ma'i sngags kyis sngon bzhin du/ ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ /mA ma kI ni sbyor bas srung / /de bzhin skyes pa'i thod pa la/ /g.yon brkyang g.yas

bskum pas mnan te/ /cho ga sngon bzhin rab byas te/ /skyes pa rnams kyang dgug par byed/ /bsam gtan sngags rgyud sbyor ba yi/ /zhag bdun thun bzhir rab brtsams nas/ /gshin rje gshed kyi yon tan yang / /'gugs 'gyur gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /thams cad

snga ma bzhin byas la/ /'dod pa'i rgyal po khro bo che/ /'og nas 'byung ba'i cho gas bsgom/ /bu mo rnams ni dgug pa'i mchod// gshin rje gshed kyi rgyud gsungs pa'i/ /cho gas bsgrub bya bkug bcug nas/ /g.yon brkyang g.yas bskum gyis mnan

na/ /sngags 'dis rig bcas bzlas brjod bya/ /na maHsa man+ta/ kA ya wAka tsit+ta badzra NAM/ ta ki bu mo che ge mo hUM A kaR+Sha ya dzaH/ brjod pas sngags byung khro bo yis/ /lcags kyus sngon bzhin bkug byas nas/ /zhi ba srung ba'i cho ga yis/ /lha rnams la sogs 'gugs par byed/ /

sngon bzhin thams cad rab byas la/ /rdo rje las byung mi g.yo ni/ /'og nas 'byung bzhin rab bsgoms la/ /lha chen chung mar bcas pa dgug /skyes pa'i thod pa ma gas pa/ /mdzes shing srub med ma gas pa/ /'thab tshe g.yul du shi ba yi/ /skyon med pa de btsal bar bya/ /

rkang pa g.yas pa'i sor mo'i khrag /lan tshwa yungs kar ske tshe la/ /snag tsha byas la bya rgod rkang / /lha chen chung mar bcas pa kun/ /thod pa de la bri bar bya/ /de yi snying gar gong ma ltar/ /rig bcas sngags ni dgug par bya/ /bris nas snying gar glan par bya/ /bkug ste bcug

nas kha sbubs la/ /g.yon bskum g.yas brkyang pas mnan na/ /sngags 'di thun bzhir zhag bdun du/ /rig pa dang bcas bzlas dgug bya/ /na maHsa man+ta/ kA ya wAka tsit+ta badzrA NAM/ a tsa la ga na tsa ta/ na DA na DA/ mo Ta mo Ta/ spo ta spo ta/ da ha da ha/ mo ha mo ha/ sa ha sa ha/

ha na ha na/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ a bi sha a bi sha/ ma hA mat+ta pa la ka/ d+hu na d+hu na/ nyi ni nyi ni/ kha da kha da/ /big+hA ma ra ma ra duSh+Ta nAn/ b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha/ sarbaM ku ru ku ru/ ki ri ki ri/ ma hA bi sha badzra/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ hUM hUM hUM/ tri ba li baM ga na rta ya/ aM haM aM haM/ a tsa la tse ta/ spo ta ya

spo ta ya/ hUM hUM/ a sa man+ti ka/ tra ta ma hA ba la/ sa ma ya man+t+ra naM/ taM ma shu ta bu lo ka du sh+ya du/ badzra ni masta pri ti ha ta ba la bya/ dzal ya tra ta a ha sa na nam/ /lha chen po bud med dang bcas pa A kaR+Sha yadz+dza/ sngags las byung ba'i khro bo che/ /lcags kyu thogs pas 'gugs

bsams nas/ /sngon bzhin rab mchod bsrung ba yis/ /g.yog dang chung ma'i bya ba byed/ /de bzhin lha min la sogs kyang / /sbyor ba de yis rab bsgrubs na/ /skrag cing 'jigs pa gong mas bsrung / /kha sbyar lus su bcas pa 'grub/ /thams cad snga ma bzhin byas

la/ /'og nas 'byung ba'i cho ga yis/ /gnod mdzes rgyal po bsgoms byas te/ /bu mo rnams ni dgug par bya/ /mtshan rnams kun gyis rnam brgyan pa/ /rgyal mtshan gyur pa'i thod pa la/ /rkang pa g.yon pa'i ming med khrag /snag tsha byas nas ne tso'i sgros/ /bsgrub bya'i

bu mo'i gzugs bris la/ /de yi snying gar gong ma ltar/ /rig bcas sngags bri glan byas la/ /de yi b+ha gar gnod mdzes kyi/ /rkang po g.yon pa'i mthe bos mnan/ /thun bzhir zhag bdun gsang sngags 'di/ /bskul dang bcas pas khros byas nas/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du

bzlas pa'o/ /oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha bu mo che ge mo hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na bu mo che ge mo hUM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya/ bu mo che ge mo hUM/ A na ya hoHb+ha ga bAn bid+ya rA dza bu mo che ge mo hUM phaT dz+dza/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ /gnod mdzes gyur pa lcags kyu zhags/ /thogs pa 'phros pas

rlung dkyil la/ /gnas pa'i bu mo snying ga phug /zhags pas ske nas bcings nas ni/ /'ongs pa'i tshe na bzlog pa'i phyir/ /zhing dang bsrung bas brtan byas pas/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i las rnams byed/ /gang yang rung ba'i rnal 'byor pas/ /snga ma bzhin du thams cad bya/ /

kha ti la sogs bsgrub byas la/ /skyes pa bud med dgug pa bsgrub/ /zla ba spyang kis zin pa'i tshe/ /btsag gam rdo rgyus la sogs pa/ /rang gi kha ru bcug nas kyang / /de nyid gsum bskyed lha ru bsam/ /de bar rang sngags bcug nas ni/ /s+phar Na yis spro byas pas/ /

de las byung ba'i lha rnams ni/ /lcags kyus mtshan pas nam mkha' dgang / /bsdu ba'i sbyor bas kun bsdus nas/ /rdzas kyis lha la bstim par bya/ /brtan pa'i ngo bos yang dang yang / /zla ba grol gyi bar du gzung / /de nas brtsams te thun bzhi ru/ /zhag bdun goms

byas de bton la/ /tshangs pa drag po la sogs lha/ /gang gi ming rnams bris 'gyur na/ /rdo rje thugs kyi bka' bzhin du/ /skrag cing 'jigs nas 'ong 'gyur na/ /tha mal skyes pa bud med sogs/ /smos ci dgos par 'ong bar 'gyur/ /sngon bzhin

bzlas pa la sogs nas/ /dbang bskur yan chad zhugs byas te/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa las byung ba'i/ /thor tshugs gcig ma bsgom par bya/ /g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbu ma sngo/ /dang pos rang gi thabs la 'khyud/ /g.yas gnyis gri dang ral gri dang / /g.yon gnyis

thod pa nor bu bsnams/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam brgyan pa/ /rnam par smin sogs mos pa yis/ /rnga sgra dang ni ldan byas nas/ /cung zad mche gtsigs dmigs par bya/ /mtshams thung mi smrar gyur pa yi/ /thod pa klu shing me tog dang / /rkang pa g.yon pa'i ming med khrag /

bsres te 'o mar sbyar byas la/ /de yi skra yi bir gyis ni/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ /nor rgyas la sogs bu mo bri/ /de yi snying gar rig sngags ni/ /bskul ba dang bcas bris te glan/ /bkug ste bcug nas g.yas brkyang ste/ /g.yon bskum pa yis gnas byas la/ /

sngags 'di brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzlas/ /oM AHbadzra shu li ni klu'i bu mo che ge mo A kaR+Sha yadz+dza/ brjod pas gsum las byung ba yi/ /mdud can ma ni lcags kyus mtshan/ /rlung dkyil la gnas bsgrub bya ni/ /bcug ste sngon bzhin 'tshe ba bzlog /de ltar zhag bdun thun bzhi ru/ /

sngags rgyud de yis rab sbyar te/ /klu yi bu mo mig bzang dag /bkug nas nye bar spyad par bya/ /thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa las byung ba'i/ /khro gnyer ma yi sbyor ba yis/ /nam mkha'i rig 'dzin bu mo dgug /dmar skya g.yas sngo g.yon dkar ba/ /

dang po rang gi thabs la 'khyud/ /g.yas gnyis pad+ma ral gri 'dzin/ /g.yon gnyis rin chen 'khor lo 'dzin/ /gsum po mos pas dpag med mtshan/ /se ral thod pa'i phreng ba brgyan/ /rgyan kun brgyan pa'i na bza' bklubs/ /mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa bsgom/ /rgyal

po 'dra ba'i bu mo yi/ /thod par rig 'dzin bu mo'i gzugs/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ /gong gi rdzas kyis bri bar bya/ /snying gar sngon bzhin ming bris nas/ /bkug ste bcug nas g.yas brkyang dang / /g.yon bskum pa yis mnan byas la/ /'di ni brgya dang rtsa

gcig bzla/ /oM a pa ya na sha ni tra sa pra b+he ni trA ya trA sa ya/ /be ti be ra ti/ /sh+the pa ti sh+the be ta/ dza ti ni rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo che ge mo A kaR+Sha yadz+dza/ brjod pas sngags las byung ba yi/ /khro gnyer lcags kyus mtshan pa yis/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i/ /

rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo mchog /gser gyi rna rgyan 'phyang ba rnams/ /bkug ste 'ong ba rgyas btab po/ /lhun gyis grub pa gnyis mi dgos/ /thun bzhir zhag bdun sbyar na 'grub/ /gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor pas/ /sngon bzhin thams cad rab byas la/ /mar ngo bcu

bzhi tshes brgyad la/ /ro bsregs sol ba blangs nas ni/ /sngags 'di brgya rtsa brgyad du ni/ /bzlas nas srin po la sogs pa/ /ming bcas gro ga la sogs pa/ /bris nas de yis dgug par byed/ /oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwI kr-i tA na na srin po la sogs pa che ge mo skyes pa'am bud med 'di

bdag la byin zhig stam+b+ha ya hUM phaT dz+dza/ brjod cing de mnan thun bzhi ru/ /bdun sbyar srin pa la sogs pas/ /rang gis bka' stsal gang yang rung / /khrid nas nges par 'bul bar byed/ /'das ma thag pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la/ /ji skad bshad pa'i

phyag rgya mchog /bsgrub phyir sbyin sreg cho ga bya/ /dur khrod thal ba sol ba la/ /hom khung gru gsum khru do pa/ /zabs su khru gang kha khyer ni/ /sor mo brgyad pa'i tshad du bya/ /rdo rje rtse gsum sor bcu gnyis/ /rtse dbus lcags kyu ltar byas nas/ /dbus dang kha khyer la bkod de/ /

dmar nag kha khyer rams kyis byug /ji skad gsungs pa'i gshin rje gshed/ /hUM bskyed rdo rje lce ldan pa'i/ /zhal du nges par bsgyur byas la/ /po son cha sogs me sbar ro/ /dug gi khrag dang rab tu sbyar/ /lan tshwa ske tshe de bzhin sbyar/ /d+ha du a yi 'bras bu yis/ /zhal du bsreg

cing lus dang ngag /khro zhing bsgrub bya'i ming bcas pa'i/ /sngags 'di stong dang rtsa brgyad du/ /blo dang ldan pas g.yel med pas/ /bzla zhing sbyin sreg brtsam pa'o/ /oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na bu mo che ge mo stam+b+ha ya na shA ya hUM hUM phaT dz+dza/ de las 'phros pa'i gshin rje

gshed/ /lcags kyu thogs pa 'phros byas pas/ /rlung dkyil la gnas bu mo yi/ /snying gar sbyar te dgug par bsam/ /nyi ma'i gung dang nam phyed na/ /'di ni shis pa'i dus yin pas/ /blo dang ldan pas sbyor ba des/ /nyi ma gsum dang drug tu bya/ /'ongs pas 'tshe ba

bzlog pa'i phyir/ /sngon bzhin zhi dang bsrung ba bya/ /bskal pa grangs med gsum du'ang / /de yis rtag tu 'dul bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas sam ni chos 'dzin nam/ /rdo rje sems dpa' gang yang rung / /gal te rmongs pas 'das na ni/ /de yi tshe ni der zad 'gyur/ /da ni klu

skams pas char gcad par bya ba'i cho ga bshad par bya'o/ /sngon bzhin byas pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po nyid/ /kha dog ser po bsgoms byas la/ /char mi bcad pa 'gog par bya/ /yul yul kun nas phyogs gcig ste/ /hUM bskyed sna tshogs rdo rje ni/ /rab 'bar

me stag 'phro ba ni/ /'dod pa'i phyogs ni g.yogs par bsam/ /de yi lte bar hUM bskyed pa'i/ /rdo rje rtse lnga 'greng bu ni/ /tA la'i tshad tsam me 'bar ba'i/ /bum par rten gyi dkyil 'khor bsam/ /de ru gong gi sbyor ba ni/ /'khor lo dang bcas de bzhin bsgom/ /bdag ci 'dra

bar 'khor rnams kyang / /brjod par bsams te sngags 'di bzlas/ /oM AHhUM ma hA ba ra sha ha na ha na hUM phaT/ de rnams ba spu'i bu ga las/ /'phros pa'i 'od zer ser po yis/ /'dod pa'i phyogs ni khyab bsams pas/ /sna tshogs rdo rje me yis ni/ /sa gzhi thams cad bsregs

nas ni/ /klu skams gyur zhing 'bros bsams na/ /rang 'dod gnas las phyi rol du/ /'bab bam 'on te mi 'bab 'gyur/ /yang na sbyor ba nges gnas la/ /ske tshe lan tshwa 'bru mar dang / /dug dang d+ha du ra dag gis/ /dur khrod ras la 'khrul 'khor bri/ /dang po pad+ma 'dab brgyad

la/ /klu brgyud rnams kyis bon nam/ /rang rang snying po bri ba'o/ /phu phaM phe pho pha phi phaM/ /snying po phaT gnyis bar du ni/ /chu yi snying po bA bris la/ /de rnams bkug ste sa bon la/ /bcug ste gsal bar bsgom par bya/ /yang ni ras ma gnyis pa la/ /las kyi rdo rje ser po ni/ /

'od zer 'bar ba bri byas la/ /lte bar rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ /hUM gis mtshan pa bri bar bya/ /gong gi sbyor bas byin brlabs la/ /dang po ras ma bkan te bzhag /ras ma gnyis pa kha sbubs nas/ /rdo la sogs pas mnan byas pas/ /gong ma'i sngags ni bzlas brjod bya/ /klu rgyal

'bum ni khros gyur yang / /char ba 'gog pa'i mchog yin no/ /da ni pha rol gyi ngag dang dpung gnon pa'i cho ga bshad par bya'o/ /snga ma bzhin du thams cad byas/ /ting 'dzin 'di yis zhag bdun du/ /thun bzhir gzugs brnyan gcig sbyar bya/ /'phral du mngon du phyis byed

'gyur/ /gang yang rung ba'i sbyor ldan pas/ /gcer bu la sogs phyir rgol rnams/ /ming gi yi ge dang pos bskyed/ /spobs pa mnan phyir de yi mgor/ /laM la dbang chen ser po la/ /grwa bzhir rdo rjes mtshan par bsam/ /de steng haM byung las rdo rje/ /de steng paM bskyed pad+ma

la/ /gzhal yas khang pa ji bzhin bsam/ /de dbus khro bo'i 'khor lo che/ /kha dog ser po bsgoms byas nas/ /de ni gnon pa rnam par bsam/ /rkan gyi dbus su haM bskyed pa'i/ /sna tshogs rdo rje kha bzhi yis/ /gsum pos spyi bo rna ba gnyis/ /lkog mar phug bsam

sngags bzla'o/ /de nyid gsum par rang rang sngags/ /che ge pa sha pa ya hUM/ /brjod cing bltas pas bsgrub bya de/ /mig mi lta zhing smra mi nus/ /gang yang rung ba'i rnal 'byor bas/ /'di yang sngon bzhin rab sbyar nas/ /gang tshe dpung tshogs mthong ba yi/ /de tshe las la yang

dag sbyar/ /dpung rnams kun gyi spyi bo ru/ /sa sogs rten ni sngon bzhin bskyed/ /'khor lo thams cad khro bo che/ /pad+mo ser po'i mdog ltar bsgom/ /ri yi rgyal po tsam bsams te/ /de nyid gsum par rang rang sngags/ /ba hu pa ya hUM zhes brjod/ /dpung rnams sa 'og 'bying

bar 'gyur/ /khro bo rnams ni phar bltas bsam/ /ba hu bi ra hUM zhes brjod/ /de dag phyir ni mi ldog par/ /'bros par rab tu gyur pa'o/ /gal te khro bo rang mdun bltas/ /ba hu gr-ih+Na hUM zhes brjod/ /de ni 'bros par byed 'dod kyang / /mdung bzhin du

ni rengs par 'gyur/ /tshu rol pham par byed 'dod pas/ /gnyi ga mdun gyi phyogs byas pas/ /ba hu e hi hUM brjod pas/ /pha rol rgyal bar 'gyur ba'o/ /de ltar sbyor ba'i rnam pa yis/ /g.yel ba med par sbyar 'gyur na/ /sangs rgyas dpung yang gnon byed na/ /mi dbang

la ni dogs pa med/ /yang ni sngon bzhin rab byas la/ /gang tshe dpung tshogs mthong 'gyur nas/ /de rmongs bya phyir phur bu yi/ /bsam gtan 'di ni sbyar bar bya/ /hUM las bskyed pa'i phur bu ni/ /steng ni rtse lnga 'og rtse gcig /sor brgyad tshad tsam rab bsams la/ /ded dpon

dang pos dpung rnams bskyed/ /thams cad snying ni phyogs bsams nas/ /de ni rdo rje tho ba yis/ /khros shing thams cad phog bsams la/ /sngags 'dis rab tu gdab pa'o/ /oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ /dpung thams cad phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya/ dpung thams cad phaT/

hUM hUM hUM badzra kI la ya/ badzra d+ha ro Adz+nyA pa ya ti/ dpung thams cad kA ya wAka tsit+ta badzra kI la ya hUM phaT/ khros pas bzla zhing btab 'gyur na/ /sangs rgyas dag gi dpung dag kyang / /ting 'dzin de yis 'jig 'gyur na/ /mi yi dbang po smos ci dgos/ /da ni char dbab pa'i cho ga rgyas

par bshad par bya'o/ /'og 'byung ba yi rim pa yis/ /stobs po che yi rnal 'byor pas/ /grangs med bzlas pas bka' lung thob/ /'bum phrag gcig ni bzlas pa bya/ /thams cad dmar por rab bsams la/ /rdza phor so ni ma btang la/ /ral gri rtse brgyad 'khor lo la/ /

pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad po bri/ /de la rams kyi khu ba yis/ /rdo rje thor tshugs gcig ma yi/ /sngags kyi snying po 'di bri'o/ /oM shu li ni nan swA hA bri/ /de dang 'dra ba'i kham phor gzhag /kha sbyar skud pa sngon dmar dkri/ /de dang de 'dul rab bkug ste/ /'khor lo 'di la gnas

par bsam/ /de ni ji bzhin gzhan thal sbyar/ /mchod pa'i tshogs kyis mchod byas nas/ /klu gnas mtsho dang rdzing bu sogs/ /gzhan la gsang nas gzhug pa'o/ /bdag nyid gnas dgon dben pa ru/ /sa sogs cho ga sngon 'gro bas/ /me yi dkyil 'khor gru

gsum steng / /rlung gi dkyil 'khor zla gam bri/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor zlum po ste/ /pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad po ni/ /phyogs dang mtshams ni ma 'khrul bar/ /sbrul brgyad phyi rol bsnol mar bri/ /dbus su chu bdag dkar po che/ /sbrul mgo bdun pa zhabs klu gcig /skyes bu'i

gdong can sbrul zhags bsnams/ /lto 'phye mkha' 'gro zhon pa bri/ /shar gyi 'dab mar mtha' yas ljang / /ut+pal thogs pa bri bar bya/ /lho yi 'dab mar nor rgyas dkar/ /rin chen bum thogs bri bar bya/ /nub kyi 'dab mar 'jog po dmar/ /dgra sta thogs pa bri bar

bya/ /byang du karko Ta nag po/ /sbrul shog thogs pa bri bar bya/ /nub phyogs 'dab mar pad+ma dkar/ /pad+ma thogs pa bri bar bya/ /bden bral 'dab mar pad chen dkar/ /pad dkar thogs pa bri bar bya/ /rlung mtshams 'dab mar dung skyong ser/ /dung phor thogs pa bri bar

bya/ /dbang ldan rigs ldan sna tshogs pa/ /rgyal bu 'dzin pa bri bar bya/ /de dag kun kyang sbrul mgo gdengs/ /zhabs kyang sbrul 'khyil sprin gyi ni/ /gdan la bzhugs pa bri bar bya/ /g.yo ba drag po la sogs pa/ /rang rang phyogs su brgyad po ni/ /zur dang sgo ru gnyis 'khyil

nas/ /sgo zur gnyis su mgo mjug bsnol/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /bum pa 'o ma gang ba dgu/ /phyogs mtshams rnams su bzhag nas ni/ /rgyan rnams kyis kyang mdzes par bya/ /de yi rtog pa las bshad pa'i/ /cho gas klu rnams naM gis bskyed/ /srog dang

bcas pa bzhin du ni/ /gong ma lta bu bsgom par bya/ /de rnams dza naM dza zhes brjod/ /de nas bkug la bsang gtor sogs/ /byas nas de la zhugs par bsam/ /de nas gtor ma 'o mar bcas/ /bu ram la sogs lha bshos che/ /phul nas rang rang sngags 'di ni/ /brgya rtsa brgyad

kyis dga' bar bya/ /oM baM ba ru Na ya gA ti pa ta ye na ga naM paR+sha ya hUM naM hUM swA hA/ oM aM a nan+ta ya hUM naM hUM swA hA/ oM baM ba su ke hUM naM hUM swA hA/ oM taM tak+sha ka hUM naM hUM swA hA/ oM kaM karko Ta hUM naM hUM swA hA/ oM paM pad+ma hUM naM hUM swA hA/ oM maM ma hA pad+ma hUM naM hUM swA hA/ oM saM shaM

kha ba la hUM naM hUM swA hA/ oM a na pa ta ha hUM naM hUM swA hA/ de nas pog snod bzung byas te/ /gtor ma sogs kyis mnyes byas la/ /stobs chen sbyor ba de nyid kyis/ /bzhag ste tshig gis gsol ba gdab/ /klu chen po ni khyed rnams kyis/ /bdag la yang dag dga' ba dang / /bcom

ldan 'das kyi bka' yis ni/ /char gyi rgyun ni dbab tu gsol/ /lan gsum brjod pas klu rnams kyis/ /dga' bas char pa 'bebs bsams nas/ /rang gi sbyor ba ma nyams par/ /ji bzhin rang gi sngags bzla'o/ /na maHsa man+ta kA ya wAka tsit+ta badzrA NAM/ oM

hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ oM u gra la shu la ba ni hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ oM dzo ti da ni da hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ oM oM oM/ ma hA pa lA ya swA hA/ de yi dbang du rab byas nas/ /sa gzhi thams cad char gyi ni/ /rgyun gyis ngoms par byas nas ni/ /thams cad bde la gnas par byed/ /

de yis phebs par ma gyur na/ /stobs po che yi rnal 'byor pas/ /thams cad dkar pos bsams byas te/ /zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gis ni bsgrub/ /hom khung zlum po khru gang par/ /khru phyed zabs su kha khyer la/ /sor bzhi tshad tsam de tsam 'phags/ /pad+ma'i 'dab mas

bskor bar bri/ /'khor lo 'khor lo phreng bskor la/ /rdo rgyus sogs kyis byugs byas te/ /ji bzhin pa yi cho ga yis/ /me lha la sogs mchod par bya/ /de yi dbus su stobs po che/ /'og nas 'byung ba bzhin du bya/ /phyogs dang mtshams su klu brgyad kyang / /de yi zhal

bltas thal sbyar bsam/ /gong gi sngags kyis spyan drangs nas/ /bsang gtor zhabs bsil la sogs pa/ /byas nas de la thim par bsam/ /de rnams lce yi dbus su ni/ /yi ge naM ni bsam byas te/ /blugs gzar dgang gzar cho ga bzhin/ /byas nas bsang gtor la

sogs pa/ /yang ni byas nas sbyin sreg dbul/ /'o ma dang ni 'bras chan dang / /bur ram sbrang rtsi li khar/ /dbang po la sogs sman rnams ni/ /dang por gsum gsum dbul bar bya/ /gong gi sngags la zhi ba yi/ /rig pa dang bcas bzlas na ni/ /klu rnams kun

la ci 'dod pa'i/ /gong gi rdzas ni sbyin sreg bya/ /tshim par byas nas rang gi sngags/ /gong ma bzhin du rab brjod pas/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i phyogs rnams su/ /char gyi rgyun ni 'bebs par byed/ /de yis phebs par ma gyur na/ /stobs chen khro bo'i rnal 'byor pas/ /

thams cad nag por bsams byas te/ /'khrul 'khor cho ga bsgrub par bya/ /chu bo'i ngos gnyis sa dang ni/ /grog mkhar sa dang bshang gci bsres/ /klu yi gzugs brnyan mtho gsum pa'i/ /snying gar 'khor lo 'di ni gzhug /dur khrod ci ni ras ma la/ /ske tshe lan tshwa

yungs mar dang / /khrag dug rams kyi snag tsha yis/ /ral gri rtse brgyad 'khor lo bri/ /de steng pad+ma 'dab brgyad la/ /phu sogs brgyad ni bri ba dang / /snying por yi ge bA bris la/ /sngon bzhin bsams te dgug gzhug bya/ /gzugs brnyan yan lag thams cad

kun/ /tsha ba gsum dang ske tshe dang / /d+ha du ra dang yungs mar dang / /byugs nas me la gdung bya zhing / /gong gi sngags ni brjod bya zhing / /klu rnams gzugs ni rab tsha bas/ /bye ma me yi 'jigs pa yis/ /'jigs nas char rgyun 'jam po yi/ /mngon par 'dod pa'i

phyogs ni 'bebs/ /de yis char ni mi 'babs na/ /sngon bzhin klu yi dkyil 'khor bri/ /stod g.yogs ser po smad g.yogs dmar/ /ze'u kha sngon po bcings nas ni/ /gos ni dmar po bgo ba'am/ /yang na gcer bur byung byas la/ /skra bshig so ni gtsigs byas

nas/ /rkang par nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ /rdo rje 'bar bar byin brlabs la/ /klu ni gan rkyal gnas par bsam/ /g.yon pas de yi dkyil 'khor mnan/ /skrag ste gdengs ka g.yo bar bsam/ /gyen bltas kha las phus 'debs shing / /de yi khrag gis mkha'

khyab nas/ /rgya mtsho lta bur gyur bsams nas/ /sngags 'di g.yeng ba med par bzla/ /na maHsa man+ta/ kA ya wAka tsit+ta badzrA NAM/ oM naM hUM naM hUM naM hUM/ phaT naM phaT naM phaT/ oM u gra la shu la pa ni naM/ hUM naM hUM naM hUM/ /phaT naM phaT naM phaT/ oM dzo ti ni rna ta/

hUM naM hUM naM hUM/ phaT naM phaT naM phaT/ oM ma hA ba la naM phaT/ de yis klu rnams stobs chen la/ /skrag nas sa gzhi rgyas pa ru/ /dam tshig dbang gis de dag gis/ /char gyi rgyun ni 'bebs par byed/ /des kyang char ni mi 'bab na/ /sngon bzhin mngon spyod hom khung du/ /bo son cha

yi tsher mas dgang / /sme sha can gyi me sbar bya/ /me lha sngon bzhin mchod byas nas/ /de dbus stobs po che bsams nas/ /zhal gdangs rdo rje rtse ldan pa/ /mche ba gtsigs pa bsam par bya/ /sngon gzugs klu yi gzugs brnyan ni/ /dug dang lan tshwa d+ha du ra/ /ske tshe sogs pa

rab byas la/ /phuHsa bskyed dgug cing gzhug par bya/ /de ni bshang ba gci bas byugs/ /gdug pa'i dgra yi g.yon pa yis/ /de yi mjug ma'i rtse mo nas/ /gtub cing gong ma'i sngags zlo zhing / /klu rnams mA ra ya phaT ces/ /brjod cing sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad/ /

byin pas klu rnams thams cad kyang / /tsha ste skrag nas char 'bebs byed/ /gal te de ltar byed pa la/ /char ni 'bebs par mi byed na/ /stobs po che yi 'gal ba'i phyir/ /de gnon pa yi cho ga bya/ /chu ngogs sa la sogs pa yi/ /sngon gsungs rdzas la khro bo che/ /

gzugs brnyan zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /byas te gan rkyal gzhag par bya/ /bdag nyid dpal ldan gsum pa yi/ /rnal 'byor 'og nas 'byung bzhin bskyed/ /de ni bkug nas gzugs brnyan bcug/ /g.yon pas mnan te sngags bzla'o/ /oM su m+b+ha ni su m+b+ha/ ma hA ba

la baR+Sha shI g+h+raM hUM phaT/ gr-i h+Na gr-ih+Na ma hA ba la baR+Sha shI g+h+raM hUM phaT/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA ba ya ma hA ba la baR+Sha shI g+h+raM hUM phaT/ A na ya hoHb+ha ga bAn bid+yA rA dza ma hA ba la baR+Sha shI g+h+raM hUM phaT/ de yang ji bzhin khri phrag gnyis/ /bzlas brjod byas nas gong ma yi/ /hom khung dbus su gnod

mdzes che/ /zhal gdangs hUM gi lce can bsam/ /bskul ba'i tshig dang bcas pa yis/ /gzugs brnyan gtub cing khri phrag gcig /de yi zhal du sbyin sreg bya/ /stobs po che yis char phab nas/ /'dzam gling 'di dang thams cad kun/ /char gyis ngoms par

byas pa yis/ /lo legs 'bru rnams 'phel bar 'gyur/ /'khrul 'khor rgyud ni kun la grags/ /de nas zhi ba'i hom khung ni/ /sngon bzhin du ni rab byas nas/ /spyan ma dkar mo bsams nas ni/ /de yi sngags dang de'i cho gas/ /mar dang 'o ma 'bras chan sogs/ /

de yi zhal du dbab byas nas/ /sreg blugs khri phrag gcig dbul bas/ /klu dang khro bo stobs po che/ /tshar bcad de yis zhi bar byed/ /des na de yis dga' 'gyur te/ /gzhan du sbyar ba tsam gyis ni/ /mod la char gyi rgyun 'bebs byed/ /las kyi tshogs ni de dag gam/ /

gzhan la sgrub po bsrung ba'am/ /yang na bdag gis gzhan bsrung phyir/ /sbyor ba 'di ni brtsam pa'o/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa las byung ba'i/ /mA ma kI ni sngon bzhin bsam/ /ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka ru/ /bsgrub bya bzhag nas sngags 'di bzla/ /oM AHshang+ka re shan+tiM

ka re g+huT+Ta g+huT+Ta g+huT+Ti ni g+huT+Ti ni g+ha ta ya swA hA che ge mo rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM/ brjod pas sngon bzhin stobs dbab dang / /dbang bskur byas nas bsgrub bya de/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i sprul pa yang / /srung na gzhan sbyar smos ci dgos/ /gal te khyis gtses la sogs la/ /mtshon cha nor ni gzhan lta

bsgrub/ /de tshe sa gsum sgras 'gengs tshe/ /rnal 'byor 'di yis bsrung ba bya/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yi/ /spyi bor hUM las rdo rje bskyed/ /de yi lte bar zla ba la/ /mA ma kI ni sngon bzhin bsam/ /de yi ye shes lha mo ni/ /thugs kar maM la bzlas pa'i sngags/ /yang 'greng rig

bcas bskor bar bsam/ /de nyid bzlas pas 'od zer 'phros/ /de yis spyi bo nas brtsams te/ /rkang mthil bar gyi rdo rje yi/ /go chas bar mtshams med gtams te/ /'byi lo ka ni chur blugs bzhin/ /sbyor ba yang dang yang bsams te/ /bdag dang gzhan ni srung bar byed/ /

'jigs pa stong gsum gang ba yang / /srung byed stobs su 'gyur bar bshad/ /mngon rtogs nye ba'i rnal 'byor pas/ /las ni bzhi ste gcig la gsum/ /bsgrub phyir nye dang mi nye bas/ /bsam gtan ri mo bsrung ba'i phyir/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i chos

rnams kyi/ /don dang 'bras bur bcas pa rnams/ /dag pa'i khro bo rnams kyi ni/ /bsgom pa'i cho ga bshad par bya/ /sngon bzhin brten gyi dkyil 'khor dang / /dang po mgon po bskyed byas nas/ /sems can skye rim bzhi spangs nas/ /bar ma'i sems kyis dang por

'gyur/ /bskul bas hUM lnga b+hUM du byung / /hUM lnga lcags kyu dbyug to dang / /rtse gsum ral gri rdo rjer 'gyur/ /b+hUM ni 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad 'gyur/ /de yang de dag rnams kyis mtshan/ /'od kyi khams bzhugs sangs rgyas rnams/ /rang dang 'dra bas bskul byas te/ /

bcug ste sa bon nang du thim/ /TA k+ki rgyal po khro bo che/ /sku dang dbu zhal mthing ga la/ /g.yas dkar g.yon dmar phyag drug pa/ /g.yas gnyis lcags kyu ral gri 'dzin/ /g.yon gnyis rin chen pad+ma'o/ /dbyug sngon can ni khro bo che/ /sku mdog de 'dra phyag drug

pa/ /g.yas gnyis dbyug to ral gri 'dzin/ /g.yon gnyis rin chen pad+ma'o/ /stobs po che ni khro bo che/ /zhal gsum de 'dra phyag drug pa/ /g.yas gnyis rtse gsum ral gri 'dzin/ /g.yon gnyis rin chen pad+ma'o/ /mi g.yo mgon po khro bo che/ /zhal gsum de 'dra

zur gyis lta/ /g.yas gnyis ral gri 'khor lo 'dzin/ /g.yon gnyis rin chen pad+ma'o/ /gnod mdzes rgyal po khro bo che/ /sku dang dbu zhal de 'dra ste/ /g.yas gnyis rdo rje ral gri dang / /g.yon gnyis rin chen pad+ma'o/ /gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur rgyal che/ /sku dang

dbu zhal gser btso 'dra/ /g.yas gnag g.yon dkar phyag drug pa/ /g.yas gnyis 'khor lo rdo rje 'dzin/ /g.yon gnyis rin chen pad+ma 'dzin/ /de dag dang pos rig ma 'khyud/ /stag lpags sham thabs dang ldan pa/ /'gying bag tu ni rab khro ba/ /mche ba cung zad

gtsigs pa ste/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /pad+ma nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ /sbom po g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang ba'o/ /me yi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor nang / /'khor lo 'bar bas gtsug tor bskor/ /mi bskyod cod pan mtshan ma bsgom/ /de dag dran pa gcig pa

ste/ /las kyi khyad par sgrub byed pas/ /'di ni 'khor lor ldan pa yi/ /zhar la de yi sgrub pa gsungs/ /dgug dang dbang gi dang po dang / /chos tshe rgyas mdzad mang po zhi/ /ma yin las kyi khyad par rnams/ /dang po gnyis pas yang bya ste/ /dus kyi bye brag nges med pas/ /

'grub ste dang po thun mong lung / /khyad par gzhung 'dis zlos byas te/ /dad pas de rnams nan tan bya/ /gti mug nyes pa'i 'dod chags dang / /sgrib pa las ni rnam dag pa'i/ /rang bzhin gzung dang dga' ba dang / /tshul dang mi g.yo rgyu nyid dang / /'bras bur dag ste

de rnams kyi/ /spyi yi mtshan nyid rnam dag pa/ /khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba yi/ /bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya/ /gang phyir ri mo'i brtul zhugs kyis/ /gzhung du nges par gsungs pas na/ /las kyi rim pa bskang pa'i phyir/ /gsang ba'i thig le

rgyud las gsungs/ /de phyir sgrub thabs rim pa ni/ /rdzogs par bya phyir bla mas kyang / /sgrub po rnams la phan gdags phyir/ /'dus pa'i cho gar gsungs pa yi/ /sngon bzhin thams cad rab byas la/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad rnal 'byor gnas/ /dbus zhal sku ni mthing ka

la/ /g.yas dkar g.yon dmar phyag drug pa/ /dang pos rang gi rig ma 'khyud/ /g.yas gnyis rdo rje lcags kyu bsnams/ /g.yon gnyis pad+ma zhags pa bsnams/ /mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa ste/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan dang ldan/ /dbu skra ser po gyen du

brdzes/ /gtum po'i hUM gi nga ro sgrogs/ /stag lpags smad g.yogs dang ldan pa/ /drag po g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang gis/ /lha chen chung mar bcas pa yi/ /gdan g.yon sra ba'i nu mar mnan/ /cod pan mi bskyod mtshan pa bsgom/ /de ltar bsgoms nas de yi

sngags/ /hUM bzhi'am der gsungs bcu bdun po/ /rtse gcig las rnams kun la ni/ /sngar bcas cho ga bzhin du bzlas/ /oM AHkro d+he hUM ka ra na ha na ma tha b+hany+dza hUM phaT/ rtsa ba'i rig pa'o/ /oM hri da ya hUM/ snying ga'o/ /oM ka pA la hUM phaT/

mtshog ma la'o/ /oM AHhUM ka ra ke ka be ra hUM phaT/ spyi gtsug tu'o/ /oM dz+wa la dz+wa la li ta bI tra ha hUM phaT/ go cha la'o/ /oM pe bas swa tan+ta ka hUM phaT/ mtshon cha la'o/ /sbyor ba de yis ba dan dang / /thal ba snag tsha btsag sor gtub/ skrod byed dag gi las rnams

dag /ji bzhin du ni bsgrub par bya/ /dur khrod ras la ba dan ni/ /kha dog mthing ga sor bcu drug /smyug ma'i yu ba khru gang la/ /btags te dur khrod gnas su bsgrub/ /de ni lag tu gzung byas nas/ /zhag bdun sngags bzlas nam langs na/ /de thogs dgra

dpung la g.yabs pas/ /the tshom med par gnon par 'gyur/ /mtshon thogs bdag la gnod byed gzhan/ /sgrub pa po ni mthong tsam gyis/ /de dag mdung bzhin rengs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin glang rgyal myos pa dang / /shing rta rta dang srog chags rngam/ /rkang thang 'khrugs

pa mang bcas pa/ /mthong ba tsam gyis rengs par 'gyur/ /mtshan mo mi ro bsregs pa yi/ /gnas song skra bshig gcer bur phyung / /bzlas pa bskor zhing rab byas nas/ /nam langs thal ba spar gang blang / /lag pa g.yon pas blangs nas ni/ /rang gi khyim du 'gro bar

bya/ /yang na lha khang stong bar 'gro/ /phyir ni blta bar mi bya'o/ /de nas der yang thal ba de/ /zhag bdun sngags bzlas bsrung bar bya/ /snod sar nang du rab bzhag ste/ /sa la gzhag par mi bya'o/ /de yis gang gi dpung gi tshogs/ /mthong na lan cig

gtor tsam gyis/ /rengs par 'dod na rengs par 'gyur/ /rlung phyogs dag tu sbyar ba na/ /ldog par 'dod na ldog par 'gyur/ /mdun du skem ste gtor byas nas/ /myos par 'gyur te mtshon cha rngam/ /de kho na bzhin 'dor bar 'gyur/ /tshil chen snum la mar me ni/ /

thod pa bzang por sbar bar bya/ /steng gi thod par du ba bsgo/ /snag tshar byas te de blangs la/ /zhag bdun sngags bzlas nam langs na/ /du ba'i snag tsha mig la bsku/ /de yis gang mthong thams cad kun/ /ci bgyi zhes ni bka' nyan 'gyur/ /yug snam btsag ni

dge ba dag /bsreg pa'i gnas 'gro khar bcug la/ /de phyed tshig pa'i dus su ni/ /grogs med par ni mtshan mo blang / /lha yi khang stong du khyer nas/ /gong gi sngags ni zhag bdun bzla/ /de tshe bgegs kyang sna tshogs 'ang / /mi 'jigs 'dug cing de la bzla/ /de nas

nam langs gyur pa na/ /ras ni dmar pos dkri byas la/ /mchod cing bsrungs nas gzhag par bya/ /de yis sems dang ldan pa'am/ /mi ldan gang gi ming bris pas/ /bskul nas dogs pa med pa yang / /rdo rje 'chang ba'i bka' bzhin du/ /'ongs nas las rnams

thams cad byed/ /srog song dur khrod khyer ba na/ /gser gyi sor gdub de yi khar/ /bcug nas bdag nyid gcig pu ni/ /khro bo'i sngags ni zlos shing 'dug /ro de me yis tshig 'gyur na/ /kha yi sor gdub sgrub pa po'i/ /lag pa g.yon pas blang byas la/ /zhag

bdun bar du bzla bar bya/ /de nas sor gdub bzang po de/ /lag pa g.yon pa'i mdzub mo la/ /bcug ste lag pa de yis ni/ /gang dang gang du reg 'gyur ba/ /de dang de yis las kun byed/ /phyi bzhin du'ang rtag tu 'brang / /rten 'brel bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /'di

la dpyad par yong mi bya/ /sing ta'i shing la gab tshe yang / /bzang po sor ni brgyad pa bya/ /de yi nang du skrod byed kyang / /dngos grub sbyin par byed par blugs/ /zla ba gzas ni zin pa'i tshe/ /ma grol bar du de la bzla/ /de nas sngon bzhin 'khor lo bri/ /'byung po gtor

ma sbyin byas la/ /gab tshe nang gi skrod byed kyang / /sgra 'byung yang na gas kyi bar/ /de srid zhag bdun de la ni/ /khro bo'i sngags kyi bzlas par bya/ /de tshe skrod byed grub ma thag /blangs nas gang yang rung ba ru/ /cho ga bzhin du sbyar na ni/ /de yis mi nus gcig

kyang med/ /sa yang 'gas byed chu yang skems/ /rin chen phye ma bzhin du rlog /ri rtser sbyar na bsnyil bar byed/ /khrag dang sol ba'i sel 'bebs byed/ /gnam lcags dag ni 'thor ba dang / /sa g.yos sprin ni gtor ba dag/ /rnal 'byor

pa yis rab sbyar na/ /glo bur du ni thogs med 'grub/ /mtsho g.yo klu rnams skrag pa dang / /shing rnams 'bras bu glo bur 'byin/ /gzhan yang sgrub po ci bsam pa'i/ /las rnams thams cad de yis byed/ /'di ni rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi/ /sngags rgyud ldan pa'i las rnams de/ /

gzhan yang de las gsungs pa yi/ /las rnams mkhas pas shes par bya/ /da ni thun mong gi dngos grub kyi mjug tu mngag gzhug bsgrub pa'i cho ga bshad par bya'o/ /rdo rje bzlas gnas rnal 'byor pas/ /rang gi dgos pa rdzogs pa'i phyir/ /bdag gi rigs kyi khro

bo mchog/ /mngag gzhug pa ru bsgrub par bya/ /'dod pa'i lha yi rnal 'byor pas/ /thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la/ /hri ni 'od zer lnga 'bar ba/ /nam mkha'i dbus su bsam par bya/ /mkha' dbyings bde gshegs byang chub sems/ /rig pa'i lha dang khro

bo'i tshogs/ /gang bar bsams nas sngags 'di yis/ /sku gsung thugs la gnas la gdab/ /oM AHhri a mo g+ha sid+d+hi nan b+hak+Sha ya hUM/ phab pas gnas de rigs kyi rim/ /mi bskyod pa yi a gyur te/ /tshe dpag med pa'i khaM du gyur/ /rnam par snang mdzad

ding gyur to/ /cho ga de la skad cig gis/ /cho ga gnyis pa bsgrub par bya/ /a de bdud rtsi 'khyil par gyur/ /thal sbyar gzhan la sngon bzhin bsam/ /khaM de pad+ma mthar byed gyur/ /de ni gshin rje gshed gyur te/ /de dag sngon bzhin nyi ma la/ /gnas te dang po thal

sbyar bsam/ /lha mo spangs pa'i phyag mtshan yang / /g.yas kyi tha mar dpa' bo dang / /lcags kyus bkang ba'i snod bzung nas/ /sgrub pa po la stobs byed bsgom/ /de dag gnas gsum gong ma yin/ /a khaM de ni bkod byas nas/ /de nas bskul ba la sogs pas/ /

don yod grub pas dbu brgyan te/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i thugs ka ru/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i/ /mi bskyod pa ni bsgom par bya/ /pad+ma mthar byed thugs ka ru/ /de gnas tshe dpag med par bsgom/ /gshin rje gshed kyi thugs ka ru/ /zla ba'i dkyil

'khor la gnas pa'i/ /rnam par snang mdzad rab tu bsgom/ /de nas rigs gsum phyag gnas pa'i/ /mdung rtse gsum dang kyo ba dang / /rdo rje dang ni gtun shing gis/ /gsang ba'i gnas la brdab cing bskul/ /oM mi bskyod pa ni rdo rje mchog/ /khyod kyi rigs kyi khro

bo che/ /nga yi re ba rdzogs bya'i phyir/ /khyod kyi mngag bzhugs pa ru bskul/ /tshe dpag med dang snang mdzad kyang / /de bzhin du ni bskul byas te/ /nyams dga' ba yi ri dag dang / /chu gling rnam pa sna tshogs su/ /bsam gtan 'di ni zla phyed bsgom/ /ri rab sum cu

rtsa drug gi /rab tu phra ba'i rdul snyed dang / /'khor lo can gyi byang chub 'grub/ /des khrid sangs rgyas zhing du 'gro/ /zab cing rgya che'i chos thob 'gyur/ /de ni gnyid sogs dang bral yang / /bde gshegs kun gyis byin brlabs nas/ /gnyid 'od de ru gong gsungs

pa'i/ /mtshan ma rnams ni yang dang yang / /'byung bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /lha yi bka' yis brtan par byed/ /nam mkha' chos rnams spangs pa yang / /rta dang glang chen la sogs pa/ /sgrub pa po yis bskul ba yis/ /mngag gzhug de yis byed par 'gyur/ /

gong gsungs 'og nas 'byung ba la/ /sgrub pa'i thabs ni ji snyed pa/ /nus dang ldan pas de rnams las/ /lha sogs rnams kyis khyad shes gyur/ /'dron po'i dang po'i gnas bzhin du/ /thams bcad brjod pas lung rngo thogs/ /de bas dang po sngon 'gro bas/ /gzhung gi don la

brtan par bya/ /da ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rgyas par bshad par bya'o/ /sngon gsungs yang dag rim gnas la/ /dgos dang don byed ma gtogs pa/ /bya ba thams cad mchil thal bzhin/ /spangs nas rdo rje 'chang ba yi/ /sbyor ba thob phyir dus

rtag tu/ /sangs rgyas mchod dang 'gro don la/ /dad pas brtson 'grus kyis sbyor byed/ /thabs shes sbyor bas skyon kun bsal/ /thob pa'i zas ni za bar byed/ /chags pa sdang ba rnams dang bral/ /'jig rten chos brgyad ma gtogs pa'i/ /'dod

pa'i longs spyod thob bzhin spyod/ /bka' yi gzhung lugs 'jigs spangs nas/ /lus gnas pa yi chog shes te/ /bya ba gsum gyi mtha' la spyod/ /dgos pa 'grub pa des bsgrub bya/ /ci gsung mtshan ma mthong 'gyur nas/ /rang gi rigs kyi phyag rgya mchog /gong

du bstan pa'i cho ga yis/ /bkug ste bdag gir bya ba'o/ /de dang lhan cig yid 'ong dgon/ /rang nyid ma gtogs gzhan gyis ni/ /mi phyed gnas su zla drug tu/ /gsang ba'i brtul zhugs spyod pa bya/ /brgyud pa'i man ngag las gsungs pa'i/ /lus ngag

yid kyi spyod pa'i mchog /phyag rgya dag phyir nyin mtshan du/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug brtson par bya/ /de yis zla ba gcig gis ni/ /skal ldan gyur bar the tshom med/ /de dang lnga yi bar du ni/ /rdzes mthun shis pa'i zas longs spyod/ /rang gi khams na rang gnas pa'i/ /bde

gshegs rnams kyis thugs gdungs nas/ /de ru byon nas sgrub po la/ /'phral du bka' stsal ster bar gyur/ /de nas bka' stsal thob ma thag /rang gi mthu stobs rtogs bya'i phyir/ /gong dang lhan cig zla drug tu/ /phyi yi rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad/ /yid 'ong

dben par cho ga bzhin/ /'dus pa'i 'khor lo bri byas la/ /mchod pa sogs kyis mnyes byas te/ /bsod nams tshogs ni rdzogs par bya/ /de nas bdag nyid de dang ni/ /bcos ma'i gdong la sogs pas mtshan/ /yang na phyogs gos 'ba' zhig gis/ /mtshan te kun du rgyu

bar bya/ /ri yi gcong rong nags tshal gnas/ /glang chen seng+ge sbrul dang stag /gdug pa'i sems can 'jigs pa'i sar/ /bdag rgyu de dag rtse bar byed/ /rdo leb rgya mtshor bdag nyid 'dug/ /ri dwags lte ba'i dri bro ste/ /in+d+ra nI la'i kha dog 'dra/ /snum dang mig stong

gdan bzhin no/ /tsher mang chu mig grog ral mang / /mi sdug gnas su bdag rgyu bas/ /me tog 'bras bu bzang po dang / /dri zhim chu ni mdongs dang ldan/ /gzhan gsungs phyag rgya rnams kyi mtshan/ /gar byed glu blang brkam tshig smra/ /mi shes blun pa'i gzi can rnams/ /'dul

zhing lus kyi rgyu mthun pas/ /gso bar byed cing stobs mthong bas/ /nags tshal dag tu bsod snyoms bslang / /bsgrub dbang de yi gzi brjid kyis/ /nags tshal lha rnams skrag nas ni/ /kha zas bzang po ster bdag /sgrub pa po la rab tu sbyor/ /phun sum tshogs pa ma sbyar

na/ /dam tshig stobs kyis de rnams 'chi/ /de ltar spyi dang dngos gzhi yi/ /mtshan thob pa yi rnal 'byor pas/ /rang gi khams ni dag bya'i phyir/ /'og nas bshad pa'i rim pa bzhin/ /dus mtshan bzhi ru zhag bdun du/ /bsgom pa'i dbang bskur rnam dag pas/ /nyi shu rtsa

lnga'i bdag nyid can/ /'khor lo'i bdag nyid dri med bya/ /rang gi sa bon 'od lcags kyu/ /rtag dang sbyor ba'i spyan ma'i tshogs/ /'og min nas ni bkug byas nas/ /nam mkha'i khams kun gang bzhugs bsgom/ /de nyid bde chen ro zhu bas/ /'o ma'i rgyun ltar de dag gis/ /

spyi bo nas ni mdun rgyab dang / /lnga stong dag ni zhugs par bya/ /de bzhin bde ba can zhing nas/ /dpag med dang sbyor gos dkar dgug/ /sngon bzhin bsams nas de yi dus/ /de dag rnams ni lce la gzhug/ /mngon dga' las byung mi bskyod dang / /mA ma kI ni gnyis

med du/ /de dag rnams kyi thugs ka ru/ /lnga stong bdun brgya'i bar du zhugs/ /'od des kha ti ka nas kyang / /don yod grub dang sgrol ma yang / /bde chen gzhan gyi dbang gyur nas/ /lte bar de dus zhugs byas nas/ /nam mkha' lta bur de bzhin nyid/ /yang dang

yang du brtson par bya/ /gang phyir de nyid yang bsgoms pas/ /dngos po dag par byed pa'i phyir/ /rgyal ba rnams kyis de nyid bsngags/ /de dang de yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /rdo rje gsum gyis mtshan pa ni/ /khyu mchog de ni mnyes par 'gyur/ /de ltar sbyor ba gsum ldan

pas/ /dngos gzhi'i las la 'jug don du/ /gong gsungs las kyi phyag rgya che/ /rigs gsum bye brag gis gzung bya/ /mi bskyod rdo rje rnal 'byor pas/ /sme sha can gyi mthu chen gyi/ /bu mo lo grangs bcu drug pa/ /ut+pal yi mdog 'dra

bsgrub/ /de bzhin rtag pa'i sbyor ba yi/ /btso bzlag mkhan gyi bu mo dkar/ /lo grangs nyi shu lnga lon pa/ /spyan ma'i ngo bor bsgrub par bya/ /tshe dpag med kyi rnal 'byor bas/ /gar mkhan bu mo rab mdzes shing / /dmar po bzhin sdug mig dkyus ring / /nyi shu lon pa gos

dkar bsgrub/ /yang na bram ze rgyal rigs dang / /rje'u rigs dmangs rigs gzhan bud med/ /gang gi rnal 'byor gyis gnas sgrub/ /de yis gsang ba'i sku gsum thob/ /'dis ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das/ /gcig pu rab tu che ba'i lha/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde

ba'i mchog /lhag pa'i bya ba bya zhes bsgrub/ /chags min chags dang bral ba'ang min/ /dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs so/ /'di ni gnyis med theg pa'i mchog /bud med sgyu ma'i rgyu 'di yis/ /sgyu ma dag ni thams cad pas/ /bud med sgyu ma khyad par che/ /ngo bo nyid kyi

mthu dag gis/ /rang bzhin gyis ni de 'grub pa'o/ /'jig rten gsum 'dir bud med 'dis/ /gus pa byed pa dag tu 'gyur/ /rnyed dang bde ba dga' kun gyis/ /nang spyod rnams kyang 'grub par 'gyur/ /rang gi ngo bo yongs bsgyur nas/ /bud med kun gyi sgyu ma 'grub/ /ngo mtshar sgyu

ma'i phyag rgya 'di/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi brdar bstan to/ /de bas de dang lhan cig tu/ /yid 'ong gnas su sngon bzhin du/ /ri mo'i dkyil 'khor bris nas kyang / /byin brlabs la sogs sngon bzhin bya/ /de ru stegs bu gru bzhi ni/ /bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pas byug /bde ba'i stan la de

dang ni/ /lhan cig sgyu 'dra'i ting 'dzin rol/ /bsrung ba la sogs rten bsgrubs la/ /dang po'i mgon pos bdag nyid bsgrub/ /gong ma rig ma'i 'du byed pas/ /rab tu bsgrubs te pad+mar bzhag/ /phrin las la gnas bde chen po/ /de yis sku gsum goms bya'i phyir/ /yang

dang yang du nyin mtshan du/ /zla ba drug tu bsgrub par bya/ /de yis sgrub po bdag nyid kyis/ /phyi nang dus su sangs rgyas kyi/ /mtshan gyis brgyan par ma gyur na/ /yang ni cho ga de kho nas/ /de yi 'dod pa longs spyod cing / /gsang ba'i mchod pa dang bcas pas/ /sa bcu de la

gnas bcas te/ /zla ba drug tu yang bsgrub bya/ /gal te de ru sgrub pa pos/ /gong gsungs mthong bar ma gyur na/ /ji skad bshad pa'i cho ga yis/ /yang ni zla drug rab tu brtsams/ /drug gsum bco brgyad cho ga bzhin/ /bsgrub pas rdo rje gsum gyis ni/ /dngos grub

ster te phyis 'byung ba'i/ /phyag rgya chen po rab tu 'thob/ /de ltar byas pa'i sgrub pa pos/ /bsgoms pas dngos grub mchog ma mthong / /snyan tshig zhi ba'i bskul ba yis/ /dngos grub bslang bar bya ba'o/ /sngon gyi 'khor lo khang pa'am/ /gzhan yang gang yang rung ba

ru/ /bgegs bskrad phur bus btab nas su/ /sngon bzhin gtsang gtor sa gsol btab/ /sangs rgyas la sogs snga ma bzhin/ /gsol btab stegs bu 'dus byas te/ /byin brlabs ting 'dzin gsum gnas la/ /skye gcig thogs bsam gsol ba gdab/ /

drug cu rtsa bzhis bgegs bskrad nas/ /sa bsrungs sa yi lha mo yang / /mchod pa sogs kyis mnyes byas la/ /dbang por zhal gyis bzhes par bya/ /de nas me tog sna tshogs dang / /dri zhim la sogs ldan pa yi/ /maN+Dal sngon bzhin 'dus byas la/ /de

na gnas pa dmigs par bya/ /rang gi sa bon 'od zer las/ /lcags kyu rdo rje gsal shing sogs/ /mtshan pa'i khro bo spro byas la/ /de dag mchod sogs kyis mnyes bya/ /sgrub pos 'og nas 'byung ba yi/ /tshigs bcad sngags kyi khyed rnams kyis/ /sangs rgyas

byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /bskul cig ces ni smra bar bya/ /de nas zhal gyis bzhes nas ni/ /song ste 'jig rten khams gnas pa'i/ /sangs rgyas sogs la phra mo dang / /snyan tshig 'jebs pa'i dbyangs kyis bskul/ /che ge zhes bya rdo rje che/ /'di yi gnas

su dam sdom can/ /rig ma'i brtul zhugs spyod pa yis/ /tshogs ni rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o/ /bsgom pa bzlas brjod yongs rdzogs nas/ /phyag rgya chen po bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /brtul zhugs spyod pa yang gnas nas/ /khyed kyis bsgrub

pa'i dkyil 'khor bri/ /khyed cag de ru byon nas su/ /de yi 'khor lo byin brlabs la/ /mchod pa la sogs bzhes nas kyang / /phyag rgya chen po gnang bar mdzod/ /de ltar brjod pas de dag kyang / /rab tu dgyes nas khro bo la/ /de ltar bya zhes bsams nas kyang / /lhan

cig byon bsams gnas su dgod/ /khro bos sgrub pa po la smras/ /bdag cag rnams kyis gsol ba btab/ /de dag kyang ni 'di skad gsungs/ /rdo rje che ge zhes bya la/ /bdag cag phyag rgya chen po bzhin/ /gsungs nas 'di ru byon pa lags/ /khyed kyis mchod pa'i

tshogs rnams kyis/ /mnyes par byas te dam tshig bskul/ /de nas sgrub pos sangs rgyas dang / /khro rgyal lha mo mnyes bya'i phyir/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bkug nas/ /rang gi ba spu'i bu gar bcug /de nyid lha mo sgeg pas brgyan/ /spros nas sangs rgyas byang chub

sems/ /khro bo dang bcas 'khor lo la/ /bde ba chen po'i ros mchod pa/ /byas nas bstod la bdud rtsi myang / /sna tshogs kyis ni mnyes byas nas/ /srog dang bcas pa bsams nas kyang / /bdag nyid kyis ni snyan gson gsol/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag dngos

grub kyi/ /dkyil 'khor bdag gis bri bar 'tshal/ /sang ni de ru byon nas kyang / /bdag gi mchod pa la sogs bzhes/ /bzhes nas bdag la dngos grub stsol/ /gal te ma stsal khyed rnams kun/ /rang nyid kyi ni bstan pa la/ /brdzun du smra bar gyur pa'o/ /de

ltar snyan gsan lan gsum du/ /gsol nas de dag zhal bzhes nas/ /mchod pa sogs kyis mnyes par bya/ /steng gi gnas su gshegs su gsol/ /yang ni mchod pa'i bum pa rnams/ /sngon bzhin sta gon gnas byas nas/ /me tog spos la sogs pa yis/ /

mchod nas ji bzhin gnas su dgod/ /de nas phyi de nyin par yang / /skud pa tshon rtsi sngon bzhin bsgrub/ /gos dang rin chen rgyan ldan pa'i/ /khye'u dang bu mo dbab byas nas/ /de yis dngos grub dkyil 'khor mchog /yang dag sbyin byed bris nas kyang / /dbye ba byas

nas de nyid kyang / /mchod nas rang gi gnas su btang / /de nas phyag rgya dang lhan cig /'khor lo bsgrub pa'i cho ga bzhin/ /gnyis 'dres byas nas steng nas dbab/ /sngon bzhin dkyil 'khor dbyer med bya/ /bdag po lnga lnga bzhi pa'i dus/ /bdag po gnyis

pas yang mtshan bya/ /yang na de dag klad rgyas dang / /lkog ma snying ga lte ba dang / /gsang bar rgyu yi skyes bu dgod/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum las skyes/ /sgrub pa bo ni blo ldan la/ /'jigs shing skrag nas byin gyis rlob/ /de dag gsang ba'i mchog sogs pa/ /sngon

gsungs mchod pa nyi shus kyang / /mchod nas 'od zer rtse mo las/ /yid dga'i rin chen sna bdun spro/ /gser mdog lta bu'i rgyan rnams kyis/ /brgyan pa'i bde ba'i longs spyod 'dzin/ /pad+ma'i steng na gnas pa yi/ /bud med rin chen dbul bar bya/ /gnod sbyin lta

bu'i gzugs 'dzin pa/ /gos sngon bsgos pa rin chen gter/ /gzung ba'i khyim bdag rin po che/ /sgyu ma lta bus sprul pa bya/ /mche ba drug ldan glang po dkar/ /gser gyis brgyan pa spro bar bya/ /u t+pal mthing ga'i 'dab 'dra'i rta/ /rin chen chas brgyan spros te

dbul/ /chang zungs rin chen sna bdun gyis/ /spras pa'i ral gri rin po che/ /'od zer dang ldan pad+ma la/ /gnas pa spros te dbul bar bya/ /lha yi gos kyis rab brgyan pa/ /'od zer sna tshogs spro ba yi/ /gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa/ /sbyor ba shes

pas spro bar bya/ /mkha' kun gsal bar byed pa yi/ /'od zer mtha' yas rab spro ba/ /blon po rin chen spros nas kyang / /de dag phyir rgol brgyan par bsgom/ /de ltar lha sogs bu mo dang / /rig 'dzin rnams kyis bsgyur ba yi/ /glu dang gar dang gling bu dang / /dung dang

rdza rnga la sogs pas/ /nam mkha'i khams kun g.yos par bsgom/ /shin tu zhi ba'i sgra sgrogs pa'i/ /khu byug bung ba ngang pa sogs/ /mdangs dga' rnams kyis gang bar bsam/ /me tog shing gis mtha' brgyan pa'i/ /mdzes pa'i

rdzing bu sna tshogs dang / /dpag bsam shing gi nags tshal ni/ /'khor lo'i phyogs bzhi nas 'byung ngo / /de bzhin bza' bca' kha zas dkar/ /tshal dang theg pa gdan rnams dang / /myos byed btung ba'i tshogs rnams kyang / /'khor lo mnyes phyir spro bar

bya/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i chos nyid la/ /chos kyi dbyings ni gnas med de/ /rdo rje las byung rtog pa ni/ /gsungs pa nyid kyang ma grub po/ /de ltar sna tshogs mchod pa yis/ /mnyes byas sngon bzhin rang nyid zhugs/ /bdag po nga rgyal dang ldan par/ /'khor lo bdag

la zhugs byas te/ /dga' ba'i ye shes rab gnas nas/ /zhag bdun sogs par yang du brtag /de ltar de ru phyag rgya che/ /ji skad gsungs pa thob par 'gyur/ /de ltar byas kyang phyag rgya che/ /sgrub pos kyang ni thob ma gyur/ /sngon bzhin nyams pa sna tshogs dang / /dbye

ba'i sgo nas bsgrub par bya/ /rang gi 'dod bzhin gsol btab nas/ /bris pa'i 'khor lo gshegs su gsol/ /smon lam rnams ni byas nas su/ /byang chub chen por bsngo bar bya/ /rtog pa las byung ji snyed pa/ /rje btsun rnams kyi spyan sngar bshags/ /ci bzhin byin

gyis brlabs byas nas/ /rang gi rjes su mthun pas bsgrub/ /'khor lo gang dang gang bstan pa/ /sna tshogs phyag rgya mchod pa yis/ /slob ma'i tshogs kun de dang des/ /mchod pa byas nas de bsgrub po/ /rang gi 'khor lo tshogs ldan pa'i/ /rang gi bla ma la sogs gzhan/ /yid

dga' gnas su spyan drangs nas/ /dngos grub rnam par 'phrul 'di bya/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i lha rnams mchog /rin chen sna tshogs kyis spras pa/ /dril bu rgyal mtshan mchod sogs ldan/ /bla re dam pa bres pa ru/ /rdo rje sngags dang mchod la sogs/ /glu dang sil snyan rnam

par 'bul/ /me tog bdug sogs rab sbyor bas/ /dag pa'i gdan chen bsham par bya/ /der ni de dag thams cad kun/ /ji lta'i gnas su ji bzhin 'dug/ /bskal bzang rang gi phyag rgya dang / /dngos grub phyir ni rnam par rol/ /sha dang chang la sogs pa yi/ /bza'

bca' btung ba'i tshogs rnams dang / /lus dang ngag gi spyod pa yis/ /de kun mnyes par bya dgos so/ /de bzhin phyogs skyong la sogs kun/ /gzhan bzhin 'khor lor bsgrub byas la/ /gong gsungs gtor ma'i tshogs rnams kyis/ /de dag tshim par yang bya'o/ /

sgyu 'dra'i ting 'dzin lha rnams dmigs/ /'khor lo yang dang yang du mchod/ /bla mas mdun du bzhag nas ni/ /nyams par dogs pa thams cad bsal/ /de ltar goms pa brtan bya zhing / /ma nyams skyon med spyod par ldan/ /mchog gi dngos grub lam la gnas/ /

dam pa'i rig ma ma 'khrul pas/ /zhag bdun dang ni zla phyed dang / /zla gcig zla ba phyed dang gnyis/ /rdo rje dam tshig bskyed byas nas/ /myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /de ltar yang dang yang bsgoms pas/ /bde gshegs rnams kyi dngos grub mchog /mi 'grub

'khrul pa'i rgyu yis ni/ /sgrub pa po la bkag gyur na/ /de nyid du ni sgrub pa pos/ /go skabs gzhan ni med pa'i phyir/ /thugs rje che ba'i gsang ba kun/ /de la khros par rig pa yin/ /rtog pa'i dbang gis de dag rnams/ /rang rang tshogs dang rang khams dang / /sgrub pa

po la mi gzigs te/ /btang snyoms chen por gnas pa'o/ /bka' yis 'jigs med 'khrul bsal dang / /thub pas spyan ras gzigs bya'i phyir/ /dam pa'i gzhung las gsungs pa ltar/ /de dag rnams kyi snying po bskul/ /bdag dang 'khor la dmigs byas nas/ /de

dag rnams kyi spyi bo dang / /mgrin pa de 'og thugs ka ru/ /sngon bzhin phyag rgya bzhi'i rgyas gdab/ /de bzhin phra mo'i 'khor lo la/ /sa bon sogs pas yang mtshan te/ /de nyid brjod pas de dag las/ /de dag rnams ni spro bar bya/ /spros te mdun du rab g.yeng ba'i/ /shing rta de

dag bka' nod pa/ /gnas shing khros pa bsam byas te/ /sgrub pos de la bka' yis bsgo/ /nga ni dpal ldan che ge mo/ /khyod kyi rtag tu bsgrub la gnas/ /dam sdom lam la rtag brtson pas/ /bdag la dngos grub stsal du gsol/ /

oM shrI ban tsakra aM gu shag te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad hri da ya tsun+de A kAR+Sha ya phaT dza/oM shrI ban pad+ma aM gu shag te/ gong gi bsgrub bya hri da ya tsun+de A kAR+Sha ya phaT dza/ oM shrI ban kharga saM gu shag te/ bsgrub bya hri da ya tsun+de A kAR+Sha ya phaT dza/ oM shrI ban

badzra aM gu shag te/ bsgrub bya tsun+de A kAR+Sha ya phaT dza/ rin chen la sogs rang sngags kyis/ /rang rang mtshan mas mtshan pa yi/ /ye shes sems dpa' la sogs pa/ /de dag kun tu spro bar bya/ /spros te phyogs bcur song nas kyang / /rang gi zhing na gnas pa yi/ /bde

gshegs rigs bcas btang snyoms gnas/ /lcags kyu thugs kar brdeg cing bskul/ /che ge zhes bya rdo rje la/ /khyed kyis dngos grub dam pa stsol/ /gal te ma stsal khyed rnams brdzun/ /smras pas rang nyid bslus pa'o/ /de bzhin lus kyi dkyil 'khor dang / /sku

yi bu ga kun nas kyang / /de 'dra bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /'phros pa'i mtshan ma rnams kyis bskul/ /mi gzigs mngon par gyur pa'i don/ /thabs de zhag bdun bar du bya/ /de yis rgyu kun rdzogs pas na/ /de dag rnal 'byor pa la 'jug /de yi 'og 'byung mchog

bzhi'o/ /rdo rje tshul mchog 'di brtsams pas/ /ye shes rdo rje can gyi gsang / /mchog stsol zhing ni rnam par gzigs/ /yid ni 'jigs shing skrag gyur nas/ /yid la mgu zhing dgar 'gyur ba'i/ /dngos grub dam pa de dus te/ /de la rol mo 'byung ba'o/ /gal

te gnyis kyi bdag nyid rmongs/ /de yi srog ni der zad 'gyur/ /de yis sngon du ma byas na/ /de dag chad pas gcad par bya/ /rang nyid 'khor lor bcas pa khros/ /nag po me dkyil na bzhugs/ /bsnyen pa la sogs dang ldan pas/ /phyag rgya lhan cig gnyis med

bya/ /sngon gsungs 'phros pa rnams kyis kyang / /rang khams gnas pa'i rtag pa sogs/ /rang rang kha dog dang ldan pa/ /lcags kyus bkug par byas nas su/ /phyag rgya'i gsang bar nyi ma'i steng / /me yi dkyil 'khor gru gsum du/ /bzhag ste de dag dam tshig gis/ /

bsnyengs pas 'dar bar bsam pa'o/ /de nas rang gi rigs can nyid/ /nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya'i 'od/ /ldan pa'i pad+ma kha bye ba'i/ /nang du bcug nas phan tshun dkri/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs 'byung gnas/ /gshin rje mthar byed stod sngon bzhin/ /'od ldan smad ni rtse
